name: Rusty Newman
text: Traveling and found myself with a ripped contact - called and staff said I just needed to have my rx faxed. They called when they received the fax and fixed me up with a pair. Very helpful staff

name: Missy Fantusi
text: Crowded, but they have the eyeglass cleaner that I use.

name: S. R. Reynolds
text: I had three pairs of lenses made for frames I already owned. The expertise of Patty in fitting the lenses was excellent but the customer service and the mind-blowing rudeness of the manager and even Patty, at times, was shocking and insulting. I spent well over $600 on these lenses and did not do ANYTHING to earn such treatment. I did not compalin, even when lenses were scratched by them and I had to wait another two weeks. I WILL NEVER do business there again.

name: Erin England
text: The staff here is terrific!  The prices are reasonable and they do great work.

name: Pamela Ezell
text: Dr. Morgan is great! Highly recommend.

name: Niki Pessoney
text: I went

name: A. L.
text: I have never felt so unwelcome at a business.  I got a new Rx yesterday and stopped by to check out their frame selection.  They had a sign on the door with their phone number stating that only one person at a time was allowed inside.  I called and was told that they were finishing up with a customer and then I could come in, so I waited on the sidewalk.  The employee, Beth,  held the door for the other customer to leave but stopped me before I could go in to tell me that they would be closing soon.  I asked when and she said at noon.  I pulled out my phone and it was 11:41. She kept repeating that they would be closing soon, wanting to make sure I knew that I had to be out by then. After hearing this several times, I gave up and left having never stepped foot inside. I found another place in town that was way more friendly and welcoming.  Fortunately, it wasn't hard to do.

name: Janice Cagle
text: Very professional staff and Dr. Griggs is wonderful! I also selected eyeglasses with the help of a very friendly and knowledgeable employee. They took very good care of me!

name: Heather Wilson
text: Do not do not buy anything or make an appointment at Jody’s Optical. Rude and unprofessional. This was the worst experience ever.

name: Rebekka Sharpe
text:
SLOW.
Everyone is nice, but nothing gets done in a timely manner.They are fine if you are willing wait at least a week for an appointment and another week or longer to actually get your glasses. If you actually need glasses go somewhere else.

**Apparently they are capable of making some glasses within a day however they are not upfront with you if they don't have your lenses in stock and it may take a few days or a week so ask them before you pay, or even before you pick frames.

And no matter what if you get transitions lenses it will take a week. (Also something they should tell you upfront)

name: KELI SPARKS
text:
Understand Dr. Griggs is the attending Optometrist, as well as the new owner, 2018.  We've received comprehensive eye exams, eye care tips and advice in a professional manner, in a clean, well-lit office.

He has a nice selection of frames, and his staff will order lenses, contacts, and work with your glasses until they are comfortable.  The staff is always pleasant, helpful, kind, and professional.

They've reviewed our vision benefits with us.  Twice staff has  confirmed vision benefits via phone calls.  Not everyone does that.

Kudos to the staff for double-checking, and finding TWO lens issues on a pair of glasses made by A DIFFERENT company, not - not - made at Jody's Vision.  After having fuzzy vision issues with lenses from a different company, I had to have the right lens re-done, and then the left lens re-done.  Axis was off 10%, then 5%.  This issue is almost resolved.  I will definitely bring my glasses back to Jody's Vision to check my lenses the third time!

Thank you, staff, for all the help!

name: John Pierson
text: Dr. Griggs was very through and explained all that he was doing and his findings.  His staff was friendly and professional.  I'd recommend them to any one.

name: david reynolds
text: Absolutely love Dr. Griggs and his staff. So glad he purchased the practice. They do an excellent job making my glasses. Wouldn't trust nobody but him and his staff with my eyes.

name: Kimberley Scott
text: The staff and Dr. Griggs are all very welcoming and enjoyable to deal with. Dr. Griggs was intentional about explaining his thoughts on various questions I had. Great experience overall. I switched to them after seeing how they dealt with my son’s appt.

name: Joshua Andrew
text: Actually don't have a vision center.

name: Dean W
text: lmao, I called and found out this office has been closed for a while now. The phone number was just routed to one of the ones in another city.

name: Vanessa Pair
text: I came to this place in June for contact lenses. They gave me a sample pair saying they had to order the lenses and would call me when they came in. Well they didn’t call. I called them and they said the lenses were on back order and gave me more samples. Again they said they would call when they came in. Still no call. So I called again and they said an order was coming in tomorrow but tomorrow hasn’t shown up yet. Now when I call all I get is a busy signal or the phone just rings. And per my insurance company I can’t go anywhere else until June of next year but my samples have run out. #horrible

name: Wade Walker
text: The vision doctor himself was very nice and helpful. The old lady nurse/receptionist (white haired one as there is another slightly old lady there) was a rude ***** that was not kind or helpful at all. I chose not to get glasses there and just get an exam because of her. The selection of glasses wasn't that great either and the costs were pretty high even with my vision insurance. I arrived about 30 minutes before my appointment just because I figured there would be a wait and have to fill out paperwork, but was still there for about an hour after my appointment time. Do not put down your email address whenever you fill out forms because they immediately sell your information (without your permission) and you start getting spam emails.

name: Madison Inn & Suites
text: Still waiting on my contacts 1 1/2 month later called to check up on them and was told pretty much that they had no idea when they would arrive that the lady had just been there a week and was unable to tell me anything or any time frame???? Currently running around blind as a bat contacts paid for unsure if i will ever receive.  I will be looking for another eye doc.

name: Von Lang
text:
This place need to close there doors ASAP
The staff is not friendly, they have all old eye glasses frames and really don't like for you to bring in your frames.. I feel like I'm not getting a full eye exam because they're so behind with all the latest eye equipment that most eye doctors have now. I asked for my prescription from my eye exam and I didn't get one because they said it wasn't ready to come back tomorrow. I went back the next day and there was a sign on the door stating we're close and will return at 9:00 am.. I went back the next morning they were still closed with the same sign on the door.. I have already found me and my husband a real opthamologist.

name: Monica Smith
text: Great doctor. He was very efficient, and I can now see better than others have been able to get me to. Staff were friendly and helpful. Selection was small, but not bad.

name: Emily Worley
text: I work in a vision center nearby and was calling to confirm a poorly written rx. Online their hours stated they where open till noon. I began calling to get information at 11:13. It took about 7 minutes before they rang the line as busy or they hung up on me. I eventually got on all 3 of my instore phones to call them and let them know I’m serious I at least need to talk to an answering machine so I can get the info I need to help our mutual patient. The patient ended up taking the RX and decided to drive to the store because he thought it would be FASTER since they wouldn’t answer the phone. I’m very disappointed in the service they provide for their clients and the ability to work with other opticians for the patients benefit.

name: Lisa S
text: Please spare yourself the grief of going here.  I was happy with my eye exam, but the customer service is among the worst I've ever seen.  I ordered contacts and was told they would arrive within a week.  It's almost 6 weeks later, and I'm still waiting.  Last week, I got fed up (I probably could have walked them to my house from California faster) and requested a refund.  Yeah, I'm still waiting on that too.  No phone calls.  No apologies.  No shame.  I think small claims court will have to be my next option.  I don't even want to think about how this is going to mess me up with my FSA, as this is the last day of the year with no resolution.  A horrible, terrible, no good, very bad experience!

name: C. Davison
text: The worst place. Wish I had read the other reviews before my son went here to have his exam and contacts ordered. Been over a month and they say they have no record of his contacts ever being ordered every time I call. I can't even get them to email me his prescription so I can get the contacts elsewhere! Total incompetence, very rude staff. Do yourself a favor, go somewhere else!

name: Jesse Parker
text: Forced to come here for safety glasses by my employer. Terrible selection and was warned by a co-worker to research frames before hand. Went online to their website to see their selection and answered what seemed like a 50 question questionnaire which only resulted in a list of things I should discuss with the optometrist, not inventory to choose from! So frustrating and annoying off the bat. Upon arriving Family Vision said they could order frames I found online so long as it was through a mfg. that they dealt with, which was two different companies, since their selection was so horrific. So While my eyes were dialating I struggled on my phone to research the two Mfg's websites trying to find something I liked in the half hour I was there, while going legally blind from the dialation fluid...not ideal. My employer said they would cover $60 for frames so with that in mind I found a pair of frames that met those parameters and when I told the lady at the front desk which frames I wanted, she called the lab an confirmed that they carried them which I appreciated until she told me that they charged $105 for the $60 frames that I had found online meaning I would have to pay $45 out of pocket unnecessarily. I showed her the price from the mfg. online, on my phone, to which she replied "everybody's got to make a profit" ...which I understand but a 75%!!! Get the heck out of town. This place is a doc in a box, feels like a sham and when it comes to the pricing...they are a total con unless you want to walk out with some frames that look like something your great grandpa would wear in a machine shop back in the 1940's or in other words useless frames...the place just has a dark depressing vibe and stack of outdated wrinkled germy magazines. Just save yourself the trouble don't bother and run the other way. And whomever left the raving comments about this place are obviously employees trying to get the ratings up. Listen to the one star reviews.

name: Kristin Neve
text:
The past 4 years, I've had to go to this place if i wanted my insurance to pay for anything. 3 out of 3 times I've ordered & PRE-PAID for my contacts to be here in "a couple days, 2wks at the most if they're on back-order." That is a quote. After wearing my "trial pair" way past their use date, I was told about the contacts being on backorder (AGAIN). I mentioned that it was odd that each year I had a different brand, different type, etc., yet ALL of them were on backorder approximately 2+ mos. I didn't really get an answer other than, "that's just how it is." They're nice enough on the phone but there's something wrong. I'm tired of having to pay "up front" to not get what i really need & have been promised. I feel like I've been put on ignore & my calls aren't returned until i pick up the phone  & call them again 7-14 days later. The "oh yeah, I'll call you right back," has never happened. Not once. More than twice just makes it an "untruth," cuz at this point you KNOW you're not going to  call back. So if sounding nice to gets me off of your phone, then that's what happens. I am not overly sensitive, mean, entitled or rude. I think I treat others nicely. I certainly hope i do. I like to resolve problems assertively & nicely. I don't know why I've been treated so shabbily (in my opinion).
The only reason I left 3 stars was because the Dr. is nice. If it was all based on his performance, I'd leave 5 stars.

name: Dan Hollenbaugh
text: The doctor is surly and uses old-tech equipment.  The selection is small, they're overpriced, and it takes 2 weeks to get delivery.  I made a mistake going here, one I won't make again.

name: Duqstr's Garage
text: Says it closes at 5, Its 4:42 and the place is locked up and empty. Here to get more samples of the contacts that were ordered a month ago and still aren't here. If we ever get out contacts, we won't be able to back.

name: Mbrock
text: Awful!!! Dont see how they stays in business.  Very rude,slow, worst eye place I have ever been to. I would never recommend  this place to anyone .

name: Stephanie Karabaich
text: Took over a month to get my glasses in and then they had the prescription wrong which took another month to get back.

name: Bob The Trucker
text: I just want to say that this group of professionals have really got it right. Beautiful smiles🙂, friendly hearts and above and beyond customer service. I think they deserve more that 5 stars. So I will give them. 10 stars and 10 thumbs up. 👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼⭐️ ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️. God bless each and every one of you in your career and lives lavishly with grace, peace, wealth and good health. Sincerely from the bottom of my heart. Sincerely Prophet Bobadha Theophilus B.L. Brandon.😊

name: Richard Cox
text: This is for the vision center specifically. This was my second visit and the staff and Dr. are super friendly and knowledgeable. My glasses are great and were adjusted before they let me leave. So 5 star all around for them.

name: Liza McRae Bishop
text: Wonderful staff! Joshua Farmer was a fabulous help.

name: Dorothy Scott
text: Staff is friendly, knowledgeable, and responsive. Doctor Barnes is caring, knowledgeable, and really LISTENS! In this office, they are very accommodating and accept MOST (a LOT) Insurances. The office atmosphere itself is quite nice and very professional. In short, this is the BEST experience I’ve ever had in a medical professional’s office anywhere in my 60 plus years! If you need glasses, contacts, or a very thorough eye exam (where every detail is explained to you and plenty of time is given to ask questions and have them answered), this is the place for you!

resp.text: Hi Dorothy, thank you so much for your positive comments about EyeCare Associates! Please don't hesitate to reach out if there's anything additional we can do for you. Thank you again for leaving us this response!

name: Phyllis Detherage
text: Most thorough examination I've ever had. Dr. Barnes explains things well and easy to understand. Great overall check up. I really appreciate the optomap also. So much better  than the post dilation headache!

name: Angela Bryant
text: Been taking my daughter there for years. Staff is amazing and doctor will answer every question you have and accept almost all insurance. Only downside is they don't have them made the same day but definitely worth the wait!

name: 652 tbh
text: The EyeCare Associates on Bailey Creek Cir has an excellent staff of workers. They have a variety of stylish frames to choose from. They provide detailed information regarding your exam and the best options for your eye care needs. The atmosphere is professional and guess what, the staff workers actually smile. I highly recommend EyeCare Associates.

name: Paula Maestas
text: Everyone was really nice and very helpful. Dr. Barns is very caring and takes great care of his patients. I've made an appointment for my husband to go there also.

name: Annette Joplin
text: Loving the new people in there. Dr Barnes is great and actually takes the time to explain your eye appointment.  The girls are excellent and very friendly!

name: Susan Duthie
text: We really liked the knew eye doctor that took Dr. Winton's place.  We, also, like receiving text messages reminding us of our next appointment.  We plan to continue going there  in the future.

name: Sue MARTHA
text: Great experience! Always get my glasses there. Good experience with my eye exam. Would recommend this location & doctor to everyone!

name: Ashley Cabra
text: Dr. Winton is a great eye doctor for adults and kids! I took my 3 year old when he was having some issues and Dr. Winton made him feel so comfortable. My son actually enjoyed his visit and liked getting to see the equipment and talk to Dr. Winton. The goody bag at the end was probably his favorite though. :-)  I would reccomend Dr. Winton to anyone!

name: Lauren Harris
text: Dr. Winton is FABULOUS! He takes time to answer any and all questions you might have (even those unrelated to optical care), discusses every option and is simply the friendliest guy around. I would absolutely recommend him to anyone and any age!

name: Lesa Brahm
text: My whole family has been going to Dr. Winton for about 10 years.  He has a great bed-side manner.  His exams are thorough and he carefully explains everything he does and everything he sees.

name: Amanda Gocha
text: Staff and doctors are all amazing and friendly! Not sure if I would go again only because it’s been 16 days and still my glasses haven’t came in..

name: Sue MARTHA
text: Great experience! Always get my glasses there. Good experience with my eye exam. Would recommend this location & doctor to everyone!

name: Kathryn Weist
text:
They were able to see me within 15 minutes of me calling to say I was having an eye irritation.
(That was just how long it’d take me to get there.). Outstanding service!

name: Joanna Green
text: Great staff!! The doctor was great with my son.. great experience with hardly any wait time!!!

name: cathy elkins
text: I am impressed and thankful for the great service I received after breaking my new lens.  I will recommend you to my friends and family

name: Shaun Smith
text: Great staff at this place.  I really like Dr. Barnes, he is great at explaining things and spending time with you

name: Danielle Swearengin
text: Everyone was kind and friendly. Great service and attention was given by Dr Barnes and staff!

name: Amanda Gocha
text: Staff and doctors are all amazing and friendly! Not sure if I would go again only because it’s been 16 days and still my glasses haven’t came in..

My son actually enjoyed his visit and liked getting to see the equipment and talk to Dr. Winton. The goody bag at the end was probably his favorite though. :-)  I would reccomend Dr. Winton to anyone!

name: Lisa Matteson
text: Love these women!

name: Mandi Reliford
text: They was very polite

name: Doris Marsh
text: My visit was awesome

name: Gunars Cazers
text: The best place in Alabama to buy cool frames. I am a repeat customer. They have the best customer service, and during the pandemic they practiced safety with individual appointments only. This is not a big shop but they have very high-quality, designer frames that you will not find anywhere else. Check this place out!

name: TONI MCCAIN
text: I was glad to find this place near me before I sent my eyeglasses to be fixed at a mail in place I found online. I made an appointment the same day and Allison fixed my glasses perfectly, but the store I bought them from couldn't. She also put new nose guards on them. My son asked me to take his also and she fixed those, too. As I was getting ready to pay the store said they don't charge for the service, I couldn't believe it and still don't. Both were no charge. Ill take my eyeglass business here from now on. Also they do a 50% off every April on all frames. Putting that in my calendar. This sore has impeccable service.

name: bob maharrey
text: Fantastic selection. Locally owned. Great service. Comfortable atmosphere.

name: Joe Watts
text: They work hard to get the best looking glasses for you and stand behind their products. Super friendly folks. They are a great business to support!

name: Jeff Elliott
text:
Every time I cross their threshold I know I am about to receive the highest quality professional attention from the competent and charming staff of Iiis.

The attached pic is irrelevant but it's a great shot of 70's era Ray Ban Shooters.  Xtra large lenses, gold ring in the center, Delrin sweat bar and Comfort Cable temples.  I can't seem to find them anymore.

You also get to see the 70's haircut and mustache (Saturday Night Fever) and the interior of a '68 Mustang convertible with the top up.  How' bout them apples?

name: Julian Thomas
text: Best eye shop in Birmingham. Amazing customer service!

name: Edward Ashton
text: Extremely friendly and kind service: fixed a hinge/screw problem on my sunglasses (both pairs that I had with me!) in three minutes flat, and at what I can only say was an extremely fair rate, too. I VERY highly recommend them, and it's always best to support your neighborhood shop whenever possible. Don't hesitate to go to iiis; they will treat you right.

name: Brenna Johnson
text: Never disappointed when purchasing from iiis! I’ve bought several pairs here over the years, and Chris and her staff go above and beyond to find you the perfect pair. Hands down my favorite optical boutique!

name: Elizabeth Nix
text: I had the most ideal experience in iiis. I walked through the door and within two seconds I was immediately assisted with top notch service. iiis is my go-to from now on, no question!

name: mia fiterman
text: my favorite frames are from iii's! their selection is unique and hip!

name: Camilla Thompson
text: Owner is incredibly rude.  Didn't buy anything do to that fact so I can't speak to the quality of their items.  All I know is I won't be visiting there again so long as Kris owns it.

name: Allen Collins
text: Best eyewear store ever.

name: Brian W. Kittrell
text: Great selection of unique frames!

name: Arthur Tyner
text: Nice, expensive ,grade A SERVICE

name: Dale Eads
text: They have a great staff and have always been eager to help.

name: Christy Carden
text: I’ve always bought my contacts from them. Having trouble removing one and stopped in to get someone to “snatch” it out. 30 seconds or less of their time. They wanted to charge me for an office visit. I will take my business elsewhere from now on.

name: Nancy Lambert
text:
Absolutely love Dr Oleary!   He is very kind, considerate, compassionate about his job and very understanding of your needs and questions.   I highly recommend!!   I always have a great eye exam with all concerns and questions answered.
Also the office staff are awesome as well.  I usually order my contacts and glasses the same day and I am very pleased with those too.

resp.text: Thank you for your review! We look forward to serving you again!

name: Jason Carlton
text: The doctor was very nice, and my appointment was on time — I didn’t have to wait.  When I came out of getting my eye exam, Susan had already picked out several frames for me to try that she thought would work.   She was right.  She knew exactly what would look good on me, and I chose a frame in under 5 minutes — a process that usually takes me much longer.  Susan was well informed, and walked me through my options.  I would highly recommend this location, and will be directing friends there in the future.

resp.text: Hi! Thank you so much for your review. We are excited to hear that Susan was able to help make your experience in LensCrafters a great one. We look forward to seeing you again!

name: BMS RTR
text: Great experience. Dr. O'Leary is a very down to earth man. Comfortable experience. Susan was very helpful getting me squared away on my new sunglasses.

resp.text: Hi! Thank you so much for your review. We are excited to hear that Dr. O'Leary and Susan were able to help make your experience in LensCrafters a great one. We look forward to seeing you again!

name: Becca Carter
text:
Dr. O’Leary is the best there is! He always suggests the best options for each individual. And the whole LensCrafters team are great. Great customer service!
Tishana was very nice and helpful at my visit as well!

resp.text: Hello Becca, Thank you for your review! We are happy to hear from another satisfied LensCrafters customer. We strive to provide the best glasses and customer service in the optical industry. We hope to see you again!

name: Kat Ficklin
text: Wonderful service 😃. This time needed my glasses adjusted. Service was super fast. Thank you LensCrafters.

resp.text: Thank you for your review! Our associates strive to provide the best possible service. We are happy to hear about your positive experience and look forward to seeing you again!

name: Jordan Campbell
text: It was great! Dr. O'leary was so amazing. He was patient and explained everything as we went through it. I haven't been to an Optometrist in 6 years. He made it so easy. Great staff, great atmosphere. Loved it!

resp.text: Hi! Thank you so much for your review. We are excited to hear Dr. O'leary was able to help make your experience in LensCrafters a great one. We look forward to seeing you again!

name: Kathy Roskam
text: Visiting from out of town and Susan at the Lens Crafters in Trussville AL were kind, quick and efficient when they adjusted my glasses:). Kathy

name: Jamias Hearts
text: This was an amazing experience! The workers were so helpful and kind, would always come back here! Miss Susan helped us out and it was amazing.

resp.text: Hi! Thank you so much for your review. We are excited to hear Miss Susan was able to help make your experience in LensCrafters a great one. We look forward to seeing you again!

name: Tracy Johns
text: Tishana (I’m probably spelling this wrong, so sorry) and Susan were wonderful to work with today. They both did their job wonderfully as well as being friendly and engaging. Dr O’Leary was great also!  Highly recommend this location and these young ladies if you need glasses!!

resp.text: Thank you for your review. Our associates are some of the best around and we are always happy to hear our customers feel the same!

name: Debi Strickland
text: Friendly staff. Very accommodating. Sincerely wanted to make sure I got the very best treatment and service.   Tishana was knowledgeable, experienced and dedicated to making sure I could see.

resp.text: Hi! Thank you so much for your review. We are excited to hear Tishana was able to help make your experience in LensCrafters a great one. We look forward to seeing you again!

name: Dana Smith
text: I was blown away by the Doc and the staff! They were amazing!!! The exam was very thorough and all my questions were answered and the doc actually listened to my concerns and re-assured me! Thank you!

resp.text: Thank you for your review! Our associates strive to provide the best possible service. We are happy to hear about your positive experience and look forward to serving you again!

name: Sean H
text: I had a great experience working with Tishana today. She was very helpful and knowledgeable. I will be back! Thank you.

resp.text: Hi! Thank you so much for your review. We are excited to hear Tishana was able to help make your experience in LensCrafters a great one. We look forward to seeing you again!

name: Kim Hayward
text: The staff is always friendly and helpful at the Trussville location.  Susan was great!  Thanks so much!

resp.text: Thank you for your review! Our associates strive to provide the best possible service. We are happy to hear about your positive experience and look forward to serving you again!

text:
Teresa replaced my nose pads for free with no questions asked

Thank You

resp.text: Hi! Thank you so much for your review. We are excited to hear Teresa was able to help make your experience in LensCrafters a great one. We look forward to seeing you again!

name: Lenore Como
text: Excellent service. Knowledgeable staff who were friendly, helpful and kind.

resp.text: Thank you for your review! Our associates strive to provide the best possible service. We are happy to hear about your positive experience and look forward to serving you again!

name: Julia Smalley
text: The entire staff was the nicest and most caring people I've been around in the health industry! They took their time and were very sweet. The building itself was super beautiful and very clean inside, They took the needed precautions for covid and made sure everything was super clean.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review. Our associates are some of the best around and we are always happy to hear our customers feel the same! 🤓

name: justin parker
text:
It saddens me to give this place one star after my first visit being so great and staff was so nice and helpful.
I called back after initial visit to get prescription and pupil distance for my safety glasses to be ordered at my job. They first told me they did not do pupil distance! Then when my safety director at my job called they were so rude to her and refused to disclose the info over the phone! They made me drive to the location at get the info. Once I arrived they rushed me out and would not even give me the proper info I was asking for and not to mention entire staff was rude while I stood there waiting to be helped it was a very hostile environment! I don’t use this word a lot but I absolutely hate this place for how I was treated!

resp.text: Hello Justin, thank you so much for sharing your experience. At LensCrafters our goal is to set the standard in quality in eye care and eyewear by ensuring every patient and customer has the best experience in every location every time. We apologize that we did not exceed your expectations during your visit. We value our customer’s feedback!  Please go to https://www.luxotticacustomercare.com/lenscrafters to provide your information so we can contact you and work to resolve the issue.

text: Tishana at the Trussville location was wonderful so patient and helpful ! I will definitely be back partly because I can’t see 😂but the service has been impeccable 🙌🏼

name: Mark Dale
text:
Had a nice experience getting my prescription yet a horrible experience after I received my glasses.
I went in March 2017 to get glasses. They broke 3 months later. I had purchased the insurance to cover breakage so I thought no issue, they will cover it. Yes they would repair them with a $100 deductible!!!!
“What deductible?” I said. “You never told me if a deductible or I would have not purchased it!” Then they asked how I took off my glasses and said I should have taken them off by the nose piece! “What??!!” “You never told me this!”
I walked out after asking for a manager, oops there was not one that day all day, go figure.
I spread the word every day when people ask why I use two pairs of glasses of what bad service I had by this store.
Ridiculous bad customer service and snotty attitude when you need help.
Reminds me of a used car salesman.
DO NIT VISIT THIS STORE!

resp.text: Hi Mark, thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear about your experience. We aim to consistently meet and surpass customers' expectations. Please go tohttp://bit.ly/2Di26GQ so we can follow up with you directly.

text: I had such a great experience at this location today. I came in with my 4 month old so that I could get some new glasses. The staff was immediately so sweet about my child. A lot of places are not thrilled to see a baby in their business but lens crafters was great with it. The staff was knowledgeable and friendly and I really believe I got a good deal on my glasses.

text: Used Lenscrafters for years, but it is not the same anymore.  Multiple problems and customer service deteriorated significantly. It turned out that the last pair of glasses purchased from Lenscrafters  (ones I have been currently wearing) were too small and that is why they have been giving me headaches and digging into my skull.  Customer service at the competitor is five stars and very reasonably priced.  Goodbye and good riddance Lenscrafters.

text: Bought an expensive Brooks Brothers glasses in May 2016 from Lens Crafters. I've traded with them for years. Went by their store in Trussville, AL today (Feb. 2017) because of loose frames, and they said to be repaired I had to have new glasses (lens & fames).  I cannot fork out another $700 when my lenses are perfectly fine.  I just need the frame fixed.  This doesn't make any sense.  I don't think they know what they are doing. I would not be trading with them again after purchasing a multiple number of glasses over a 25 year period.

Lenscrafters told me since i didn't purchase an additional warranty the only thing i could do was buy new lenses at full cost.  Glasses bought at different vendors lasted much longer than the four months at Lenscrafters.  I will not use Lenscrafters again. Every step of the process was a struggle.

name: Paul Jackson
text: The staff was friendly and Dr. Elkins was personable and knowledgeable.  However, they added a lot of extra things to the lenses that ran the price way up.  When I got the glasses, they had the prescription wrong.  I took them back and they were going to redo them.  I told them how the close up prescription needed to be adjusted but they said it would be too much and ordered them like they wanted.  I called when I hadn't heard in a couple weeks and they had forgotten to send them off.    When they came in, it was just the lenses and no frames.  They didn't have the frames in stock so they would have to order them.  I live two hours from the office and didn't want to make yet another trip so they said they would mail them to me.  When I got them today, they should have listened to me as the focal point is still too close.  I've had five interactions with them and have been dissatisfied with all five.  They are very nice, but can't seem to get things done right.

resp.text: Paul, I'm Cassie. I'm so sorry to hear we haven't been able to get your glasses right for you yet! It's so frustrating when you've tried to communicate what you need and it hasn't been heard. I've passed your concerns on to our management team and they would like to reach out to you -- when you have a moment, could you please email me at cassiegoodwin@eyecare-partners.com? Again, I'm so sorry to hear about dropping the ball for you. I hope to hear from you soon.

name: Brenda Massey
text:
I went to this Dr.   About 2 years ago. My glasses were like 500.00 with insurance. I thought that was way to much. Well went back for ck up. 2 years later. I was told I had
Over paid last time by 150.00 . So  I ordered more glasses.  Well I changed my mind. And told them to cancel the order. Mind u it was like 30 min. Later. They told me the could not refund my money for 2 weeks. Well 2 weeks later I got the 150.00 they owned me FOR 2 YEARS WITH OUT INTEREST.  and its been about 6 weeks and still the 170.00 has not ben sent to me. DON'T GO TO THESES PEOPLE THEY WILL TAKE YOU MONEY. AND NOT GIVE IT BACK.  I'VE CALLED THEM EVERY 2 WEEKS AND STILL NO MONEY. I'VE NEVER HAD A DR. KEEP OVER PAYMENT.  FOR 2 YEARS. IF I OVER PAY. THE DR. WILL SEND IT AT THE END OF THE YEAR. WHEN THEY COLSE THE BOOKS FOR THE YEAR. SO U CAN'T TRUST THESE PEOPLE.  THE LADY CONTACTED ME AND TOLD ME THE HAD MONEY AND THEY WOULD SEND IT BACK WHEN THEY GOT AROUND TO IT .WOULD DON'T GIVE A DATE. ... SHE WAS VERY RUDE I TOLD HER I WOULD PUT IT ON THE POST IT . SHE SAID WE DON'T CARE.  DON'T GIVE THEM YOUR MONEY......

When you have a moment - please email me at kaitlyngibson@eyecare-partners.com. Again, I apologize and I look forward to hearing from you.

text: All are amazing, caring, talented professionals! Plainly the best, period!

name: brian doyle
text: My recent purchase of two reading glasses and one pair of sunglasses was a surprising and most pleasant experience.  Ashley compared the two current promotions to find me the very best price.  Then, several days later, I received a call that my glasses had arrived, but Eyecare Associates had rejected them after inspection and had ordered a new fabrication.  Wow!  Just a few days after that, I went to pick up my new remakes.  I was not satisfied with the field of vision they offered, and Ashley showed me the three types of lenses available.   I selected a set with a broader field of vision and, in spite of the $80 increase each of the three sets would entail, placed my order.  The next day, Ashley called to tell me she had discussed my case with the manager, and they had decided to wave all further fees, so these three new pairs would be free!   Double-wow!   I was impressed and, frankly, touched by the empathy, attention, personal concern, and expert service I received from Eyecare Associates.    EA went out of their way and beyond all my expectations to insure a fair and positive experience for me, and I simply cannot recommend them enough!  Definitely be my go-to eye care specialists from now on.

name: therainman 23
text: I really enjoyed my visit. I felt comfortable and the customer service was amazing. V was very friendly and informative also the Doctor was extremely thorough and took his time examining my eyes. I will definitely recommend EyeCare Associates to friends and Family.

text: Doctor Elkins and staff are welcoming, very helpful, and kind! We had a great overall experience from beginning to end. Thank you so much!

name: Dianne Miller
text:
Due to a series of mistakes, I found myself in Daphne AL with no contacts, eye glasses, and an empty  right eye of the necessary contact.  I have terrible eyesight with my right eye being a -8.50. It is very difficult to find any eye MD who has this contact in stock.  Note this is the Friday before 2018 New Year and have to drive back to ATLANTA GA.  Called my home eye MD, who is part of the EyeCare network. They suggested I try contacting EyeCare Associates in the area.  This recommendation led me here.

Ashley, in Dr. Glusman's office, was so helpful, pleasant, & professional.  They saved my life by having in stock a -8.50 contact!!  If I lived in this area, I would definitely make this EyeCare center my home for all my eye needs.  I am so grateful for their assistance.  Thank you, thank you!

text: frauds.  The eye doctor is great, but they are yet another medical company taking advantage of people that have insurance.  if you pay case the over priced glass frames are 50% off. if you have insurance you have to pay $350 or more for frames then after you insurance allowance you end up paying the same amount as someone with out insurance. its unethical and they should be shut down or penalized for this.  do not go here.

name: Carrie Blocker
text:
I was disappointed because we’d used them in the past and been satisfied with service. This transaction was not a good one, and we will not be returning.
Upon entering, we were met with grumpiness as if we were inconveniencing the staff. Coming in simply for a lens update, i anticipated an easy interaction. No one directed us and once we finally spoke with someone, she acted as if we should know the policies. We had to schedule an appointment to come back just to have lenses replaced. So i scheduled for their next open slot (almost a week later).
We were met with the same attitude upon our appointment and went through the whole process of ordering. As i was about to pay, we were informed that the glasses would have to be shipped out and so my daughter would not have glasses for the next 2 weeks. Unacceptable. I canceled the order and we left to seek better options elsewhere… which we found with smiles and a lower price tag.

resp.text: Carrie, I'm Cassie. I'm so sorry to hear about your experience getting glasses in our office -- that's definitely not what we want for you! I'd like to look into why this happened. Could you please email me at cassiegoodwin@eyecare-partners.com when you have a moment? Again, I'm very sorry about this. I hope to hear from you soon.

text: Liz was the most AMAZING,calming, professional person I could've asked for. She did everything possible to make me comfortable and calm my anxiety I having about my eye issues. Dr Jackson did a great job explaining everything In detail and made me feel so much more at ease then when I walked in. Every fear I had about my eyes, he explained in detail why I shouldn't worry about them and that I was going to be ok. I would HIGHLY RECOMMEND. I now have myself and children as patients. ❤️

text: I was welcomed when I entered the front door.  The medical technician, Regina, did an excellent job taking in all the information and adjusting the equipment before the doctor entered.  Dr. Harris examined me, informed me of any current or future problems, and made some slight corrections to my contact lens' prescription.  All in all, a very pleasant, professional visit.

name: Dyisha Lewis
text: I first visited Dr. Harris let February and that’s when I found out my retina had detached and he immediately reached out to one of his colleagues and I received the surgery immediately! It’s been a year and I went for a regular appointment with De. Harris and loved the visit! Nice atmosphere and they really care about their patients. I would definitely recommend them!

name: Whitney Taylor
text: Dr. Jackson is the most amazing physician I have met. I am a nurse and I work with a lot of physicians. But what sets Dr. Jackson apart is that he cares about his patients and sympathizes with us. He teaches beyond just eyes. 🥰

name: Kendra Miller
text: They made us wait in the waiting room for an hour before finally bringing us to the room where we then sat for another hour. So by the time we had left we had been there for 2 1/2 hours. And I'm not really sure I trust the opinion of the Dr as some things he said didn't make sense.

text: Dr. Jackson was so professional and knowledgeable not just about eyes but medicine in general.  He gave great advice and listened to and acknowledged my ever concern.  His staff was great 👍🏽

I would recommend Eyecare Associates on Vaughn Road in Montgomery, Alabama to anyone who were interested in a safe, responsible and friendly eye care team. text: They have all their COVID protocols worked out, so things progressed very smoothly.  No serious waiting involved.  Dr Harris was kind, courteous and always a pleasant conversationalist.  The texting of reminders prior to the appointment and the follow up afterwards were concise, well timed and with a light-touch.  After 15 years we still remain satisfied customers.  So, go check them out.

text: I have been going to Dr. Harris for so many years.  They are always very clean and so very kind.  They are always ready to assist you in a timely manner.

name: salina coleman
text: Dr. Jackson and his nurse was Awesome!! The whole place was a pleasure to be in the midst of.

name: Emily S
text: Both my husband and I felt like we were just a commissions check to this office. The initial welcome from the receptionist was cold and annoyed. We spent 3 hours apiece here to get contacts (him) and glasses/contacts (me) and walked out spending far more than usual. Being a new patient from out of town I would have expected more of a consultation from the doctor before just throwing me into contacts. I was only able to wear each contact set for 2-3 hours before having to take them out because they were green. When I called the office to express my concern the only thing they said was to use contact solution not tap water. (Who does that anyways?! Tap water?) I’m sorry I’ve worn contacts before and have never had them turn green. So there’s a contact fitting co-pay wasted and not refunded. It’s been a solid 2 weeks since ordering my glasses (should have been 7-10 business days) I called twice to get an update and get transferred to a voicemail with no response (24-48 hours right?). When I went looking for new frames the person helping me knew my insurance budget and pulled frames almost double my budget rather than asking me what I felt comfortable spending. She also picked frames that were extremely outside of my current shape, style,  and comfort zone. All and all I probably will find a different office for us next year simply because the lack of care, communication, and consultation.

resp.text: Emily, I'm Cassie. I'm so sorry to hear about your experience in our office. It's so frustrating when you don't feel heard! We strive to provide excellent care for every patient, and we obviously fell short for you and your husband. I've spoken to our management team about your concerns and they would like to reach out to you. Could you please email me at cassiegoodwin@eyecare-partners.com when you have a moment? Again, I'm so sorry to hear about this. I hope to hear from you soon.

name: tom reinhardt
text: You all were extremely helpful especially the sweet women at the front desk as she could tell I was in pain and cared enough to stop what she was doing and get me some numbing eye drops and put them in for me to help sooth the pain it was such a relief and really a blessing knowing that there is still at least one practice that has caring and loving staff or employees that care about their patients and don't treat them as a number on a clip board! And that can mean a lot to a patient like myself! For me I lost my mother when I was 11 And when I came into EyeCare Associates they made me feel right at home like their on son and made me feel like I had two moms behind the front desk. :) Thank y’all for all of your help, care and concern! And I LOOK forward to seeing you all again soon! :)

name: Michelle Spell
text: Thank you Dr. Harris and all the staff for providing a personable and professional environment.

I am not upset to be changing doctor offices because the staff here is either too busy or has bad customer service. I have called several times in the past and no one would ever call me back on more than one issue. I think the doctors are good, but the support staff needs some coaching for sure.

resp.text: Hi Ashlee, my name is Katie. I am so sorry to hear about your experience with us! I would like to forward this to management. When you have a moment, please email me at kaitlyngibson@eyecare-partners.com. Again, I apologize and I look forward to hearing from you.

name: Cody H
text: Dr Harris was great! He was patient despite it being a very busy day and I really felt appreciated. I will definitely visit again for eye exams and I have already recommended him to my family.

name: Berniece Pierce
text:
I had my appointment on Wednesday, 10 July 2013. I normally see either Dr. Harris or Dr. Jackson. On this visit I was seen by Doctor Fredrick Jackson and it was a truly amazing experience. Everyone was extremely courteous and friendly. I was really impressed with Dr. Jackson on this occasion. He took his time explaining everything he was doing and why he was doing it. His explanations and genuine concern went a long way in putting my fears to rest. He not only took an interest in my eye health, but he was also very forthcoming with sharing some possible solutions to other areas of my overall health that could potentially affect my eye health. He offered some possible solutions to help with bouts of vertigo I have been experiencing for a couple of years now. He suggested some things that I could try to help to minimize the severity of the migraine headaches that I have been suffering for more than thirty years. No one else had ever made the suggestions to me that he did. I can't wait to put them into practice to see if they will help even the tiniest little bit. Thanks, Dr. Jackson, for one of the most enjoyable appointments I have ever had. And trust me, I will make sure that you are highly recommended to everyone that I know who needs a good optometrist. Keep up the good work.

Had my yearly exam on February 4, 2015 and must say that it was a very interesting experience. Even though the wait time was a few minutes past my appointment time, I clearly understand why. The doctors spend as much time as needed with each patient and I realize that I will get the same type of treatment when it is my turn. Also, Dr. Harris' staff are extremely kind, considerate, and compassionate. I just love Dr. Harris to death (no offense Dr. Jackson, I love you, too). Even though he informed me that I have cataracts, he took the time to explain all of my options and shared his experiences with his father's surgery. I left the office feeling very good and felt that Dr. Harris had provided me with all the information that I needed to make a decision. Once I made the decision, he even scheduled an appointment for me--talk about the personal touch approach. I would highly recommend Primary Eyecare Associates to anyone. As a matter of fact, my entire family uses Primary Eyecare Associates. So, if you are looking for a good eye care center and optometrist, give them a call, THEY ARE THE BEST I have ever used. KEEP DOING WHAT YOU ARE DOING.

name: Lenny Samford
text: Have been using them for years. Very professional and courteous staff. Dr. Jackson is always very patient and thorough. He takes time to explain everything to you. I highly recommend them.

name: DDB Pollard
text: Dr. Tim Harris is the best! The staff are all friendly and professional! I always leave feeling confident that I received the absolute best in vision care!!

text: The office staff is very polite, friendly, and professional. Dr. Jackson is awesome.  He took care of all my eye care issues. He answered all my questions. I really liked Dr Harris, too. He was friendly and knowledgeable. He tweaked my contact prescription and I'm seeing much better now!  I will definitely recommend your office.  Kudos to all the friendly staff.

name: SHEILAH TIBBS
text:
I have been a patient for over 20 years with Primary Eye Care.  Dr. Jackson and Dr. Harris as well as all the doctors are very educated in their field.  For years I suffered with Dry Eye and with the help of Dr. Jackson and the patient care I am given this issue has been greatly resolved. I also had Lasik Surgery around 10 years ago with excellent results.  And today I am still seeing 20/20, I have had no regression in my vision.

Dr. Jackson is a very caring doctor, he not only cares about your vision he cares about your overall health.  Your health and medications are very important part of his exam.

Dr. Harris is very caring as well concerning you overall health.  He has a free spirit and your vision and how well you see is extremely important.

I would not go anywhere else for mine or my family's eye care.
When I leave I know they as well as myself have been give the utmost care as possible. And an exam that surpasses all others.

I thank them greatly for their compassion and care I am given.

I also work for these doctors and I personally know and see first hand the care that our patients are given.  Your optical needs are as important as your eye exam.  If its not right they will do everything possible to make things right and see you are satisfied. Your Vision is their main Focus.

text: I've never had to feel nervous about the meds that dilate your eyes. The tech makes you feel like you are special and he/she displays professionalism. At the check-out desk, you are given the glasses purposed for dilation of the eyes. I really enjoyed my experience at Eye Care Associates.

text: Had my annual eye exam this week at Primary Eyecare Associates. Dr. Jackson is the best, wouldn't trade him for another one. He is very polite and knowledgeable of his profession.Would HIGHLY recommend this practice to anyone who's looking for an Ophthalmologist or is new to the area.

name: Caro Stanford
text: I have been going here at least 10 years for my eye care needs. The staff is always super sweet and nice. Today is the first time I had a bad experience. The Dr. that I had always seen was gone so I was seen by a Dr. Jackson. For the most part he was professional. Until I inquired about Lasik eye surgery. I'm 24 and was told I was a good candidate for the program but I am under the age requirement. But more importantly I was offended when he said and I'm paraphrasing "People your age usually can't afford it. And if so it's BC their grandparents pay for it". I was offended and felt that comment was unprofessional and uncalled for.

name: Carol Roberts
text: I've been going to Dr. Harris for over 20 years, since their office was on Atlanta Highway. Then they moved to Carmichael, which was fine. Then they moved way out past Thorington Road, which is a pain, but I still go there. I've always been happy with the service in their office. A couple of years ago it seems they were bought out by some company that requires them to over schedule people and causes some very long waits. My last two appointments have run nearly an hour late. But the doctors and staff are still very nice and we get good quality glasses there.

name: Rose Cottrell
text: I have been going to Dr. Jackson and Dr. Harris for years and I've had several surgeries done on my eyes, they are both very professional and very knowledgeable in their field. The staff is great also and yes I will continue to refer them.

(Translated by Google) Best ophthalmology !!!
I went to a few places in Montgomery and finally decided to go here
The friendly staff and, above all, have the time to kindly explain the patient's questions and diagnosis. I'm meeting Fredrick Jackson.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review -- we're so glad you enjoyed your experience!

name: Tasha Wiley
text: I've been a patient of Dr. David Parker's for approx 20 years.  The level of care I have received at Madison Eye Care Center is TOP NOTCH.  He's always caring and attentive, and the staff - from front desk to check out - has always been exceptional.  I wanted to write this review today, however, to highlight an experience I had last week while traveling to the beach.  I arrived at my destination only to discover I'd made a terrible mistake and had forgotten my contacts.  When I called the office, I had my Rx in-hand within 4 minutes.  When I contacted the closest eye care facility, I was told they didn't have my brand of contacts on-hand & asked if I could possibly get my doc to authorize a diff brand.  When I called back to Madison Eye Care Center, Delana went above and beyond and offered to call the eye care facility at the beach for me to figure out a solution.  Once she'd done so, she called me back to let me know what to expect since these lenses may feel a bit different that my usuals.  I had contacts in-hand within 20 minutes of calling Madison Eye Care Center & Delana basically saved my vacation!  :) Just cannot recommend this practice enough!!

name: Timothee Howland
text: Never experienced such intentional, consistent, across the board at every station, level of imposed feeling of being special, important, attended to, cared for, cared about, listened to, spoken to, spoken to pleasantly, spoken to genuously - no exceptions, every single of the 4 women who moved me through "the system".  I came out of the machine not feeling like a cog! Again. 3rd time in 2 months.  Repeatable with machine precision. Real people.

name: Olesia Bodnaruk
text: Very good clinic, friendly and welcoming  staff. Want to highly recommend Dr.Michael.St.Peter.He was  helping to my  9 year old son .Dr.St.Peter was very professional, kind,he takes time to explain everything in a small details.My son was very excited and feels comfortable during the all visit at clinic. Very thankful to Dr.St.Peter.

name: Avery Beckham
text: So helpful, informative, and super professional! Thank you, Delaina!!

name: Marcie McAlister
text: My daughter took my autistic granddaughter to this office. Due to unforeseen circumstances that often arise with autistic children. My daughter was 8 minutes late arriving. The doctor refused to see my 3 year old granddaughter. The staff was rude and so inconsiderate. It was very disheartening. It was such a disappointing experience.

resp.text: Madison Eye Care Center is happy to work with patients whenever possible. However, as a courtesy to all our patients, when a patient is 15 minutes or more late to his/her appointment we may request to reschedule to another day. Each patient is important to us and we do not want to rush the time spent with a patient because he or she was late. Madison Eye Care Center wants to provide devoted time to every patient and believe we can only provide the personalized care our patients have come to expect by dedicating their scheduled appointment times to them. We will gladly work with your individual needs to provide the best possible care in a timely manner. For individual assistance, information about scheduling or other specific appointment needs, please contact the office manager of Madison Eye Care Center.

name: Leachea Johnson-Wood
text: Not happy with my "bent" glasses AT ALL and I believe they were getting impatient with me after my 4th reshaping request.  I overheard the lady whispering to the other lady as if they were discussing being frustrated with me.  I gave up.  Paid $1200 for appt., and glasses I couldn't use.  Just went to America's Best and the doctor there said those glasses needed to be thrown in the garbage they were so messed up in the way the frames were bent and the bifocals were so screwed up.  That there was no way possible to have clear vision through those lenses. Won't ever go there again.

name: Cindy Phillips
text: This is a wonderful practice! Everyone is so friendly and the in office wait time is short.  I truly feel like family when I come in for my appointments! I never feel rushed and they make sure to answer all my questions and concerns and always tell me what my insurance will cover and not so no surprise bills which is going above and beyond these days!

name: mandi hunt
text: I highly recommend Madison Eye Care Center. Dr. Newby was kind enough to respond to my needs during her off hours. She was also attentive enough to follow-up later in the day regarding my progress. She treated me like she would treat friends or family. I am very impressed with the service.

name: McKenna Gibson
text: My first visit with Madison Eye Center was so pleasant. The team is very welcoming and professional. I came here to see Dr. St. Peter - he takes the time to explain everything and makes sure my concerns are addressed. Very thankful to have found such a wonderful place for my family’s eye care!

name: Sarah Price
text: The office staff and doctors are always very professional and welcoming! I always feel like they truly care about what I have to say and they treat me like family. They have a ton of options for glasses and my husband really likes his sunglasses from here too.

name: Truett Leach
text:
I've been with them for 3ish years. My mother has been with them much longer. All of the staff are incredibly sweet and nice. Every time I come in it's nothing but laughs and a good time from the staff and extremely informative sessions with the Doc's.

Let these folks deal with your eyeballs. You won't regret it.

name: Jordan P
text: Without a doubt, the best optometrist I've seen. The doctors are very knowledgable and explain everything in an easily understandable way. The rest of the staff is very kind and professional. I would strongly recommend this office to anyone!

name: Dan Ford
text: It is my pleasure to give the staff at Madison Eye Care Center the highest possible recommendation.  I've not had such good vision in decades. Dr. Parker fitted me with the latest technology in corrective lens and I'm totally amazed at how well I can see. With their knowledge, state of the art technology and equipment, I am now blessed with excellent vision that, at age 68, I never expected to have again. Everyone is very friendly. In fact, I've told neighbors that it's as if each visit to their office is like a family reunion.

name: denise payne
text:
Love Dr. David Parker!  He is great!
BUT do not purchase your glasses or sunglasses from this location.  If you get Maui Jim's from Maui Jim, they are returnable.  Not the case, if you purchase from here.  This is not my first negative experience with glasses from this location but I can promise it will be my last as I will not purchase anything from here again.

name: Susie Averitt
text: The care I received from Dr. Parker was top notch. He went above and beyond to ensure that I received the best solution for my circumstances. The technicians and staff are also amazing. I highly recommend Dr. Parker and Madison Eye Care Center.

name: Anna Morgan
text:
Dr. David Parker is Top Notch and 5 star in every way.  They care about their patients and are professional while being personable.
Our entire family does to them for eye care and we are never disappointed with the time, care, and approach they take with each patient.  Their office staff is friendly, knowledgeable, and professional.
I would gladly recommend them to anyone looking for fabulous eye care.

Even when there was great concern with an unusual retina problem in one of my eyes, David was empathetic, honest, and up front with his findings.  He took a lot of time explaining what the condition was, how to proceed from his office to the office of a retina specialist and explained why he chose the specialist he did.

name: Jenny Lovell
text: LOVE Dr. Michelle Parker! Wonderful staff as well! Always very attentive to our needs. Super sweet to both of my boys. She really takes her time in making sure we fully understand everything. Building is very nice and clean! The guy in the eye glass shop is VERY helpfull! They have the best quality frame selection around! Thanks for taking such great care of our eyes!

name: Kathy Spurgeon
text: This is a great place to get all of your eye care needs. Go by and let the great staff take good care of you.

name: Michele Chalmers
text: I can't say enough about Madison Eye Care Center.  Dr. Parker and his staff stayed after hours because I was having issues with my eye and helped figure out what the problem was.  Their staff is always so friendly and good with all three of my children, including one who has special needs.  I will never change to another eye care center.  Thank you so much.

name: Justin Z
text: I've been to several eye care places over the years & these folks keep a clean place & are very friendly. Where they lost me is at the up sales of contact lenses. My wife & I felt like we were at some sort of car sale & we were finagled into buying the "premium" vehicle (but with a rebate). The "premium" lenses we were talked into honestly didn't seem any better than the "standard"  ones we've had for years. Seems an odd way to do business in the eye industry but I guess money talks for some!

name: Ray Hensley
text: There are a lot of eye clinics around the area but none better nor more friendly than Madison Care Center.  I have been going there ever since they first started the business and have never had less than superb care.  Both David and Michelle give the most through, caring and best explained eye exam and eye care that I have ever received.  To me they are the only place I take my eyes.  Staff there will meet you with a smile and do all they possibly can to insure you have everything you need or want.  It is always a pleasure to visit the Parker's as they are unique and grounded in personal care for their patients.  If you have not been there and experienced what life should be like, well give them a shot and I promise you wont be disappointing. Michelle is my personal preference as she has such a wonderful personality and I am not taking away from David as he does too but you judge when you meet them.  .

name: Anna Mitchell
text: Amazing office, wonderful doctors, and excellent selection of glasses and sunglasses.  I have referred family and friends to the office and everyone has been pleased.  The are also wonderful with working with my 4 year old.

name: blake whitlow
text: Dr. Tracy Swartz is a wonderful eye doctor that I was paired with when I came in on an emergency visit on a Friday.  She came back in on two of her off days when the office was closed because of her commitment to her patients.  The care I receive was great above and beyond what I expected.  I would refer anyone in the area to her.

name: Charlie Crowe
text:
I needed an emergency visit on Friday. They accommodated me quickly. Dr. Tracy Swartz quickly diagnosed an eye infection that my GP incorrectly diagnosed/treated. Dr. Swartz came in on Saturday to check-up on me.

Extremely knowledgeable, courteous, and accommodating. We have found a new optometrist.

Also, very impressed with the doctors and the administrative staff's understanding of insurance. Their knowledge saved me a lot of money.

name: Kim Backer
text: Dr. Parker and his team go above and beyond to care for their patients. I wouldn’t go anywhere else for my optical needs.

name: Karen Turnage
text: The doctors and staff and great. Dr. Swartz has to be one of the smartest people I have met. The wait time is usually around 5 minutes. I would highly recommend them. I only docked them a star because the GLASSES WERE TOO EXPENSIVE. I have purchased quality glasses elsewhere (not Walmart nor Target) and paid half the amount I paid here. My recommendation is to see the doctors for an exam. PURCHASE YOUR GLASSES SOME PLACE LESS EXPENSIVE. Shop around before you purchase, especially if you have a high prescription.

name: John Bell II
text: DR. David Parker, is a GREAT OPTOMETRIST. His staff is very helpful and professional. I was impressed with my interaction with Optometry Technician , J.T. and the Office Manager , Delana. They were well versed in their optometry / customer service skills.  J.T. explained every step of the exam to my youngest child and put him at ease over what the eye exam would consist of and how the machinery worked.  Thanks to all of the employees at Madison Eye Care Center, L.L.C. Where they live by their motto, "Our Focus Is On You"

name: Sherry Rush
text: The doctor was terrific.  However, the office staff is lacking and unprofessional.  The office manager laughed at my concern and argued with me over the phone.  I have never been so upset.  The rude comments hurt my feelings.

name: Glen Hiller
text: Not my best "life" moment but i literally stabbed myself in the eye with a manila folder and cut my cornea. I have never been to an eye doctor before so i was just guessing this would be a good place to stop...literally a blind decision...Pun intended. Dr. Parker was about to walk out the door and they worked me in at 5pm on a busy weekday. He was extremely accommodating and both of my follow ups i was in and out with minimal wait time. They keep their schedule true and do not appear to overbook. They also were very knowledgeable on how to work the insurance system so my BCBS would cover my injury.  If your looking for an eye doctor in the Madison area i HIGHLY recommend them. Excellent experience.

name: Nicholas Nicholas
text: Nice , Clean , Professional. The staff hear are very friendly.

name: Masao Williams
text: Outstanding service

name: Kristie B
text: Doctors are okay, office staff is unprofessional and inconsistent. Billing is never the same, when I asked about a specific office visit charge that was different on two different dates, the answer I received was it depended  on who keyed it in and if they were giving a courtesy discount.

name: gail moore
text: The dr. is good but the customer care is terrible. I used this place years ago it was great but there's only one young lady in there that seems to like her job and should work in a public setting.

text: The Doctors here were okay I guess I mean one almost made me have to get my eye removed DAMN YOU. When I told them I didn't like my glasses they said then throw them away I told them I had paid $150 for them I was very very sad so then I asked for contacts then he told I couldn't do it

text: Excellent, professional, but expensive.

text: This is a great location. My eyes have never been good, but I want to thank Trevor for giving me kind and wholesome advice while pointing me in the right direction to getting my prescription filled in a timely manner. I have never met this person but he treated me like visually-impaired family and is an excellent representative for the location, as well as the Walmart brand in it's entirety.

name: Tonya Myrick
text: Went there yesterday to attempt to place an order for contacts, which I’m new to wearing and the lady there was so rude and ugly. I won’t be taking my business there after all. This is really surprising coming from Walmart... I thought customer service was a priority and that made them stand out. Not so much anymore.

name: april McKinley
text: Call to make appointment and they don't even have a freaking doctor...

name: Sydney Stanley
text: I didn’t get an eye exam here, but I did get my prescription glasses here. The associate, Trevor, is very helpful and professional. It took less than a week for me to receive my glasses. A+ service.

name: Lesley Cooper
text: I was so impressed with the service I received.  The staff is very nice.  I did not even realize that Walmart had an optical waiting room other than where you go look at glasses.  The office is so clean and nice.  The equipment was very up-to-date.  I had gone in because my eyes were doing "weird" things-  Dr. Jagani pointed out a few things I would not have even thought of.  Her professional manner and her absolute care for my "over-all" health was completely appreciated.  She took the time to talk with me about my eye health and things we can do to try to correct my vision.  I was given a trial pair of contacts that day and WOW!!!  I could see again!!!! Dr. Jagani was also very conciencous of the costs seeing as though I don't have vision insurance.  I strongly recommend Dr. Jagani -  I read other reviews that mentioned she was never there... So I just called instead of trying to pop in! I arrived for my appointment and actually was seated early... always a plus!  Thank you Dr. Jagani for your professionalism and caring for me and my health.

name: jonothan english
text: Didn't use them because they were actually too expensive

text: Doctor is never there!  Walmart, you need to fix this....after all, it is the 21st century. I do not want to drive to Huntsville with glasses I can't see with. The glasses I am wearing came from Walmart in Hazel Green.

resp.text: Thank you for your review. Our associates are some of the best around and we are always happy to hear our customers feel the same!

name: Sandy Webb
text: I couldn’t ask for better customer service! The place was nice and clean and I was attended to like family. I would highly recommend this place to anyone! My glasses was perfect and came back in a timely manner, thank you so much for all your care! I WILL be back!!

resp.text: Thank you for your review. Our associates are some of the best around and we are always happy to hear our customers feel the same!

name: Corinne CHATHAM
text: What Great store! Dr Cook is kind and professional. Fantastic doctor. Vicki who waited on me was so patient & helpful in helping me pick out frames. Fantastic experience!

resp.text: Hi! Thank you so much for your review. We are excited to hear that Dr. Cook and Vickie were able to help make your experience in LensCrafters a great one. We look forward to seeing you again!

name: Brian Livingston
text:
Probably should be a 4.5 rating but didn't see that option...
A week after placing my order, I was informed the vendor that provides the polarized lenses is in the process of being changed and Lenscrafters is unable at the time to fulfill my order. However, Lenscrafters stepped up and did the right thing, maybe even more. They are providing me with a new set of frames and lenses with everything in the lenses I wanted except for the polarization without cost; and still will fulfill my original order once the new vendor is acquired. Unfortunately, that could take as much as 3 months...hopefully not. Now that's what I call stepping up to the plate!
Special shout out to the staff there...Melissa, Vicky, Mike and even the trainee (sorry, didn't get her name) were fantastic! Melissa did an excellent job explaining the issue and her honesty about it means I can trust in them for all my prescription lenses needs.
Now, let's just hope everything follows through as explained, which is up to Lenscrafters! Thanks for coming through for your customers Lenscrsfters!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review. Our team is some of the best around and we are always happy to hear our customers feel the same!

name: Chase Tillery
text: Absolutely love my glasses. The staff was super helpful in educating me on the different types of progressive lenses. 10/10 recommended

resp.text: Thank you for your review. Our associates are some of the best around and we are always happy to hear our customers feel the same!

name: Stephen Edwards
text: I went to LensCrafters to get my new prescription filled. I received excellent service. The salesperson was courteous, friendly, attentive to my needs, and helpful in making the right choices for my new eyeglasses.

resp.text: Thank you for your review. Our associates are some of the best around and we are always happy to hear our customers feel the same!

name: jared french
text: Awesome service every time I visit Dr. Cook and All sales representative involved. I would recommend this LensCrafters any and every time

resp.text: Thank you for your review! Our associates strive to provide the best possible service. We are happy to hear about your positive experience and look forward to seeing you again!

name: John Walter
text: I went there today and Melissa helped shape my glasses to fit better. She was so kind and professional. Thank you!

resp.text: Hi! Thank you so much for your review. We are excited to hear Melissa was able to help make your experience in LensCrafters a great one. We look forward to seeing you again!

name: Lee Tibbetts
text:
Bait and switch. Their system was down and couldn’t discuss price with insurance but they really pushed the polycarbonate lens, because they can make them in-house. Talked about plastic and was told they would have to be ordered. Also discussed the need for blue light filter, at which time there was no mention that the filter wasn’t available for plastic.

Get a call a few days later when system is back up and given a price and told blue light isn’t available in plastic lenses. According to the LensCrafters website and online ordering it IS available in plastic. I’ve always been suspicious of their charges and now I know to stay away.

Instead of showing us prices for what we asked just kept asking what our budget was like a used car salesperson.

Another example is when they put my son in Ray Ban branded lenses (most expensive) when we only asked for regular polycarbonate a few years ago.

If you want transparency and fair pricing just order from the LensCrafters website and take out the dishonest sales people.

resp.text: Hello Lee, thank you so much for sharing your experience. At LensCrafters our goal is to set the standard in quality in eye care and eyewear by ensuring every patient and customer has the best experience in every location every time. We apologize that our associates did not exceed your expectations during your visit.  Please go to https://www.luxotticacustomercare.com/lenscrafters to provide your information so we can contact you and work to resolve the issue.

name: Brad Thompson
text:
This was by far the best experience I’ve had at LensCrafters! Dr. Cook was fantastic and answered all my questions. He was very professional，detail oriented and friendly.

Melissa helped me find the right pair of glasses perfect for me. She was very quick and effective and immediately started crafting my new lenses. Extremely helpful in every way. She even brought out my new glasses to me as I was waiting in my car in less than 10 minutes!!!

The frontdesk was very friendly, warm and welcoming. They made sure to see that I was well taken care of and a happy satisfied customer.

Overall this entire team went above and beyond and I will continue to rave about this LensCrafters. Thank you all for making my experience go from night to day!

resp.text: Thank you for your review. Our associates are some of the best around and we are always happy to hear our customers feel the same!

name: Tony Uptain
text: Great experience, friendly professional staff,  large selection of frames.

resp.text: Thank you for your review!  We are happy to hear about your positive experience and look forward to serving you again!

name: Beverly Hughes
text: I was extremely delighted with the knowledge and professionalism of the staff.

resp.text: Thank you for your review! Our associates strive to provide the best possible service. We are happy to hear about your positive experience and look forward to serving you again!

name: Elizabeth Chiles
text: Dr. Cook was absolutely amazing! I would recommend him to anyone in the Birmingham area.

name: Leta Goolsby
text:
The Employees were so nice. Mrs. Vickie was so helpful, helping to me pick out my glasses. Thank you to all of you who worked there. I Love my Sun glasses and I know I will love my everyday glasses.
THANK YOU FOR MAKING ME FEEL WELCOME.

resp.text: Hi Leta! Thank you for your review! Our associates are some of the best around, and we are excited to hear Vickie was able to help make your trip to LensCrafters a great one. We look forward to seeing you again!

text: First time  purchasing glasses, went with the progressive lenses. Although there is an adjustment period, the team took care of me 3 to 4 different times, to ensure they were perfect! Would highly recommend! Ty  Ps: they are very patient with you...

resp.text: Hi Dennis! Welcome to LensCrafters! And thanks for your positive review. We always try to go above and beyond for our customers. We look forward to serving you again!
