resp.text: Hi Lee! Thank you for your review. We are excited to hear Dr. Cook & Rhonda were able to help make your visit a great one. We look forward to seeing you again!

name: Malori Evans
text: Rhonda was the employee that helped me. She was amazing! Such a sweet soul and has such a positive attitude. Always has a smile on her face. There were a couple of issues with the tint on my prescription sunglasses and she was so helpful in fixing the problem.

name: Karen Kaetz
text: I love the staff at this location.  Dr Cook is great and Rhonda is amazing!!  Always a great experience!

name: David G. Revel
text: I haven’t received my glasses. I got a call earlier this week saying they came in but were the wrong lens so they’ve been reordered. Not a good experience.

resp.text: Hi there, thank you for your review. We are disappointed to hear about your experience. We strive to provide the best glasses and customer service in the industry.  Please go to bit.ly/LC-Support so we can resolve this issue.

name: TylerLinda Brown
text: Dr cook is awesome! I think the receptionist for dr cook is awful. Major attitude every time I call. I really don’t want to hear huffing and puffing over the phone if I have a question - it’s so unprofessional. If you hate talking to people that much, find another job.

name: Toys World
text: You guys need to close this location. Very bad customer service. Believe me.

resp.text: Hi Criz Maz, thank you for your review. We value your feedback as it helps us improve our service. Please go to bit.ly/LC-Support so we can follow up with you directly to learn more and have your issue resolved.

name: Zachary Felton
text: Amazing selection of frames

name: Mike Bihl
text:
I had a great experience and was pleased with everyone there.
Best Eye doc in town and very honest about my needs.

name: John W
text:
Unfortunately, I don't really know whether or not I could give a positive review on being a patient....Called the first time over an hour ago to hopefully make an appointment as a new patient for a simple refraction  for an eyeglass prescription.....was told by the person who answered after pressing "3" on my phone that they would call me back in less than five minutes (they took my name and number)....They also told me they had a 4:00pm appointment for Wednesday/May 26th (I called at 11:52am on Tuesday/today/May 25th)....told them that would be fine, and that I would also gladly take any afternoon appointment for today that might become available later in case of a cancellation by another patient....the person never agreed to that, but again responded that I would receive a return phone call in a few minutes or less....I agreed...Phone call ended.....Fast forward to over an hour later...I call them again because never received a return phone call...(No problem, it can happen.)....However,  after explaining to the person answering that I never received a return phone call, the person answering the phone on this second attempt (sounded like same person, but she said  she was not), started taking my name/number again,, along with other identifiable info only to tell me that the first afternoon appointment now was on June 2nd at 2:10pm....lol.

Thus, after considering her demeanor, as well as the person with whom I talked who never returned my phone call, I just told her I would pass on the appointment and find another provider....

Hey, at least I tried EyeCare Associates: Greystone....The best to all of you.

name: Stan Andrews
text:
Great place for your eyes.

Knowledgeable and caring staff. They want you to have the best eye care available.

Very thorough examination with the latest technology.

name: John Vise
text: It was a good and welcoming experience and also it was a good place to have your eyes examined during the appointment.

name: Sharon Wallock
text:
Yes, very professional and polite. I really enjoy my time with Dr.Mike. He's honest and talks like he's known you as a friend, not just a customer.
I have always enjoyed my eye exams and getting the straight forward truth of what is recommended for the health of my eyesight.

name: Scott King
text: Dr. Mike is a 5 star optometrist. Very personable and knowledgeable in his field.

name: Faith Hubbard
text: The whole staff was SUPER nice, friendly, and helpful! The place was very clean and I felt protected from germs also.

name: Live2win 4Freedom
text: Had a phenomenal appointment with the optometrist & Staff.  Highly recommended this place.

name: James Enders
text: Everyone here is really friendly and professional. I came as a walk-in on a Saturday and was seen in less than ten min. Great place to go for your eye care needs.

name: Robert NOD
text: Called in trying to be a walk in on a Saturday after I read the google reviews saying that you accepted walk ins on Saturday. I was rudely informed that you do not accept walk ins. I was not offered to schedule an appointment. 2/7/20

name: CHERYL HALE
text:
Our family always have an excellent experience at Eye Care Assoc.
We bought sunglasses & had an eye exam after cataract surgery. Dr. Mike referred us to the best surgeon and has followed up with our family. Great group over at Greystone location.🤩

name: Erika Rutledge
text: I'm very grateful for the friendly staff and more importantly Dr. K! I will be referring my husband and other teachers to this particular location!

name: Ryan Sims
text: Love the staff here. They are very funny and know how to have a good time, while maintaining professionalism comparable to any other big named eyecare office. Also, they have a great selection of different frames and the personalized care is an added touch. Been a customer since 2016 and they do not disappoint!

name: suzette Fisher
text: They are always fast friendly and professional! Great place! Love Dr. Mike!

name: Janice Drake
text: Everyone there is friendly and helpful. Especially dr Mike

name: hobby hobbit
text: Thanks for doing a great job!  Great smiles, customer service, and knowledge.  The best Ophthalmology visit I've had in 15 years.  SERIOUSLY!  I had almost given up hope.  Thanks to Dr. Budraitis for a fresh, friendly visit.  She appears to know her stuff and has promised that my new prescription will be better than the last crappo one I received from my previous Dr.  I sure hope she's right.  My faith in ophthalmologists is fading, but she gives me hope.  We will see how it goes once the glasses come back.  Thanks all

name: Margaret Moseley
text: Dr. Mike is great. I also feel he listens and does not rush through the appointment.  Staff is great...Paula, I'm talking to you. Joyce, too. Everybody really, just have known these two by name for years.

name: Adrianne Smith
text: I thoroughly enjoyed my visit from start to finish. The staff was EXCELLENT, and it was such a pleasure meeting and speaking with Dr. Smith.

name: AM Rotter
text: Everyone was very friendly. You could tell they were busy but still moved patients through at an adequate pace. Doctor spent lots of time discussing options and explained findings thoroughly with me. Good experience!

name: Jacqueline Little
text: Very pleasant experience. Staff was very friendly and and I would recommend to anyone.

name: Shannon Haskins
text: Always friendly and get detailed care and lots of TLC. Never feel rushed!  Grateful for this practice and highly recommend!

name: Ed T
text:
Thank you!!!! You are all wonderful!

Dr. Mike and his staff are extremely competent and very polite and I've been a customer and patient for many years and wish all establishments were like theirs!   Happy to recommend!

name: Lanhee Lee
text: They didn't fully explain what a retinal scan was and made me get it even though it was extra charge and not necessary. In addition, they didn't really explain the results to me. Also, I wasn't interested in getting glasses so they were hesitant to give me my eye prescription. From even my past experiences, it seems like they don't like giving patients their eye prescriptions even though they should give their patients the results of their comprehensive eye exam without being prompted for it. Overall, it was a disappointing experience.

name: Paul Taylor
text: Great staff and service provided by EyeCare Associates.

name: Adam Pate
text: I've been to a few different eye doctors. Dr Mike, though, has been my favorite. He has a great personality and displays a passion for his craft. The entire experience has been... easy! The staff is friendly, knowledgeable, and makes you feel at ease.

name: Teresa Morris
text:
Great staff!!! Loved everybody!!
Already told a bunch of people about you guys!!

name: Robert Wright
text: This group was refreshing an absolute pleasure to work with from the phone call, examination and selection of glasses. I would highly suggest anyone having vision problems to use EyeCare Associates : Greystone off Lee Branch.

name: Bobby Tidwell
text:
Folks are great..Doctor one of a kind took his daughter and 3 other teenage girls to Atlanta to a concert stayed in town until it was over to meet back up make sure
They made it home safely!..now really now'a day's what Dad does that?..nuff said

name: Anthony Colón
text: Always a great visit. Patient and friendly experience. Dr. Mike is great!

name: Anita Bates
text: Highly professional and friendly.  I could not have had a better experience

name: Ray Lea
text: Dr. Kwarcinski and staff are professional,  knowledgeable,  and kind.

name: Mac Cam
text: Dr. Kwarcinski is the best!  And they have an awesome selection of frames to choose from

name: Whit Brown
text: Dr. Justin and the entire staff were soooo amazing!!!

name: Elizabeth Hutson
text: I frequently get appointment reminders through email/phone call that aren't actually associated with myself. I have "corrected" this more than 4 times and the problem persists. I fear that my personal information may have been shared with the person with whom it was accidentally associated.

name: Luz Castro
text: Great service and friendly staff!!!

name: Jelena Stojanovic
text:
Highly recommend! Very friendly and knowledgeable staff and great atmosphere. Took my 7 years old daughter and everyone was so nice and made her feel very comfortable.
Very clean and organized office.
We will be back for sure!

name: Dylan Clark
text: Friendliest and most helpful staff of any optometrist I've been to. They're a little pricey, but you're getting what you're paying for.

name: Cedric Stallworth
text: Was searching for an eye doctor. Found one with AEC. Staff was great and the friendly atmosphere was too. Everything was great ! Waiting on my new glasses to review them and enjoying my contacts right now. Highly recommend visiting them !

name: Big John
text: Just finished up my appointment this morning and was very pleased.   Dr. Canales was very friendly and professional. My first time with her but she was very thorough. AEC has a friendly/professional staff as well. I considered going to another eye doctor just to change things up but changed my mind. AEC has always treated me well and I see no reason to go somewhere else.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words.  We aim to exceed expectations each and every time.

name: Ken Stapler
text: I stopped going to AEC a few years ago strictly for convenience purposes. I finally went back today and I am very impressed. They were always nice before and they are still friendly, helpful and very inviting. The doctors are great and so is the support staff. Everyone was awesome and I am glad I came back. It’s a little inconvenient for me but it is well worth it. I’m a very satisfied customer and I look forward to future visits.

name: Jenny Williams
text: The Optometrist is good.  Everything else was completely off the mark with my order.  They did correct the issue.  No complaints now.  Going to try them again in summer to see if it goes better.  The glasses my husband and I received are great.

name: TOM SOMMERKAMP
text: They were able to meet my diggicult scheduling needs.  Office staff professional and efficient.  Exam I thought, was professional and thorough.  Dr Sanderson explained everything.  She went above my expectations and provided follow up information.  Great care and a erode selection of frames.

name: Kristyna S
text: I would highly recommend Advanced EyeCare of Madison. The staff is friendly and they are quick to get you in and out for an appointment. The facility is very clean and my visits are always pleasant. I like how they take the time to discuss my insurance options while ordering lenses or contacts.  I like this place so much that I kept coming back even after I moved to the other side of town.

name: Michael Lustig
text:
Great, fast service in a convenient location. Building is also very clean and feels nice to be in. As others have said, you don't feel rushed at all, but I've been in and out in less than an hour for both of my appointments so far.

Make sure to have someone with you if you're getting your eyes dilated though. Probably shouldn't have driven myself home today.

name: Mary Beth Strain
text: Love THIS group. Great eye care specialists! Highly recommend Advanced Eye care of Madison for all your Eye care needs.

name: Todd M
text: Great place for all your optical needs.  Friendly staff that will help with all your questions or concerns.  I highly recommend them.

name: William Sartor
text:
Our unfortunate experience with Advanced Eyecare of Madison’s optical store with regard to my spouses and my new  progressive lenses prescriptions:
1)	The Advanced Eyecare progressive lenses did not perform like our previous prescription eyeglasses. The progressive field of view was very narrow and could only focus on a few lines of text when reading, thus having to constantly  move your head when reading. The view from our  previous lenses could focus on an entire page. We discovered that  the old prescription used Varilux lenses and Advanced Eyecare orders Kodak lenses. My spouse and I both considered the Kodak progressive lens to be unacceptable. Advanced Eyecare then special ordered Varilux lens to satisfy us. Thanks for that, our vision is back to normal, but the default Kodak lenses are lower quality lens in our opinion.
2)	The decorative diamond on one frame fell out after a few weeks. Advanced Eyecare would replace the entire frame, but we would have no future warranty on the glasses. I was called a “difficult customer” when I objected to the loss of warranty due to a workmanship issue with the frame. I left without fixing the frame and they asked which Optometrist they should send our records to.
3)	The lenses in another plastic frame are loose. The frame makes a creaking sound anytime you touch them because the lens is rubbing against the frame. I guess I’ll have to live with that problem until I get a new prescription at a different Optometrist.

name: Darren Byers
text: Not coming back. First they messed up my glasses again. The first pair of progressives were very expensive and I could never wear them. They just refused to send them back. Then the next pair they ordered the wrong thing and I had to make 2 special trips for them to get them right. Last exam I paid for the retina scan but they couldn't review it because the computers were screwed up. I can bet that was a waste of money and never looked at. The help has gone to hell at this place. I guess she will let them continue to run off her customers. Now all I want is my prescription and I have to go pick it up. Well I am in California on travel, and the only thing they can do is FAX it. Who the hell has a fax now days? Forget this place. Go somewhere else.

name: Danny Meilleur
text: ABSOLUTELY PERFECT EXPERIENCE FROM GETTING THE APPOINTMENT TO GETTING EYE EXAM TO PICKING OUT FRAMES.  I WOULD RECOMENED EVERYONE SHOP HERE FOR ANY EYE WEAR NEEDS.

name: Dan Chitwood
text:
I had my first appointment with AEC Madison today and they surpassed my expectations. The staff was very helpful, friendly, and professional. They were able to answer all of my questions and address any concerns.
Most importantly, Dr. Canales was the first doctor to give me a possible diagnosis to a vision issue I've been enduring for over a year.  Everyone else has responded with a "you look fine, I don't know what is going on." Dr. Canales listened to my description, thought about the symptoms, and came up with a possible diagnosis.

name: Anthony Logan
text:
Great care in office but locked our insurance authorization so when me and my wife went to get our glasses over the weekend from a different store we were told we would have to wait until they open back up during the week to get it unlocked and then come back to try and utilize our insurance to purchase our glasses with the coverage we pay for. So make sure to request that they unlock your insurance while you're there.

Update July 2021 - we did our annual eye exams and ordered new glasses and everything in the office went very well. Everyone was professional and the area was very clean. Now the downside is it has been almost a month since our exam and we still have not received our glasses. After a couple of calls they informed us that it is due to an issue with the supplier but I feel like a month to find out or us having to chase the information down on a product we purchased is in poor taste and should reflect on the customer service of the location. I hope they take this information and use it to assist other customers that might be dealing with the same issue.

name: Christy Poston
text: Fantastic experience!!! Everything about our visit was great.

name: Toni Serpa
text: Not coming back. I don't understand how someone with a 10:30 appt was called back and left before the doctor even came to my room for a 10:15 one. Is 15 minutes to a room and another 45 minutes to see the doctor a norm for this clinic? I won't come back to find out. This would be a one star, but gosh that desk staff is friendly!

name: TB TheMouseintheOperaHouse
text: I have been going to Advanced EyeCare for about two years. They've never made me feel as though I was double-booked with someone else, or forgotten about me. As a past and present employee of family medicine practices with four to forty MDs and DOs, I can definitely appreciate the calm and friendly atmosphere. The receptionist is always friendly and efficient, and the techs and doctors take time to answer any questions you have. I've never felt rushed, but I've always gotten in and out in a reasonable amount of time.

name: Ray Simmons
text: Always a positive experience and highly recommend

name: RocketReef
text: A+

name: Jessica Ipnar
text: Great selection of frames, great prices, and Brandy is excellent at helping you choose the perfect pair of glasses!

name: Michelle Stenske
text:
I love this locally owned shop.  Brandy the owner is really patient and knowledgeable and goes above and beyond for customer satisfaction.  Also this is the best selection of eyeglass frames anywhere in town.  I was really impressed that they catered to every price point a customer might have.  This is my 3rd and 4th pair of glasses I've gotten from her and her quality is outstanding.

I just made the switch from an eye doctor at a different practice to Brandy's eye doctor, Dr. Soulages.  I was apprehensive at first since I was content at my other eye doctor, but wow... I've never had an eye exam like this before.  Tyically elsewhere an eye exam might take 15 minutes tops, but this doctor takes the time to go over your medical history, medications and does so much more in the exam than I'm used to.  I walked out knowing and understanding a lot more than I walked in knowing.

I am making appointments for my kids now, including my autistic son.  I'll update on how that goes, but I expect the same quality care.

Thanks Brandy,and Dr. Soulages. You have a loyal customer in me.

name: Patrick Patterson
text: The Owner, Brandy was very nice.  I was very happy with the Eye Doctor, an older gentleman.  It was the most thurough eye exam I can remember.  The glasses after two weeks however started to turn my skin green ( An allergy to nickel I have now learned..  I was never told about Nickel in the frames I picked out or the possible reactions.. now the coating and finish on the frames have started to dissolve.  I was told at the time of purchase, that my insurance was going to cover the scratch coating, up to a percentage of the frame, the lense, etc.. However upon looking at my EOB statement with BC/BS nothing was ever filed.  I was sold the cheapest frames ( they are barely tempered and are falling apart horribly now ) with some decent lenses from what I can tell.  I honestly wouldn't recommend this company to anybody at this point.

name: Joan Danley
text: Son bought glasses 4 months ago and the frame broke at spot welded area while cleaning them.  Told him if he didn't purchase a warranty they would not replace frames even though their website says 1 yr warranty.  Told him he applied too much pressure  while cleaning them or he doesn't take his glasses off with 2 hands (who in the hell takes glasses off with 2 hands?).  A lot of excuses to not support their 1 year warranty that is posted on their website. He's had other glasses and never had this problem before.  Cheap glasses and the worst customer service. Go someplace else.  This place is a joke.

resp.text: I’m very sorry to hear this. Please take the time to reach out to us so we can help find a solution. If you’d like, please email me at americasbest@nationalvision.com.  It’s very important to include the location you visited, your son's name and your phone number so we can help as quickly as possible. Thank you, Nancy

name: Jessica Skipper
text: Always love my experience here. Everyone is professional, nice, and very helpful. The eye doctor does a great job explaining everything, and answering all your questions, and they have a good selection of glasses. I'd recommend them to anyone.

name: Shontay Pinder
text: My appointment was on the 28th of June and it was a wonderful experience. The staff and Doctors are so nice and they actually care and do all they can to help. I would recommend this place to my loved ones and friends. Awesome Doctor and Staff!!

name: Steven Sanders
text: Your appointment time means nothing here. Be prepared to wait over an hour after your scheduled appointment time. I understand a 10-15 minute wait but people have schedules to keep. Completely unacceptable with today's technology. Let someone know if times are running late or ask to reschedule.

name: Kam Lynn
text: I loved everything about the service, the frames I chose and the help I received & when I tried on something that was too big they told me it was. Thanks guys, excellent service.. Thanks to Cieria and Latoria they were amazing, go see these two ladies.

name: Floydisunequalled
text:
My month old glasses just broke while I'm sitting still. Screw they replaced (after I complained of loose lens) is stripped completely.
Lens was still loose after "repair". Was told nothing could be done.
Going today to ask for a refund at 39 days of ownership.

+
Update

Manager miss Alexander was 100% top notch and solved my problem. I commend her patience and professionalism in dealing with an irritated customer.
She deserves a raise.❤

name: Linda Kennedy
text: Doctor and staff all very personable! Second time going here. Still have first 2 pairs and they wore very well. Thanks y'all!

name: Jessica Seay
text: First let me say I would give no stars but had to give a star for a review. Decided that I will try them again after a few years. Wanted new frames and contacts so I scheduled appt. In the beginning everything was fine everyone was pleasant and kind. I was able to find a frame that I liked as well as the frame fitting prefectly. The guy that processed my transaction was very cool and he actually helped me choose the frame that looked the best on me. Rewind to the day I pick my new glasses up. Well let's just say I was not happy. First time trying the new frames on they were so big they did not fit at all. The first lady adjusted them but they were still falling off my face. Then she ask another lady to help while she is adjusting them for the second time I asked why are they so big and not fitting like the previous frame (demo) I tried on. She tells me that my actual frames are bigger because the thickness of my lenses and that demo frames will fit differently. I have never heard of that or had that issue anywhere else. Everytime I tried on frames I liked and was fitted they have always fit fine with little to no adjustments. After about 5-6 times adjusting my glasses they somewhat fitted ok. The piece behind my ear is adjusted so far inward on both sides that the top of my ear sticks out and the frame does not fit properly on my face or behind my ears. She then tells me that I will have to come back and get them adjusted again because overtime taking them off and on they will adjust back to there normal size. I was not told this when I was making my transaction nor have I ever experienced this elsewhere. I will not be coming back. Worst experience ever. I have had them for several hours and they are loose sliding down my nose constantly. I have wasted over $214 and I still need new glasses.

resp.text: I’m very sorry to hear this. Please take the time to reach out to us so we can help get this resolved. You have 30 days to restyle into a different frame. If you’d like, please email me at americasbest@nationalvision.com.  It’s very important to include the location you visited, your name and your phone number so we can help as quickly as possible. Thank you, Nancy

name: Buttaflyskye
text: I went here fora couple of years due to joing their discount club. I hated theur service. Most employees have attitudes. Not welcoming. Once they even forgot my schedule after they had already did a reminder call. There were no records of my appointment in the computer and they refused to allow me to be a walk in.

name: Jacqueline Sanders
text: I didn't have a service done, because they DO NOT TAKE TRICARE. Even though their website says they do accept it!

name: Danielle Millender
text:
Thank you America’s Best Contacts!
I was in an emergency situation over the weekend with my daughter. She dropped her contact down the sink drain while we were out of town at a softball tournament in Dothan. We’d spent a ton of money and time on this tournament so I was immediately in a panic. Long story short, Ray was able to get us in and get my daughter a contact in her eye before the tournament started. He was more than accommodating and extremely nice and caring. Thank you so much for helping me out you guys. I highly recommend ABC& E in Dothan!! We ❤️ You Ray!!!

resp.text: We love hearing about experiences like this.  Thanks so much for taking the time to write a review.  Your feedback and your business are greatly appreciated!

name: Steven M.
text: 2nd time ever going to an eye doctor. I was completely confused as to the process. Noone really explained anything to me. Was talked too several times like a child. And was rushed out of the office. Appointment was set at 5:45 pm. Showed up at 5:30. They close at 7pm. Didnt see the doctir till close. (The doctor was very informative about how contacts work. But that was about it) then rushed out the door very quickly. Probably becouse it was after close. 2 weeks later i call to get my Rx. And was asked why I hadnt called to finalize my contacts. Had no idea I had too. I will be looking for a new office to go too. Was not pleased at all.

resp.text: I’m very sorry that happened. They should have set up your follow-up before you left your first appointment. I’d like to have someone from corporate management reach out to you about this. If you’re interested, you can email me at americasbest@nationalvision.com.  It’s very important to include the location you visited, your name and your phone number so we can help as quickly as possible. Thank you, Nancy

name: Rodney Fordin
text: I just picked up my glasses and they work so good! Thanks a lot..

name: John Kucharnik
text: Great place to get all your eyeglass needs.  The staff was helpful in picking out the right frames.  The doctor did a full exam.  Can't beat the price, two pairs of bifocals with exam was only $99.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We appreciate your feedback and your business!

name: Bernadette Govan
text: I have been going to America's Best Eyes in Dothan for about 8 years now. I have never had a bad experience. Dr. Jenkins & hisis always professional. Dr. Jenkins always answers any questions that I may have. He's very patient in ensuring that you get the best exam & prescription needed. I would recommend America's Best to anyone looking for great service & products at an affordable price.

name: Justin Brown
text: They are horrible at scheduling and have a careless staff. Will never return

name: Lory Wakes
text:
So I went in expecting to stick to the sale.. which was pretty good prices.  But Ray came and like a Ray of Sunshine he made things better and brighter.  Well actually he gave me a fantastic deal for my prescription glasses to have one pair as SUNGLASSES.
So everytime I clearly see the sun- behind my shades I'll remember RAY.

resp.text: Great to hear!  Thanks so much for taking the time to write a review, we appreciate your business and look forward to helping you with your eye care and eye wear needs in the future. – Nancy

name: foreveronempty
text: They are taking covid very seriously and I am so grateful! The Optometrist was very kind and all the ladies were so sweet. They helped me out and were very patient with me. They were very careful with sanitation and making sure no one that enters the building had come in contact with covid. Masks are required and they take your temp at the door. Thank you so much! It was the best eye exam experience I have ever had.

name: celine arafat
text: Their customer service is terrible. They are completely unreasonable. I tried to make an appointment to get my eyes checked, but the earliest one they had wasn’t until the end of July. That is completely understandable considering the circumstances we are under. However, they wouldn’t even let me purchase any new contacts until after my exam. I understand that that is the policy, but I am practically blind right now and they expect me to stay that way until the end of the month. They were completely uncooperative and rude throughout the entire process. My sister was also trying to make an appointment and they were unbelievably rude. Either hire new people or take a course on customer service or just basic manners.

resp.text: I’m very sorry you had an unpleasant experience with us.  Thank you for your feedback.  This isn't the kind of experience we want our customers to have and will investigate the issue further.  If you'd like to speak with someone from corporate management, please email me at americasbest@nationalvision.com.  It’s very important to include the location you visited, your name and your contact information so we can help as quickly as possible. Thank you, Nancy

name: Josephina Lane
text: My husband and I read a lot of the reviews and it’s about 60/40 so being that due to Covid-19 most places are not making glasses and we are in need. We went in and it was FANTASTIC! Mind you we had to wear a mask which I loved, and my husband was very pleased with the staff and their quick response to our presence and waiting on us. We are excited about our glasses 👓 🤓 in 2weeks. Everyone was super nice! Hey thanks again and especially Latoria the one who helped check us into the store.

resp.text: Thanks so much for taking the time to write a review. We love hearing from happy customers and look forward to seeing you at your next visit.  – Nancy

name: Kaylah Watkins
text:
I'm very glad this company is taking COVID-19 seriously! Thank you, America's Best Dothan! During my appointment, they were very busy but everyone communicated well and had a great attitude. All my experiences with this company have been pleasant. I've been a patient for several years and have no plans to change that.
.
Also, shout out to RAY for the awesome customer service!

name: Silver
text: The staff were nice and quick to help, both them and eye doctor answered every question I had and even answered questions I didn't know to ask. I learned more about my eyes in one visit with them then with all previous visits to other eye doctors. I'll definitely be back next year for my next appointment.

resp.text: Great to hear!  Thanks so much for taking the time to write a review, we appreciate your business and look forward to helping you with your eye care and eye wear needs in the future. – Nancy

name: Danielle Weeks
text: The entire staff is wonderful especially ray, he is the kindest and sweetest, I bought some glasses yesterday and when I came back in for an adjustment he made me feel so welcomed and invited, I will continue to do business with them considering this was my first time with them. Five stars all the way!!

name: Trey Valesquez
text: Friendly people, Doctor Jenkins is a good doctor that took his time with my wife as she speaks just a little English. We picked up our glasses today and Latoria helped us and she was very nice. She actually put the glasses on my wife’s face and touched behind her ears and made sure they were on straight. The fact that she didn’t mind touching her after asking me to translate for her was sweet. We will be back soon with our kids. Thanks so much. Everyone was really nice to us.

name: Mercury's Edge
text: Went in today and will absolutely go back. The staff was friendly and helpful. The doctor was knowledgeable and not at all intimidating. Great pricing, great service, great staff.

name: wonder woman
text: Great place friendly people

name: Kady Santiago
text: Waited 2 hours for a 15 minute exam, unfriendly service, broke my glasses went in needing emergency replacement told I'd receive within a week, 2 weeks later I'm still waiting. Can't drive, experiencing lots of headaches and can't get someone to tell me when exactly they'll be in. Once they have your money they can't care less about you! I would never recommend this place to anyone!

resp.text: I’m very sorry to hear this. Please reach out so we can help. If you’d like, please email me at americasbest@nationalvision.com.  It’s very important to include the location you visited, your name and your phone number so we can help as quickly as possible. Thank you, Nancy

name: Karen Raines
text: Always expect to wait a full hour or better before you see the doctor. It's like this every single time. They schedule people too close together. They schedule patients every 10 minutes! The waiting room is completely full. There really needs to be more time in between appointment scheduling so people aren't having to wait so long to be seen. My son was recently seen there. His appointment time was 12:50 and he didn't leave until 3:15! If that's not bad enough, staff is rude, they lost my son's paperwork and the tech let an older woman skip in front 4 other people that were scheduled and had been already waiting over an hour. We will never be back here again!! This place doesn't even deserve 1 star.

resp.text: Hi Karen Raines, I'm very sorry this has been your experience with us. I'd like to see what we can do to help resolve it. If you're willing to give us the opportunity to help make this right, please email me at americasbest@nationalvision.com. It’s very important to include the location you visited and your contact information so we can help as quickly as possible. Thank you, Nancy

name: Brandon Ramer
text: Got there at 9 scheduled an appointed for 10:40, ordered my wife’s contacts all the while the lady “helping” us was  was to busy talking to the other employee sitting at the desk next to her, making fun of another customer that was there, to take care of us, after they got done she finally let us pay, and we left. We got back for my 10:40 appointed at 10:25 and was told at the front fest that we were good to go on to the waiting room and they would be with us shortly, 11:45 rolls around and everybody that was there when I arrived was gone and the Dr. was on the fourth person that had came in after me, so I asked the staff, they couldn’t find my folder so they had me go back up front fill out the form, then put me in the back and treated me like a walk in, even though they remembered me at 9 and also telling me I was good to go on back, so here we are at 12:15 still waiting. Worst customer service ever, so unprofessional, will never come here again, they only get 1 star because I can’t give zero.

resp.text: Hi Brandon Ramer, I’m very sorry you had a bad experience with us. I’d like to have someone from corporate management reach out to you and see what they can do to help make this right. If you’re interested, you can email me at americasbest@nationalvision.com.  It’s very important to include the location you visited and your contact information so we can help as quickly as possible. Thank you, Nancy

name: Princess Lewis
text: The gentleman who assisted me in picking out my frames Jay I believe is his name was very helpful terrific and welcoming however the other staff not so they should seriously have a meeting with there staff on customer service.The lady who assisted me after barely said anything at all as if I wasn’t even there.

name: Krystal “Sissi” Addison
text: Dr was nice but the staff that assisted was extremely rude each time I went in. The girl who did my contact lense session was so short and had no patience. Mind you, I’ve never worn contacts and had every intention of buying them but her attitude completely turned me off.( I went in to purchase 2 sets of glasses and contacts)She even failed to mention the $100 charge for a contact lesson. I decided I was Better off just getting my 2 pair of glasses, paying the fee and getting contacts somewhere else than to have to deal with them again. My dog recently chewed both pair of glasses so Today, I picked Up my written Rx so I can Do business elsewhere and even today the lady wasn’t pleasant. Seems like you would have more clientele if your staff were friendlier.

resp.text: Hi Krystal Addison, I’m very sorry you had an unpleasant experience with us.  Thank you for your feedback.  This isn't the kind of experience we want our customers to have and will investigate the issue further.  If you'd like to speak with someone from corporate management, please email me at americasbest@nationalvision.com.  It’s very important to include the location you visited and your contact information so we can help as quickly as possible. Thank you, Nancy

name: Shawnda Williams
text: Best service, fast service, an extra friendly staff that made me feel very welcomed... My visit was WONDERFUL!!!

name: Marcy Clark
text: I didnt get a free eye exam,  I ended getting 1 box of contacts because it cost me 189.00, I could have spent that alot closer to home,

name: Donna Devine
text: I  have not had the experience of going to America's best yet,  but I called this morning to set up my first appointment and the person that answered the phone said her name is Jennifer. I asked her if there was any available for today, which is on a  Saturday. She said no rudely  and her voice got a little louder as she said it. I will still go to my Appointment later in the week. I hope the rest of my experience with Americans best will be a more pleasant one...

resp.text: Hi Donna, I’m very sorry for the unpleasant experience you had while making your appointment. Please don't hesitate to reach out to us so if we can be of any assistance. You can email me at americasbest@nationalvision.com.  It’s very important to include the location you visited and your contact information so we can help as quickly as possible. Thank you, Nancy

name: Leslie Whinthorpe
text: Go see Ms. Tori she is wonderful and was a joy to work with. My father is disabled and she not only took care of him but also helped us out because the glasses my dad wanted were beyond the budget we had. Nancy asked when we got there if we had  vision insurance and I said no because I didn’t think dad had any. Well Ms. Tori walked over and introduced herself and not even as the manager but just as Tori which showed me she was caring and it wasn’t about the position she had because her name tag said General Manager. She found out that he had $200 worth of insurance that he could use and that just brought tears to my eyes. She didn’t have to look after we said no but she told us a lot of elderly people have vision insurance through their Medicare as a supplemental vision plan that they sign up for and either forget about it or just don’t know. I have never been to a more caring place in my entire life. I know that we will never go anywhere else and my dad just loved Ms. Tori!! If I could give you guys 100 stars I would. Thank you so much and I can hardly wait until my dad gets his eyeglasses. Thank you again Ms. Tori, hope you guys never lose her.

resp.text: Hi Leslie, Great to hear! Thanks so much for taking the time to write a review. Tori will get recognition for her service. We appreciate your feedback and your business! – Nancy

name: Jim Mills
text: Walked in was greeted by a young man.. I think his name was Ray. I didn’t have a appointment but was just looking around he told me everything I needed to know. Please reward this young man. I will be back!

resp.text: Hi Jim Mills, Thanks so much for taking the time to write a review. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you at your next visit! – Nancy

name: Slim City
text: Today I had a very frightening episode going on with my right eye as I walked in all of the staff greeted me with a warm welcome right away I started to feel at ease, Ms. Tori got me back to see Dr. Jenkins rather swiftly and from that point on everything else was taking care of, Dr. Jenkins did a very thorough examination to try and resolve my issue which he did once he found the problem he explained to me what was going on and right away he scheduled me an appointment to see a physician, I'm very thankful for him and the staff members today. Great job guys 👍👍👍

resp.text: Hi Maserati, Great to hear! Thanks so much for taking the time to write a review. We appreciate your feedback! – Nancy

name: Shannon Thomas
text: I've been going here for about 5 years and I've never had a problem. Went in today for an eye exam and Gabriel at the front desk was very nice and helpful. This is the only place I will go for exams and contacts.

resp.text: Hi Shannon, Thanks so much for taking the time to write a review. We love hearing from happy customers and we appreciate your feedback and your business! – Nancy

name: Kim Bowden
text: Highly recommended!! I was immediately greeted upon walking in and signed in with a nice lady. I arrived about 30 mins early. The wait to see the doctor was lengthy BUT well worth the wait. Dr Jenkins was very friendly, knowledgeable and thorough. He explained everything (even things I didnt ask) in great detail so that I understood more about my eyes than I did before. The lady who checked me out was also friendly and there were no surprises with pricing. I have already referred friends and family members!!

name: Kelia Thomas
text: I’ve never wanted to review anywhere before but this place helped me out so much. Saturday was a busy morning for me and I was late for my appointment. The lady up front stated since I was a new patient they would need to reschedule me. I got frustrated and the manager came over and asked the young lady what was going on. She said that when they call the day before they do ask all new patients to come in 10-15 minutes early, to have enough time to fill out paperwork and all. I said ok, let’s just reschedule for another day. She then looked at the computer and said no ma’am we would love to see you today we will just have to bump you down about 20 minutes. I said thank you so much, because I needed my contacts today, and was heading out of town. The entire staff was nice to me even though I was late no one had an attitude with me even when I did! Thanks guys, I really appreciate your patience with me being so very frustrated.

resp.text: Hi Kelia, Thanks so much for taking the time to write a review. We appreciate your feedback and your business! – Nancy

name: Harli Johnson
text: If I could give them negative stars I would. I needed buy more contacts and America best seemed to be the cheapest. I have a valid prescription that is 7 months old. I researched their website to find that I could use my current prescription and scheduled an appointment. I get to my appointment and I’m very rudely informed that I have to have another exam, pay the $99, and have a contact lense exam before I can buy contacts from there. I told her that is not what is advertised on your website but she kept cutting me off and insisting hat I pay the $99 and have another exam done. I got up and walked out at that point. You can not advertise one thing then say another when it comes time to honor the advertisement. This place is a HUGE rip off and will do and say anything they need to sell you their “eye care club”

resp.text: Hi Harli, I apologize for such an unpleasant experience with us. If there’s anything I can do to help resolve this for you, please reach out to americasbest@nationalvision.com. It’s very important to include the location you visited and your contact information so we can help as quickly as possible. Thank you, Nancy

name: Richard Gonzalez
text: All of my experiences at Americas Best, have been amazing. The staff always make me feel welcome and make me feel like family. Any issues had with this store is simply because people are too damn ENTITLED AND SPOILED to simply READ the policies. You wont find a better experience in Dothan. Be respectful to them they will love you.

name: blumobean
text: My experience has been great at this location. The receptionist is super nice and very efficient. The optometrist who examined me and my granddaughter was one of the finest gentlemen I have met in a long time. Exams and 4 pair of glasses including one pair of sunglasses was less than 2 pair at any other place.

resp.text: Hello, Great to hear! We appreciate your business! I've shared your review with the Dothan team and look forward to helping you and your granddaughter with your eye care and eyewear needs for years to come. – Nancy

name: Cary H.
text: I have always had a good experience at this location. Everyone has been friendly and helpful and the optometrist very knowledgeable. He helped me to know when to have cataract surgery and they never pressured me into expensive upgrades.

resp.text: Hi Cary, Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We appreciate your feedback and your business! – Nancy

name: Marion Moore
text: False advertising. They do nor honor the 2 for $69 and free exam advertisement on the window. The exam was $70. The  frame $59.95, each basic prescription lens cost $39.50, (more advanced lens costs more money) polish edges $10. After $11.07 for sales tax the total price before insurance was around $228. My insurance plan only provided a $70 discount leaving me with a balance of 159.04. So don't let their window ad lure you in b/c it's false

resp.text: Hi Marion Moore, I’m very sorry that happened. Our 2 pair offer cannot be combined with insurance. I’d be happy to have someone from corporate management reach out to you and have the opportunity to make this right. If you’re interested, you can email me at americasbest@nationalvision.com.  It’s very important to include the location you visited and your contact information so we can help as quickly as possible. Thank you, Nancy

name: Janice Austin
text: Let’s just start out by saying this was one of the best experiences I’ve had in a long time at a Dr office. The ladies were friendly and fun and the Dr did a great job. I can’t wait to get my new glasses. Just wanted someone to know this.

resp.text: Hi Janice, Happy to hear you had such a positive experience with us.  We appreciate you taking the time to write a review, thank you for being our customer! - Nancy

name: Morgan Roberts
text: I walked in to my appointment at excatly 4:06 the woman at the counter, Jessica, was in the middle of a conversation with another coustomer. Which probably took about 2 minutes. By the time the woman addressed me she told me that I had missed my appointment time and that I would have to reschedule. I checked the time and it was 4:08 my appointment time was at 4:00. The woman said they don’t have a 10 minute grace period because they schedule the appoints every 10 minutes. I explained to her that we weren’t 10 minutes late we were 8 minutes late but she refused to serve me and insisted that I had to reschedule. I live an hour away. I am beyond disappointed. I would zero stars if I could.

resp.text: Hi Morgan, I’m very sorry that happened. I’d like to have someone from corporate management reach out to you and have the opportunity to make this right. If you’re interested, you can email me at americasbest@nationalvision.com.  It’s very important to include the location you visited and your contact information so we can help as quickly as possible. Thank you, Nancy

name: Shannon Nikic
text: My mother got her glasses here,after waiting far too long between eye exams because she has never had a good experience at other eye care centers. This is especially worrying because glaucoma and degenerative eye disease runs in our family. But she couldn't say enough good things about the staff , the care she recieved, and how everyone made her feel welcomed and  relaxed. She said if the staff didn't like their jobs and their customers, they all deserved an Academy award for acting like they did. On top of that, she got a good deal on two pairs of comfortable ,attractive glasses, that they took a lot of time adjusting for her (one ear is slightly lower than the other). Thank you all, and when I need glasses, I now know where to go!

resp.text: Hi Shannon, Great to hear!  Thanks so much for taking the time to write a review, we appreciate your feedback and look forward to helping you and your mother with your eye care and eye wear needs in the future. – Nancy

name: Shaundrita Stephens
text: I called and scheduled an appointment for glasses and contacts exam. The visit was supposed to be $100 for both exams and two pairs of glasses. Half of the staff is rude. If you can't suck up your attitude then you need to go home. Customer service means alot and goes a long way. I was asked to pick my glasses and then I waited for the exam. I liked the doctor that did the exam. When I tried on the contacts I was given one of each color I wanted to try. Which does not make sense. Then I asked about the glasses I chose. I was told I only paid for the exams! I supposedly paid to be in the eye care club.  So I ended up paying for one pair of glasses and a 6 months of contacts. The total cost was $338. I felt like I was misled and overpaid. The office took over two weeks for the glasses and contacts. I had to call to find out if the glasses and contacts were in! Unorganized and unprofessional. Especially since I didn't have insurance and paid straight out of pocket. Seems like I would of had a pleasant experience. I forgot to mention my last prescription in my last pair of glasses is stronger then the new ones. So I continue to wear the old glasses. They can keep the eye care club. I won't use it. This place deserves half of a star.

resp.text: Hi Shaundrita Stephens, I’m very sorry you had an unpleasant experience with us.  Thank you for your feedback.  This isn't the kind of experience we want our customers to have and will investigate the issue further.  If you'd like to speak with someone from corporate management, please email me at americasbest@nationalvision.com.  It’s very important to include the location you visited and your contact information so we can help as quickly as possible. Thank you, Nancy

text: Best I’ve seen in a long time. The doctor was patient and I didn’t feel rushed. The ladies helped me pick out frames without in the absence of my wife and she loves the new look on me.. I appreciate those ladies there.. I’ll definitely be sending people your way!! Thanks again....

resp.text: Hi Dewayne, Great to hear!  Thanks for taking the time to write a review, we appreciate your business and look forward to helping you with your eye care and eyewear needs in the future. – Nancy

name: Matt Bryant (MateoTheWizard)
text:
I went to get an eye exam on 9/3 and was treated horribly by the majority of the staff. The assistant manager on duty at the time(around 5pm) was very rude and actually quite confrontational, as well as the other employee, Ruby.

I went in to get the 2 pair of glasses and eye exam special, since I broke my only glasses the day before. The doctor offered me a trial set of contacts to ge me though the 2 weeks it takes to recieve the eyewear in the mail. However, I was forced to remove and throw away the TRIAL pair of contacts or else pay 100+ extra dollars.

Now I am practically blind for another week and a half due to the money hungry assistant manager and angry Ms. Ruby. At America's Best, money is far more important than helping customers to see. The one star is a huge generosity.

*Small edit*
The doctor and the trainee were both great despite the rest of the staff.

resp.text: I'm very sorry this was your experience with us. Thank you for reaching out through email.  I have responded to you there.  Nancy

name: Stephanie Pinnella
text: Doctor was super nice. I enjoyed the lady in the front helping me pick out glasses. I came in a little early but they took me in the back and I waited but only 10 mins so I was pleased. I liked the deal to get 2 pairs. I didn't realize my eyes got worse. I appreciate the lady telling me why I was being charged so much. I understood the pricing. I feel if people want cheap glasses, they can go somewhere cheap. Your selling the frames cheap, not the lenses, if people have bad eyes then the pricing is almost def. Gonna go up. People need to understand that lens are expensive. I will be going back in the future!!

resp.text: Hi Stephanie, Thank you for taking the time to write a review. I will share it with the Dothan team. We appreciate your feedback and your business! - Nancy

resp.text: Thanks so much for taking the time to write a review. We love hearing from happy customers and we appreciate your feedback and your business! – Nancy

name: Kayla Elle
text: Great staff, even though it was busy in there both days no one was ugly but very helpful and I ended up seeing 2 different doctors this past Friday and Saturday for a follow-up! Ms. Latoria is the manager there and she went above and beyond with the help of both doctors, Dr Jon and Dr Adam and the guy, sorry can’t remember his name but I think it said Jataro, I saw him before the doctors and he also was very patient with me & in making sure my unpleasant experience with contacts was a pleasure! I ended up getting something in the contacts Friday night and went online to schedule an appointment for Saturday and I thought it went through but it didn’t so I called. I spoke to Ms. Latoria and she did state that they could work me in because the slot I thought I had chosen was taken. She spoke to the doctor and they got me in and out. My eye is so much better today and I just want people to stop blaming their impatience on a very busy practice. The ladies in there were all working hard each day I went in and making sure by coming in the waiting area asking if you were. I’m looking at the reviews in awe because obviously the ones with negative experiences probably had unreasonable expectations from jump in my opinion but I’m glad I came and now others from my place of work will also as well as my mom who has schedules an appointment for next week. Thanks for listening. Just try them out, can’t always make everything perfect or everyone happy. 😘

resp.text: Hi Kayla Elle, Thanks so much for taking the time to write a review. We love hearing from happy customers and we appreciate your feedback and your business! – Nancy

name: Nicky Johnson-Mitchell
text: Ray, Dr. Jenkins and the entire staff was great! We had an awesome experience on 5/29/19! Thank you!

name: Amanda Deel
text:
Dr's and exam were fine, it was everything else that wasn't.
The people who work in the store portion are rude & act like you are completely inconveniencing them.
The lenses I got didn't qualify for the 2 for $70 b/c they are specialty lenses, fine, but the frames I got are super cheap & won't hold the shape, really wish I'd gone elsewhere for those.
I ended up getting my contacts elsewhere for about the same price for 2 boxes as I would have paid for 1 here.
My advice, make sure you get that prescription before you leave b/c it is MISERABLE trying to deal with these people and have them send the prescription elsewhere for you.
The girl who answered the phone was INCREDIBLY rude as soon as she heard me say I was ordering them somewhere else cheaper & needed them to fax the prescription, I also had to call 3 times about this.
I would go here for an exam again, but I will make sure I get the prescriptions before I leave so that I never have to deal with any of the sales associates again.

text: Front end associates are not friendly and kind of rude. Rest of staff is awesome!

name: Chelsei Martin
text: If I could give the Dothan location 10 stars I would! From the moment I booked my appointment online, (they have after office hour appointments which was so convenient) to the call to pickup my glasses, these guys are a fine tuned machine. After waiting far too long for my annual exam (6 years) I found myself in a pinch when I developed chronic headaches and couldn’t get in to any “local” optomometrist. Needless to say within 2 days, a short wait time, and no time taken off work, I was sitting in an exam room with a Dr. who went above and beyond to explain the concerns and makeup of my prescription. The eye techs and staff went above and beyond to make sure I got the most bang for my buck with my insurance coverage. Here we are less than a week later and they’ve called to let me know my glasses are ready for pickup. Chains often get a bad rap, but these guys are convenient with customer service that surpasses all expectations!

resp.text: Hi Chelsei Thanks so much for taking the time to write a review. We love hearing from happy customers and we appreciate your feedback and your business! – Nancy

name: Consuelo Richardson
text:
Took my mama there two weeks ago. She picked out two pairs of glasses for $69..And additionally $15.99 to check for cataracts and glaucoma. Additionally $$ for the lens, additionally for regular lens verses bio focal lens..End up paying close to $500 for two pair of glasses.. Never will I listen to my brother again.
She will be going to Walmart from Now own.They don't have all of the hidden charges..Very disappointed with American Best.

resp.text: Hello Consuelo, I’m sorry you had a bad experience with us. Thank you for your feedback. This isn't the kind of experience we want our customers to have and we would like to investigate the issue further. Please email me at americasbest@nationalvision.com. Include the location you visited and the best way to contact you. – Nancy

name: Marie Johnson
text: I will not be back to America's Best. I have insurance which pays for my exam and glasses except for a $10 co-pay. They advertise two pair for a certain price, which almost no one qualifies for because it has to be only one prescription. If that was the case, everyone would just go purchase readers for $5. At checkout, they told me my bill was over $150. They didn't tell me that was for all the add-on's they thought I would want!! EXPLAIN the price before you tell the customer what you want them to pay!! I ended up paying $16 for my exam and one pair of plastic uncounted bi-focal lenses, which they said would be ready in a week to a week and a half. Two weeks and two days later, I called to check on my glasses. They were ready, but no one bothered to call and tell me.

resp.text: Hi Marie, I’m very sorry that happened to you. Thank you for taking the time to reach out to us. I’d be happy to connect you with someone from corporate management to see what we can do to help resolve this. Just email me at americasbest@nationalvision.com with your contact information and the store you visited. Thanks, Nancy

name: Curtis Ryan
text: I am amazed how helpful these people are! I had a problem with the fitting of my glasses they ordered me new frames to make it right. Friendly staff and they really try to make you happy!

resp.text: Hi Curtis, Thanks so much for taking the time to write a review. We do love hearing from happy customers! Thank you for being our customer and your business! – Nancy

name: Jennifer Pope
text:
I visited this store a few days ago and it was very busy and this guy Ray was doing too much talking and I had to tell him a few times I didn’t need his help because I was waiting on my husband. He was all over the place and I guess he may have been some type of manager due to the fact that he was dressed differently. Anyways, it’s a site to review so here I am doing that! He needs to work on not being so loud when talking to customers and stop bothering them after they say they do not need your help.

Now I did one test with a doll named Gabby, she was great during my testing phase and smiled the entire time and explained each testing she performed. Dr Jenkins went over my tests with me and he took his timeand he is a great doctor who does not rush through your eye exam. We finished and he handed me off to Latoria and she was amazing as well! I’ve never seen a manager be so kind and made sure that the glasses I picked out worked for my first time bifocals. Mind you the glasses I originally picked out before my test were actually too small and she simply said that since it’s my first time in bifocals let’s get a pair that would fit all of the prescription in it. She even entertained my kids while we all looked for bigger glasses. I thought this was going to be an awful experience from the Ray guy but Latoria and Gabby and Dr Jenkins made me feel very special and I got 2 pairs of bifocals for under $150! I can hardly wait to pick them up. Thank you to those 3 and I wanted somebody to recognize them for what they did!! So I wrote this post in hopes of this company reaching out to them and rewarding them in some kind of way at the Dothan Alabama Location!

resp.text: Hi Jennifer, Thanks so much for taking the time to write a review. We love hearing from happy customers and we appreciate your feedback and your business! – Nancy

name: Delia Goolsby
text: They won't tell you that you don't qualify for their promotions until after the exam (even though they could have checked my prescription from my current glasses). Terrible. I could have used my insurance somewhere else, but didn't think it would be a big deal since their complete eyeglasses promotion was so good and it included the exam. Big waste of money and time.

resp.text: Hi Delia, I'm very sorry, it sounds like possibly the offer wasn't explained to you properly.  I'd like to have someone reach out to you and help. Thank you, Nancy

name: Tukker Watson
text: Best Eye Doctor in Dothan !! Custome3r service is awesome and they are fast and freindly !! and affordable.

name: Karina Rodriguez
text: If I could rate this place zero stars, I would. Vanessa, the America's Best associate, was rude, racist, and very unprofessional with her duties. I scheduled an appointment for my dad in which she screamed at like if he were deaf with the most unnecessary attitude. If she handed him a sheet to read the letters off of and he went to this establishment to get an eye exam done because he clearly can't see well, this woman should have been understanding and patient. She was one of the most rude customer service associates I have ever encountered and I do not recommend this place to anyone. The America's Best in Opelika, AL was nothing at all compared to this unprofessional establishment in Dothan, AL so if you have time and want good service, go to that one instead.

resp.text: Hi Karina, I’m sorry for the rude behavior of our associate.  I would be happy to put you in touch with someone from the management team if you are interested. Just email me at americasbest@nationalvision.com with your contact information and which store you visited. Thank you. – Nancy

text: I do NOT recommend. I drove from out of town to come to this place because they told me they were VSP providers. Well, theyre not! Every staff member had an attitude. I'm not one to put reviews out on people, but I am just plain fed up with people working in the public eye that have attitudes. These people hire you to be accommodating and reasonable. Save your time and do not go here for your eye care.

name: Tanya Riley
text:
We recently lost our vision coverage due to cutbacks at company. I called Americas best for prices. I usually buy Escada frames or designer but no way no. I am disabled and budget is tight. The lady who answered was awesome and provided me with info I needed. As a former V.P. of a staffing company, I was so impressed by her I told her I would hire her if I still worked. Imagine my surprise to find out it was the manager, Nancy speaking to me.
I have appt next friday 25th of may. Lets hope it continues to be such a good experience and I get quality glasses. Ps. I called back with another question and the receptionist was just as nice.
Cross your fingers. My budget is tight but I'm hoping.
Tanya Riley

name: Wendy Meadows
text:
2/27/18*****I have just learned from the main cust care line that my glasses were not turned in until 2/21 which means the dothan office held my glasses for a week before turning them in to be repaired. i am beyond furious with this place. They are the absolute worst place ever. PEOPLE PLEASE READ ALL OF THESE BAD REVIEWS. DO NOT GET YOUR GLASSES HERE!!
i have very poor vision and recently my glasses broke. Thank god i purchased the warranty for free replacement. whats bad for me is that i don't have a 2nd pair since the original pair cost almost $300 due to bifocals. this place has the worst customer service. each day i call to check on my replacement glasses i am given a different story about where my glasses are. i have been unable to drive at night, i have had severe headaches everyday from not having my glasses. i am having trouble seeing at work, having to use cheap readers which are killing my eyes.  this place refuses to call the lab and check status on my glasses. they have no compassion for what i am going thru. i have wore glasses since i was in the 5th grade. i am now 50. this has been the worst 2 weeks for me not having my glasses. america's best are the worst. no compassion, no customer service. the staff makes up lies/stories about your order just to get you off the phone. i was referred here a year ago to get my glasses and i have referred several since but after this experience i will never go back or recommend anyone. i will be moving my business somewhere else for sure. you can't tell me that they have no communication with the lab that makes the glasses for their customers. that's the biggest bunch of bull i have ever heard. replacement glasses for someone with bad vision should be able to get some kind of rush service.

resp.text: Hi Wendy, I hope by the time you receive my response that you've gotten a call that your glasses are in.  If not, please email me at americasbest@nationalvision.com.  Include the location you visited and the best way to reach you and I will find out what the delay is. - Nancy

name: Jaye Full
text: This has to be one of the worst places I have been in my life . The customer service does not exist and the management is very unprofessional. I caught nothing but attitude because I wanted to pick up some freaking contacts. They was not helpful at all and honestly I'm not sure they even know what they are doing I was told to come back 3 times before they got it right. They do not ask if you want to join the club they just charge you. Instead of being nice and considerate they give you 20 reasons why it take sooooooo long. The rep presented no help at all only a excuse and attitude. I was only there to pic up contacts. She continued to talk under her breath to others about me and sent that bulldog manager that rushed out to me and threw me some trial contacts to me (I was there to pick up my prescribed contacts ) so I told her that I was there to get my contacts and she stormed off and came back . She didn't say I'm sort for the inconvenience or nothing just sat her round Pokémon butt down and stated the price so I had to ask her about what I was getting and she abruptly said what I was getting and rolled her eyes ( imagine that a manager). Please go only if you are desperate and on a budget. Hopefully you never get that hard up. They have much better choice and other places that truly care about their customers. Buyers beware. The disrespect you get is bad and not to mention I was calm the whole time. Still received attitude. This place is Horrible please review before you go to avoid the mistake I made. The Doctor is ok he's pretty easy going and attentive but those women up front and the manager are the worst. I would give no stars but you have to use one.

text: First time visiting EyeCare Associates and I absolutely loved it! Everyone was so nice and genuine from the time I walked in until the time I left. They also have a good selection of eye glasses to choose from and great promotion deals! I definitely recommend everyone to try them out.😁

text: The staff is very friendly and so helpful. I love that they sanitize all of the frames before and after you try them on. Great customer service and experience. Will definitely be back.

text: My husband and I are happy to be under the care of Dr. Drew Gann and his assistant who is friendly and professional.  The office staff is also friendly and helpful. Our vision is important we want it in the hands of someone we trust.

text: Staff and Doctors are very professional and courteous. They take their time and explain every procedure fully. They answer all questions and work to help you get the best price on any prescription glasses that you might need.

text: Great timely service and a very caring staff that will answer questions about your care.

name: Shewana Pickett
text: When I came in the doctors office I had to have my temperature checked and answer questions related to Covid 19. They did a thorough screening. The lady that did the screening was nice, and professional. The lobby had  2 seats that were six feet apart. I noticed that every one was wearing mask and that they had they on correctly and that every where they hand sanitizer in multiple places. The tech Les, both receptionist and Dr Drew were nice and professional. Dr Drew listened to me and he was so kind and knowledgeable of what was going on with my eyes. I have got my new prescription  yet but I will try to do another review when I do. So far I am very impressed.

name: Brie Williams
text: I really enjoy my choice to have eye care associates as my provider. The staff are so nice and friendly.

text: The staff and Dr. Drew were awesome. We are extremely pleased with the level of care.

text: Very professional and friendly atmosphere. They are always very helpful. At this time they are really in appliance with the "covid-19" rules and regulations.

name: Roderick Brown
text:
I normally get my eyeexam/glasses from Walmart, but I missed my appointment due to work and was told it would be a month and a half before the next opening.

Luckily enough Eyecare Associates was close by and could see me in a week instead.  The staff was very kind and the doctor was very helpful.   Especially so to the point that he gave me a full explanation of the purpose for each test and what the results from each meant.  I was at ease when he showed me I had a small bleed in one of my eyes that he was sure was not a serious issue.  Comforting to know.

I had a particular style of glasses that was not in office, so the doctor's saleswoman worked with me to find the closest thing to it and ordered three choices for me to have sent to her to try on

Overall, I'm happy and will come again.

I called to get contacts and was told, I couldn't be seen anymore because the insurance company had called to see which person was seen at the clinic, me or my daughter. And the " doctor " felt like that was bad business because it was implied that the office was doing fraud.

name: Demetria Cass
text: Dr. Cargus is a great doctor. The visit went well. But I wasn’t seen until 1 hour and 15 minutes after my scheduled appointment. I love a medical professional that respects my time.

name: CASSANDRA SANDERS
text: Dr. Cargus is very professional, knowledgeable and compassionate.I strongly recommend her, she far exceeded my expectations.

name: K L Thomas
text: She's 100% present. She explains everything and very knowledgeable 💖

name: Shalonda Williams
text: I love Cargus eye care! Love everything about them. Loving, caring, & patient staff!

name: Lisa Lane
text: Dr. Pate was very patient, informative, and friendly. Front desk staff very helpful in helping me select frames.  Very happy with my visit

name: Chasati Lane
text: The doctor is nice but the rest of the staff is scatter brained. If you want your prescription filled take it elsewhere because they're so unorganized and they do not return phone calls either!

name: Kimberly Ingram
text: Great, friendly staff! Doctor was great for the whole family!

name: Sharon Mays
text: Love Dr Cargus she cares about her patients my husband had problems and she called to check on him before leaving for her family vacation

name: Susan Clayton
text: My family has been going to Hour Glass Optical for over 15 years for the quality service, product and expertise.  Danny  always takes the time to sit down and talk to us about how to best meet our needs for glasses and contact lenses.  His advice is always spot on and he is dedicated to helping us stay within our budget with noticeably better prices than his competitors. Additionally, his staff is very friendly and helpful. I strongly recommend Hour Glass Optical!

resp.text: Thank you Susan for the 5 stars and the awesome review you gave Hour Glass Optical. And I thank you and your family for all the years that you have trusted us with your eyewear needs We are fortunate to have so many long time customers who come back year after year as you have done.

name: Nathan Gonzalez
text: Excellent work is done here. Very thorough eye exams, great frame choices, everything done on the spot, fast. Definitely coming back here.

Best Regards,
Danny Williams

text: It was a pleasure to visit with the staff and the frame selection was great.  Mr. Danny was able to repair my glasses that had been damaged. resp.text:
Thank you Vicki for the 5 star review and your kind words We appreciate your business and look forward to serving you in the future.

Best Regards,
Danny Williams

name: Hope Angela
text: Amazing service! I needed an emergency pair of glasses. I called ahead and they pulled the lenses ahead of time. I picked out frames and they made them faster than I thought possible. Thank you so much, HGO!
