name: Lindsay Cannon
text: I'm a fraidy cat of things coming at my eyes and Dr Melanie Cox made everything go smooth. She was very patient and was just so very personable. She was everything that could have been good for me in that whole appointment.

name: Dusty Patrick
text: The Guy that sold me my glasses is great at his job very polite and knowledgeable give him a raise as far as i am concerned he was helpful enough i bought my glasses there and i plan to bring my wife there for her glasses!!!

resp.text: That’s great news! We appreciate your review and hope to see you again!

name: Kyzmen
text: Very nice store! Love the staff!!

resp.text: Thank you for your review. Our associates are some of the best around and we are always happy to hear our customers feel the same!

name: Presley Frederick
text: Lenscrafters at ParkPlace has always been very helpful in choosing the right lenses and frames. I have have been going here for years. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Hi Presley! Thank you for your review! We appreciate the feedback and look forward to serving you again!

name: Nathan Slate
text: Great customer service with people that genuinely care about people.  I personally don't wear glasses but had an eye emergency on a weekend and with little notice they went out of their way to help me out. Thank you so much.

resp.text: Hi Nathan! Thank you for your review. Our associates are some of the best around and we are always happy to hear our customers feel the same! We look forward to serving you again!

name: Zoe Hooker
text: My husband and I live near Nashville and I was in an emergency situation at 5pm on a Saturday when I found myself without any glasses - we called every glasses store in the Nashville/Middle Tennessee area and no one could help us until the following Monday or Tuesday. We called this LensCrafters and Caleb was amazing with us. He said to drive on down (the hour and a half away) and he would make sure we were taken care of. Him and Karen were absolutely amazing and the perfect example of customer service and care. They even stayed after hours to make the lenses and make sure we were taken care of. Thank you so much for all your amazing service!

resp.text: Hi Zoe, thank you for your review. Our associates are some of the best around and we are always happy to hear our customers feel the same!

name: Jonathan M
text: I was traveling and needed to get a replacement pair of glasses.  They refused to honor a prescription from another office and required me to get a new prescription from them in order to buy glasses.  I’ve never had this issue at any other LensCrafters location.

resp.text: Hi Jonathan, thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear about your experience and would like to learn more. Please go to bit.ly/LC-LUX so we can follow up with you directly.

name: Nichole Jarvis
text: Jason is just the best! Zach isnt too bad either. Karen is very cool. The whole staff is comprised of ROCKSTARS.

name: Angel Shorty
text: I needed an appointment as soon as possible due to my dog chewing up my glasses. I was very pleased with them getting me in as fast as they did and they worked with me when I was late because of traffic. They exam went very well, the doctor was very friendly. However, when they exam was over and I went to pick out the lenses to go in the frames I had picked out, the lady did not give me the options of lenses I could receive same day. Here I am thinking that I am going to get them same day, but don't find out that it could be a week before I actually get my glasses until after I make the payment. I should have been given the same day options first knowing that I have no glasses until those come in. I am now going on a week without glasses.

name: Thatmanstu MotoConcepts
text: Everyone was courteous, helpful and professional.

resp.text: Thank you for your review. Our associates are some of the best around and we are always happy to hear our customers feel the same!

name: Linda McClendon
text: Excellent customer service and frame selection. We were in and out in 45 minutes (We provided the RX). Text message received within 30 minutes that single vision eyeglasses were ready. A little pricey so removed one star.

name: Nathan Owens
text: This location has the absolute worst customer service I have ever experienced for any medical exam.  My schedule appointment was at 10 am and they did not get me back until past 11:30!  The front desk lady was completely rude and had no patience when it came to any questions.  I had to return a second time to follow up for my contacts.  The same front desk lady ignored us for 30 minutes when we tried to sign in.  She flirted with some young adult men for another 30 minutes after she acknowledge we were there - I guess chatting with a friend is more important than a customer.

name: andrea sharp
text: Was not impressed.  I felt like the optometrist rushed me through as fast as she could.  The only good thing there was a very nice worker helped me find the right frames for my face.  Will not be back to the optometrist.

name: Ryan Coons
text: I ordered lenses for my existing frames at the LensCrafters at the Parkway Place Mall in Huntsville, AL. However, I cannot get them installed into my frames because one of the lenses is the wrong size. Despite the time and expense of grinding a bifocal lens, it never occurred to anyone involved to question lens sizes. Due to my on-call status and vacation plans, I can't receive my correct lenses for at least three weeks. I had to use up leave from work to arrive before the lab closed; I will never get those hours of leave back. I have to spend even more leave time to return, since LensCrafters can't do a job right the first time. I should not have trusted LensCrafters with this important job.

name: Nikki Nicole
text: I went to this location for the first time because I was already at the mall. Usually I go to the one on university drive per closer to my home. However, I was pleased with the customer service that I received, the beautiful lady went above and beyond to help me find glasses that compliment my face.

name: Anthony C. Wilkerson
text: I have been going here for the past 3 years and all of that is mute because of the horrible experience I had over the phone. I felt like the rep did not show any empathy for me being a dissatisfied customer and made no effort to try and make me a happy customer.

name: Edward Brewer
text: Get a good novel to read you'll be here several hours. Had a 4:30 appointment and it's now 6:30 and I still haven't seen the optometrist.

name: Victoria True
text: Wish I could give zero stars. Really rude people. Especially over the phone.

resp.text: Hi Victoria, thank you for your review. We apologize for your experience as we aim to consistently meet and surpass customers' expectations. Please go to bit.ly/LC-Support so we can follow up with you directly.

name: Pamela Hideko
text: One semi rude staff member & one that was very pleasant

name: Harrison Gough
text: Justin at lensecrafters in the mall did an awesome job changing out the lenses in my persols, even as they had a crack in them. Also, he straightened them out and conformed them to my face. They feel better than ever now. Thanks Justin!

name: Dana Buchanan
text: The wait wasn't long n I was a walk in. Staff was extremely friendly.

name: Amy Hammett
text: After reading a few of the reviews, I was hesitant because I was a walk-in, but I also didn't have a lot of time to wait around.  I was afraid that I would have a long wait, but I didn't. They had me out of there in an hour. Dr Burk was extremely helpful & professional, & the other ladies were also very nice & helped me decide which glasses looked best on me.

name: Kirk Rose
text: They are required to take all walk ins. That means even if you have an appointment, you will be waiting hours! Then even if you pay for everything at the time of service/purchase, they still might send you a bill 3 months later blaming it on a slow insurance process. Do yourself a favor and go to America's Best Eyecare at the Oxford Exchange.

name: jayla reese
text: Best vision center I’ve EVER been too and I’ve been doing this since 4th grade. Highly recommend they’re so professional

name: Secret “Yo mamma” Shopper
text: The manager is rude and  short with ppl

name: Celia Highland
text: Appointments mean nothing here! First visit-waited over an hour. Second visit- waited over two hours. Third visit- scheduled during my lunch hour, explained that I had an hour to get back to work and see my patients at their scheduled appointments, I was told six people ahead of me and that's impossible. Rescheduled again.......was told I'll tell the doctor you didn't want to wait. Again, explained that I had patients to see today, has nothing to do with want. After nearly $200 and wasted time, rescheduled for tomorrow. I CAN'T get my rx that I've paid for without the last visit.  The staff is extremely rude, unpleasant and lack empathy and or understanding. The eye doctor herself,  is very knowledgeable and friendly,  but you cannot speak to her without wasting your time and discarding your own responsibilities.

name: Big Joe
text: Have patience if you go here, youre gonna have to schedule follow ups just to finish the prescription and the doctor isnt in but 3 short days during the work week so its going to end up costing you on your paycheck. Between the doctors needs to rebuttal and defend herself, a long terminalogy for attitude, and the tardiness--- youre not going to leave terribly satisfied. Tammy the associate there was very helpful and nice however, im glad she left notes to the doctor about my dissapointment. Hey, its Oxford AL.

name: Steven Lee
text: I.Love this eyes and pharmaceutical medical and medicine needs.

name: Caitlyn Harris
text: I've had problems with my vision for 13 years or so, and I had the BEST experience with the vision center; not only is the doctor amazing, the entire support staff she has is just as kind. Those that work at the counter near the glasses are very helpful and knowledgeable as well! I'll give a special shout-out to Melinda because she was truly one of the most pleasant people I've ever spoken to; she's been in the eyeglasses business for some time now, so she has great tips and tricks for us glasses wearers! Thank you, Melinda!

name: Craig Winn
text: Location has changed recently. It is now up by the cash registers. Always busy...too busy. Hard to get help. They make great glasses though. Pricing is also excellent on their glasses and they take most insurance. They have an eye doctor on site.

name: Miss Ro
text: So after reading these reviews, I was very skeptical about trying this place.😕 Upon arrival to my appointment, I instantly regretted the decision. 😒 I was told that my appointment was the day before. 😦However, this is not what I was told when I made the appointment and put the date in my calendar. 🧐 The staff was very accommodating though and offered me another appointment for later that day. 🙃 Then I was sent a text stating that I had missed the other appointment 🤨. Surprisingly, the doctor’s visit was amazing. 😋 She was friendly, easy to talk to, extremely knowledgeable and very professional. Dr. Compton ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

name: Jenna Reardanz
text: Dr. Emily Compton was great! Answered any questions I had in a very knowledgeable way. The whole office was very friendly and efficient. Also great COVID precaution!

name: Lucas “Doc” Dockendorff
text: We drive all the way from Shreveport, LA to see Dr. Rubino. I don't think there is much else I could tell you that tops a 7 hour drive with an infant for an eye exam. They should have a secret 6th star.

name: Jan Gautro
text: Have bought at least 4 or of glasses and received nothing but excellent service from the vision dept!  They are as conscientious as they can be with as busy as they are!  Never dealt with the Dr there but the rest of the staff is knowledgeable & helpful!  Can’t say enough good things about them and the prices can’t be beat!!!

name: Lee Franklin
text: Ignore the matched "Harris" 1 star reviews (So blatantly from same people), no sympathy for someone who shows up so late for an appointment.  I have been using Dr Rubino for years and she continues to amaze me, and the quality, knowledge and cost of glasses in the vision center is amazing.  One of the best places you can go.  Don't show up at 4:50 for a 4:30 appointment, though.  =)

name: Jim McDade
text: I have purchased three pair of eyeglasses at Costco for personal use. The first pair was fine. The last two pairs both fell apart in less than two years. Very disappointing and all the employees said was that they were sorry about it, but couldn't do anything. The metal nose pad post fell off of my second pair and I didn't notice it until a small abrasion caused by the rough spot where the post was anchored started to bleed after a few hours of wear. The second pair that failed (Perry Ellis) brand worked well for about a year before mysterious striations began to appear in the lenses. These were not scratches. I took the glasses to Costco and all the tech did was scratch her head and ask me what I had done to them. I am 60 and have been wearing eyeglasses since I was 13, so I know how to take care of my glasses. A close inspection revealed that the Perry Ellis frames were shrinking over time, placing constant stress on the lens material. I will never buy eyeglasses from Costco again. It looks like normal UV exposure from sunlight (I go to ball games a lot), caused the organic bonds in the frame material to slowly break down, resulting in the shrinkage. They were just low-quality frames with a fancy designer name on them.

name: John Allen
text: I had my eye exam and bought a pair of glasses at 12:30 on a Saturday. Costco members will know that 12:30 on Saturday is about the craziest time there is at Costco. Dr. Rubino was courteous, efficient, and most importantly, thorough. The staff at the frame and lens sales counter were just as courteous and efficient. I genuinely felt that they met my needs for a prescription and glasses, and there is no doubt that I got a great value out of my glasses and lenses. If you don't have any pressing ophthalmic issues, you are cheating yourself by not using Dr. Rubino and Costco

name: Shawn Shallow
text: Made an appointment.  Waited 30 minutes and got bumped for somebody that skipped their earlier appointment.  Decided not to wait 60 minutes and left.  All I can say is don’t bother.  Service is terrible.

name: Kacey Harris
text: My daughter (5yrs old) had an appointment with Dr. Rubino today at 4:30. I called at 4:30 and spoke with her letting her know we were close by but we’re going to be a bit late due to traffic from a wreck. She said okay and then called me back at 4:50 (we were in the parking lot at the time) to tell me that she could not see my daughter that they close at 5:00 and she would not have time to see her we would need to reschedule. This was not just a routine eye exam...I had called and made the appointment on Thursday because my daughter has been seeing floaters, which I have learned are not common in children and should be checked out soon. Dr. Rubino was aware of the reason of the appointment and still chose to not see her. I consider this to be very poor bedside manner and extremely unprofessional. I do not recommended going to her.

name: A.B. H***
text: Dr Rubino is friendly and a professional. I was referred to her by a friend and I have referred many to her. The review of two parents who were over 20 minutes late is unfair. How do the reviewers know whether the Dr had her own commitment to keep?  If the issue was that big of a concern they could have gone to Childrens Hospital or the UAB Callahan 24.7 eye emergency room. Dr.  Rubio has spent extra time with me due to changing vision issues and due to some recent health related causes. I have used other optometrists including those at Schaeffer and in other states. She has been the best by far. Highly recommend and I was skeptical due to her office being in Costco.

name: Nathan Harris
text: Very bad customer service by Dr. Jane Rubino. Appointment for a child cancelled after we called. Go somewhere else.

name: Angela Patel
text: great service

name: Lance G
text: Very impressed with my visit. Doctor and staff were very knowledgeable and professional. Will be back!

name: Anna Moses
text: Very happy and impressed with my doctor and the staff.

name: Pamela Parker
text: My first time at the Hoover location was great🙂 From the friendly GM (who got me in, even though I was late) to the young lady that found my insurance, and the young lady that checked me out they were AWSOME! Let me not forget my optometrist AWESOME AS WELL🙂 GREAT STAFF! THANKS GUY'S

name: Travis Mack
text: HELLO EVERYONE!!! I AM VERY EXCITED TO POST MY FEEDBACK ON THE EXCELLENT SERVICES THAT I RECEIVED AT AMERICA’S BEST ON JOHN HOPKINS PARKWAY!!! EVERY INDIVIDUAL WHO ASSISTED ME WERE PROFESSIONAL, KNOWLEDGEABLE, NICE, HELPFUL, INSIGHTFUL, AND HAPPY WITH SMILES!!! I ASKED FOR A DIFFICULT REQUEST AND THEY ALL WORKED TOGETHER TO FIGURE OUT IF THERE WAS AN ALTERNATIVE THAT WOULD WORK FOR ME!! ANY QUESTION A I ASK A TEAM MEMBER, WORKS HARD TO FIND A SOLUTION!! I WANTED TO WEITE IN CAPS BECAUSE THIS WAS AN EXAMPLE OF TRUE PROFESSIONALISM!! THEY PUT THEIR CUSTOMERS FIRST!!! DR. MILLS IS AN OUTSTANDING DOCTOR!! THEIR MANAGER WAS VERY POLITE AND KNEW HER STUFF!! MS. JENNIFER WHO CHECKED ME OUT WAS ALSO VERY NICE AND PATIENT WITH ME!! I HOPE THIS TEAM STAYS TOGETHER!! I WILL DEFINITELY CONTINUE TO RECEIVE SERVICES FROM THEM!! BE BLESSED!!!

resp.text: Thanks so much for taking the time to write a review. We love hearing from happy customers and we appreciate your feedback and your business! The team that assisted you will get corporate recognition for your kind words.  – Nancy

name: Stefanie Snider
text: Dr. Mills made my experience wonderful! She was so professional and pleasant, I definitely recommend her and the staff at America’s Best in Hoover.

resp.text: Great to hear!  Thanks so much for taking the time to write a review. We appreciate your business! – Nancy

name: mykayla lynn
text: Rowena Bowen, the General Manager, was so much help, she didn’t let my grandmother leave until she had what she needed, she kept my grandmother from spending $500 on glasses. This woman is a true angel and we were thankful to cross paths with her!

resp.text: We love hearing about experiences like this.  Thanks so much for taking the time to write a review.  Your feedback is greatly appreciated! – Nancy

name: DaVida Stephens
text: I super loved my experience at 2798 John Hopkins Parkway in Hoover store #112!!! From the phone with Sarai (Sarah) she was very understanding and actually took the time to schedule my son same day without an appointment!!! That was a big deal due to my schedule. Thanks Sarai!!! When we got there her awesomeness was present she welcomed us and was very nice and professional!!! I was also welcomed by Rowena... she added elegance by her nice welcoming customer service and her beautiful pink 2 pice skirt set... and compliment of my attire! She was very professional and understanding and educated. Thanks Rowena!! Then to Ms. Linda we went... she was very calm and friendly!!! She gave me concerned vibes!! Thanks Linda. Then what completely sealed the deal for me was the wonderful Dr. Kendra Mills!!! Man I was so happy with her tenderness with me and my son. She was very understanding of my question about my son's eyes, she was very kind and caring, she was very soft and professional ❤, and such a lady!! I didn't want to leave lol!!! The entire office gave me good vibes from beginning to end. Thanks you all!!! A great experience indeed!!! Gid bless you all #gotothislocationyall

name: Greyson Davis
text:
They were all really nice. Dr. Silliman is absolutely awesome. He stayed late for me to get my exam. Someone needs to hire some MORE people. But the people that are there really work hard to get EVERYTHING done. They are constantly running around and smiling while doing it.

HOWEVER if you are trying to call and get ANY information about an order you gave them $709 for you’re not going to get it. You get put on hold before you can even say “okay” or no I don’t want to be on hold I’ll just call back. If you aren’t making an appointment you’re forgotten. I got tired of holding after 30 min and called again, someone answered and said I was going to have to hold and I said no I’ll just call back later and she said wel, someone can take your call now.... SHE PUT ME ON HOLD and I sat there for about a minute until I was angry and gave up. All I wanted to know was if they could provide me with an expected delivery date of my glasses because I live pretty far from the office and would like to have a little bit of a plan as to when I’ll have to go back to pick them up. 2 hours later... still no info

Okay I take it back, UPDATE maybe they were having a Monday and I was too because I just called and they were super nice. Sometimes people just have bad days and I may have called on one of those bad days for the whole store. Thank you guys for helping me see. ❤️❤️❤️

resp.text: I’m very sorry you had an unpleasant experience with us.  Thank you for your feedback.  Did they hand-write an ETA on your receipt? Orders can take up to 10 business days, not including weekends or holidays. I'd be happy to have someone from the leadership team reach out to you about this. If you'd like, please email me at americasbest@nationalvision.com.  It’s very important to include the location you visited, your name and your phone number so we can help as quickly as possible. Thank you, Nancy

name: Vanessa Whitfield
text: I had an appt. for over a month, arrived, checked in and was in waiting area when I was told if I didn't wear a mask, they could not provide service.   I explained I had a medical condition and could not wear a mask several times.  I felt discriminated against and embarassed because of the treatment I received.  I will NEVER recommend you guys to anyone.  If everyone else wears a mask and I'm 6 ft from everyone, how can my not wearing a mask affect you? It doesn't.   Makes NO SENSE.  When you can select and chose who you help IT IS DISCRIMINATION.  You lost a lot of business because of how I was treated.  Your business needs to seriously rethink customer service.  It's because of your customers, you have a business.  It is not a law nor even a state mandate that a mask is required.  Medical reason or not, what you did was disgraceful.

resp.text: We apologize for any inconvenience. As a healthcare retail establishment, we are committed to the safety of our customers and associates. Our enhanced COVID-19 protocols can be viewed here https://www.americasbest.com/health-statement. If you have any further questions, please call 855-985-0949 or email HealthandSafety@nationalvision.com. Thank you, Nancy

name: Julie Cartledge
text: My appointment was at 1:30 and I arrived at 1:37 because of traffic delays. I was told I had to reschedule because the doctor had already gone to lunch. Besides the fact that my eye appointment would have taken more than 7 minutes, since when are people not allowed a grace period? The receptionist was quite rude and not willing to offer any explanation except that I had to reschedule. Well, I didn’t reschedule nor will I. I’m taking my business elsewhere.

name: Brenda Gonzalez
text: Great customer service and way more affordable than Schaeffer Eye Center. Dr. Mills is great. The staff has made my experience here great.

name: Pooloo UpInHere
text: To all who value friendly customer service, cleanliness and time, America's Best in Hoover is the place to go. I visited there Tuesday and was in and out. The only problem I encountered was me deciding on the perfect frames. There is a huge selection to choose from and none of them look cheap. I had such a great time there, I will choose all my exams and glasses from this location. The Dr. seemed to care about the health of my eyes and was thorough with all concerns I had. She was a joy as well as the entire staff. Shout out to Jamir for your kindness in trying to repair my old glasses. It was an absolute pleasure interacting with the everyone. Nothing negative here to say...sorry.

resp.text: Thanks so much for taking the time to write a review. We love hearing from happy customers and we appreciate your feedback and your business! – Nancy

name: Kendall Black
text:
Rude, not helpful at all during this time of crisis, sarcastic, and refused to give me the name and number of the supervisor for Angela, the store manager. Our business isn't important to this manager. I will NEVER return to this store and recommend strongly that no one else does either.

UPDATE:  I continued to use this facility, regardless of my past comments and feelings.  All b/c I had their eye care plan.  I shouldn't have done that.  Their eye care plan or whatever it's called is not worth it.  So, if you're a person that reads reviews and takes them to heart.... My advice to you is find an eye doctor that is there every time you go into their office, so you actually SEE the same eye doctor each time.  A doctor that will explain to you what's going on and makes the time to answer your questions.  A doctor that CARES about your eye health or lack there of, depending on the situation.  A doctor and his staff that know what customer service is all about.  A doctor and his staff that will work with you on the health of your eyes.  I'm dealing w/ these people today, b/c I have to.  But I won't do it again.  I don't care if I have to pay twice as much to see another eye physician.  America's Best does not care about it's patients.  Not in the least.  Not at the office level or corporate level.  It's so glaringly obvious.

name: Tony Bruno
text: Everything is an upcharge and it's a real scammy place that wants to sell a yearly membership and runs very misleading ads for free eye exams. I will not be using them again.

name: Ana Aguilar
text: This place is not friendly at all. They have the worst receptionist. She is so rude and I noticed her talking behind my back with the guy that works there. She was so rude to everyone. The only nice person is the Hispanic young lady. Other than that this place is horrible! That receptionist needs to get a warning. Looking at other reviews I am not the only one that thinks she needs a write up!

name: Susana Duran
text: Went for my 3rd visit to get new glasses, and every time I go, it's an amazing experience. The prices are good, the staff is friendly, and the place is always super clean! Recommended it to all my friends and family and they all love it as well!

resp.text: Thanks so much for taking the time to write a review. We love hearing from happy customers and we appreciate your feedback and your continued business! – Nancy

name: Jamie Rogers
text: I went in for my appointment and the staff is really friendly. The doctor was great and he took time with me and went over everything. I definitely recommend going here for your eye care needs!

name: Katrina Travis
text: I have been to this location several times . I got my last pair of glasses here and at that time i had no problems . The staff was very helpful and friendly. But this time the receptionist was awful. She was rude. She took my ins card  that clearly had my husbands name and employer information on it. She had me wait for over 20 minutes in the waiting area . I  walked back to the receptionist  desk to find her doing nothing and asked for my ins. card and to find out what was taking so long and she stated oh I haven’t ran your ins yet but you do have VSP . SO , I’m like how do you know that if you have not looked into the information. So she said I will in a minute very rudely. I had to ask her to pull my file if she needed additional info and  told her that i was not a new customer, everything should be in my file nothing had changed. She rolled her eyes and just sat there looking as if I was bothering her.  Then she finally looked up and said I need your husbands DOB and the last four of his social on this sticky note and you can have a seat. I said no ma’am run my ins and give me my card back please. By then they were calling me to the back for my exam. Let me just say the rest of my appointment went well . The Hispanic lady did well with helping me with my contacts ,but i honestly think they have lost a customer . I don’t have time for attitudes where I’m spending my money. I even ordered my contacts to be delivered to my address so I wouldn’t have to go back to the store and I will probably order my glasses online from another company.

resp.text: I’m very sorry you had an unpleasant experience with us.  Thank you for your feedback.  This isn't the kind of experience we want our customers to have and will investigate the issue further.  If you'd like to speak with someone from corporate management, please email me at americasbest@nationalvision.com.  It’s very important to include the location you visited, your name and your contact information so we can help as quickly as possible. Thank you, Nancy

text:

2798 John Hawkins Pkwy #112, Hoover, AL 35244

text: Stephanie and the other staff were kind, courteous, and very fast. Great place!

name: Tiffany Walls
text:
I had a wonderful experience at this location. It had been about 5 years since my last eye exam. I used to suffer from horrible migraines (which I seem to have remedied) and I still do suffer from pretty frequent headaches and some other minor issues (floaters, some blurring in my vision, straining with low-light situations).

Facy was the front office associate that greeted me and verified my insurance. She was VERY sweet and helpful.

Linda did my preliminary eye exam and field testing. She was very kind, very patient and overall pleasant to interact with.

Dr. Mills is AMAZING. She is such a kind human being, she listened thoroughly while I talked about my history and concerns. She did not lose patience or make me feel rushed during my eye exam (especially when I had difficulty deciding between which two lenses looked more clear). We chatted while she checked out my eyes after dilation and she was just a joy. I love love love the experience I had with her and the fact that she is a WOC sealed the deal for me.

Cecily was a peach and walked us through what insurance would cover, our many options for lenses and frames and was able to play with some numbers so that we were able to get the most bang for our buck based on our needs.

I'll come here to update about receiving our glasses, the fitting and how things turned out but the experience overall was wonderful!

***Our glasses were ready for pickup 5 days after our appointments! We both got multiple phone calls letting us know they were ready.

The only reason that I couldn't quite give a 5 star review was that some of the staff that worked in the front were not as polite and patient (my wife didn't have such a great experience with the person who assisted her at first). Everything else was fabulous and we intend to make this our home for vision care even though it's in Hoover and we live in Calera. It was worth it!

resp.text: Hi Tiffany, Thanks so much for taking the time to write a review, we appreciate your business and look forward to helping you with your eye care and eye wear needs in the future. – Nancy

name: Biff Tadrickson
text:
I liked Jody's until today. I went in. One. customer in the store other than myself. I asked for side shields for my safety glasses. She asked "the permanent kind?"or something else. I replied the kind these are because I've only seen the other little plastic/rubbery temporary kind. As she walked to the back to check for them, YES I did see the little head shake like I just ruined her day. As she was walking back I told her I'd like to get two pair. She came back with one, which was fine because I needed them. Then she threw in I've got two but I'm gonna keep them. I case someone else needed them  What??? I was expecting to pay for both sets. It's true I have two sets of glasses for work and a leisure pair. If I'm not mistaken all of which were previously bought on the same from the location. As she started to enter me in the computer she asked my birthday. I decided then since she was unconcerned enough about the customer in front of her then that was that.
I used to recommend Jodys to folks but no more. Sorry just the truth. By the way no more business from me.

text: I had good experiences coming here. Good staff and helped a lot. Way better than Florence eye center and cheaper too

name: Lorinda Davis
text: Absolutely the best customer service! This is our second visit and have always been treated in a timely manner. Staff is wonderful especially with kids! Would highly recommend!

name: Robin Whitekiller
text: Two women working behind the front desk never acknowledged our presence. It was unacceptable. We waited five minutes and then left. One was on the phone but the other was not. We will take our business elsewhere.

name: Terry Shapiro
text: Absolutely the best optical personal I ever been  to. I have been wearing glasses for over thirty years. The gentleman that work's on the glasses is the best I ever dealt with. And a excellent staff. Service after the sell can't be beat.

name: RV
text: this place has repeatedly helped me when no other place would I am a disabled veteran dependent on the VA for optical and health care I would have had to drive over 120 miles for this service these people have adjusted my glasses as well as replaced nose pieces at no charge so I say kudos to them for helping veterans like me in this day and age I don't feel thanks is enough these are great people

name: Brandy Mooney
text: Lady at the desk was less than friendly, had to wait ten minutes after arriving to receive papers to fill out. Dr Snyder was rude and had absolutely no manners. When told we needed a contact exam and prescription for both contacts and glasses he didn’t seem to happy with the request. When told of the contacts that have been used and would like to continue (night and day) his reply was “Don’t make me fire you as a patient.” I sent in an online order- not from the office- for contacts I was denied because when the lens company called the office “not a patient” when I had a prescription in hand. Would not recommend Dr Snyder or his staff.

name: Anna Trousdale
text: Have always had a great experience with Dr. Snyder and his staff!!! Very friendly and speedy service!!! Keep up the good work!!! :)

name: Warren Crow
text: It had been some time between visits to an optometrist and my more regular ophthalmologists. I found the three assistants and one optometrist to be empathetic to my situation which I think is rare. I was treated well and taken care of by all. I think the eye exam series was the most comprehensive I have ever had. Being in my 60s I had conversations which included discussions of multifocal contact lenses and cataracts plus premium IOL choices. I loved the visit and will continue with this group. I am lined up for a multifocal contact lens fitting (why can't I be without glasses) and know I need an eyeglass pair with new prescription to back up contact lens use.

name: ST FU
text: My (now former) eye doctor requested unnecessary tests. It took months and several unreturned messages to get someone to answer my questions. The office staff and manager were not helpful and lacked urgency in returning my calls. When my call was finally returned the manager was not helpful nor cheerful. They did not care to listen to me as a patient and because of all these issues I do not recommend.

resp.text: Hello, I'm Cassie. I'm so sorry to hear about these tests and the difficulty you had reaching us, as well as the treatment by our staff -- this is definitely not the experience we want for our patients! I'd like to learn more about what happened. Could you please email me at cassiegoodwin@eyecare-partners.com when you have a moment? Again, I'm very sorry about this. I hope to hear from you soon.

name: lexi ivan
text: I was sent back within 10 minutes of my appointment time. The assistant was very efficient with the preliminary testing. Dr. Hines was very kind and informative. When I told her I wanted monthly contacts instead of dailies, she understood and didn't try to force dailies on me like many doctors. The rep in the frames room went above and beyond to help me pick out frames I was happy with. My first pair came two days after my appointment, and my second pair will be in within 2 weeks. I was very happy with my visit!

name: Erika McDonald
text: Everyone who works here is wonderful but Dr. Schwertz is really above and beyond fabulous! She listens and takes her time to address all concerns you may have and she truly advocates for her patients and what is in their best interest. She provides wonderful care and I highly recommend her.

name: Cindy Bynum
text: I highly recommend these guys! They are so great, efficient, and friendly. I see Dr. White, and she's phenomenal. She ensures to carefully explain everything and address any and every issue I have. You can tell they take great pride in their work and are very thorough. 5+ stars for these guys.

name: Jody Wilson
text: I experienced a long wait time when I went in last week. The Doctor is great. I think if your appointment is at 9:20, you should be seen within 20 minutes. I will admit the I am impatient. All of my other appointments at other establishments see me within 5 minutes.  What’s the point in having a appointment, if you can’t be seen around that time.

name: Jameisha Large
text: Excellent staff and service. I loved the atmosphere it was pleasant and welcoming. I really liked Dr. White he made me feel valued and my exam was informative and comfortable. I did not meet one rude person and neither was I left unattended when I was shopping for eyewear. So heck yeah I will be referring people to this location. Five Stars is what you deserve!

name: Lem Motlow
text: Will be changing offices due to the very poor time management and lack of respect for patients time. Every year i have been going for the past four i have had to wait for at least an hour for Dr. Hines. she is very good and pleasant , however either her or the office scheduling is not good. this is not a COVID issue. this has been each year. I work less than 1/4 mile from this location and with at least 4 other office co workers who use her and  like her but not her time management and lack of respect for patients time as many of us come on our lunch break. i understand emergency come up and may have to wait longer than usual due to unseen circumstances once in awhile but when its every year and joked about at office with co workers who use location office and Dr. then it is not us its YOU

resp.text: Lem, I'm Cassie. I'm so sorry to hear about the delays you've experienced visiting our office. I'd like to look into why this is happening -- could you please email me at cassiegoodwin@eyecare-partners.com when you have a moment? Again, I'm very sorry about this. I hope to hear from you soon.

name: Larry Futrell
text: Staff very friendly and professional. Dr. Hang is friendly, professional and very thorough with her exams. I always look forward to my appointments because the atmosphere there is delightful and very amiable!

name: Forrest Plummer
text: My first visit to the Hoover location. I was more than impressed with the professionalism by each associate from the front counter all the way around. Kara took care of all the preliminary tests and was beneficial in making me comfortable as I felt I was bombing several eye tests. Dr. Amos was very helpful explaining everything as she went along. I am looking forward to many years to come.

name: April Taylor
text: The entire staff was amazing when we had our first visit there a couple of weeks ago. My daughter and I were made very comfortable and the exam was very thorough. Dr. Hang is wonderful and easy to talk to. We will be coming back here and also bringing the hubby and my other daughter!

name: Fredia Dillard
text: Great place! Love Dr. Amos. I've been with her for 10 years now. She understands my issues and truly listens. She does not rush through an exam and will offer options.

name: Dawn Kirkland
text: Rob Pate and his staff are wonderful.  I always feel like they are so glad to see me and I have a deep level of confidence in the care I am receiving.  I have recommended Dr. Pate to everyone I have talked to who needs a great eye doctor--in fact, my husband is there this morning!

name: Teala McDowell
text: I had a wonderful experience at EyeCare Associates in Hoover! Dr. Amos definitely ranks at the top of the list not only for her physician skills, but also for her amazing care and concern for her patients, personally. I have been recommending her to all of my Alabama friends! If you are reading this review as you look for someone to take wonderful care of your eye needs, look no more...you found her!

name: Michelle Riley
text: From the time you enter the front door until you leave, you will experience excellent customer service. I recently move to Northern Alabama and I have no plans whatsoever to change eye doctors. I will gladly do the long drive.  They have modern equipment, clean and attractive office space and knowledgeable team members.  I'm sure all the doctors are great but I'm on Team Amos!

name: Derrick Mendez
text: As a patient of Dr. Hammond's for over 10 years, I continue recommend her to anyone I encounter who's in search of an eye care professional.  She is always willing to take the extra step to make sure her patients (which include several members of my family) are taken care of.

name: Marilyn Martin
text: I've been with Dr. Amos for about 38 years and always want her to check out my eyes.  She is very professional but also very friendly.  I recommend her to anyone who needs a wonderful eye doctor.

name: Suzanne Eberhardt
text: My children and I are all patients of Dr. Pate's. It has been a positive experience every time we have been to the office, even when we have walked in without an appointment to get my son's glasses fixed. I have also recommended him to several people and would not hesitate to do it again.

name: Latisha A
text: Today was my first visit and I was very impressed with the entire staff especially Dr. Pate.

name: S B
text: Apparently they changed owners and most of the staff has left.  Dr. Amos was fantastic  as usual but the 2 hour appointment, LONG wait, disorganization and terrible service from everybody else will have me looking elsewhere for my next checkup.

name: Brendolyn Terry
text: I miss dr.pate, but dr. Ansley is good too

name: Christian S
text: They miss represented the quality of the frames they sold me. The metal in the frames fatigued after 6 months and I had to replace them at full cost. This isn't why they get the 1 star. The 1 star is for the poor customer service. I will not return and do not recommend them for purchasing frames/Eyewear.

name: ChaLestar Hill
text: This office is absolutely AWFUL!!! Poor customer service and it takes so long to get your order back. I waited an entire month to hear from them and I have yet to pick up my glasses from them.

name: Henry Robertson
text: When my daughter broke her glasses, they were able to put her lenses in a new frame and it only cost me $18 total.  Outstanding!

name: Tara Johnson
text: Great customer service and friendly associates!!!

name: Leslie Finley
text: WOW!!!  I was expecting a nightmare coming for an eye test with a 2 year old.  But the ladies at the vision center were so nice and helpful.  The entire staff was friendly but professional .  They were so nice that my Grandson, Lucas was a perfect angel.

name: Jennifer DeGaris
text: My son has had great service there.  They are kind and helpful.

name: Tiffany
text: Very friendly staff and and quick service! Great eyewear selection

name: Janet Green
text: I have to say that the ladies that work in the vision center are great.  They are very nice and very helpful.  I came in there with my prescription in hand to purchase a pair of sun glasses there.  First of all, I went in on Friday and was told that I would get a call when they were ready, probably 1 week. However, I got a call the following Monday, that they were already done.  I have went in to get adjustments on the temples, and they have been so wonderful each time, eager to get the best fit. My sunglasses were about 1/3 of the price that I was quoted from a doctors office in town.  I plan to go back there for my next pair.

name: micah nash
text: All of the ladies here do a fantastic job!  It's enjoyable every time I go.

name: Karen Caldwell-Naylor
text: I love the doctor at the vision center but she doesn't seem to keep a very close watch on the girls she hires. More times than not, they are late or not caring to answer the phones when they are there. It gets very frustrating and it makes you wonder just how much business they are losing because of it.

name: Gail Chambers
text: I have gotten excellent service from a wonderful staff at this Pearle Vision for the past 4 years.  I would highly recommend them to anyone needing any type of service for their eyes whether it  be an eye check up or buying new new frames or even just an adjustment for you eyeglasses, you'll find it all here and walk out happy.

name: Gary Hazelton
text: Excellent support converting from bi-focals to progressive lenses. Good crew to work with!

name: Wendell B
text: I had a great experience Tara was exceptional she made the vist a pleasure

name: Joy Sullivan
text:
They refused to see me because I couldn’t wear a Halloween mask due to me being a asthmatic.
Exceptions could have been made.

name: Scott Jones
text: Friendly staff, was able to get in and out relatively quickly, would recommend.

name: Jeremy (Momsboy32)
text: This place has that small town eye place feel. The people are all great. The Dr. Chambers is very pleasant and she loves sci-fi, which is always a great thing. They have a really great frame selection. The wait time was very short for me to get my new glasses. Once they came in they made sure everything was great my my new glasses. I feel like I got an exceptional deal with great service.

name: samantha pearson
text: Dr. Chambers is amazing! Katy was also very nice and helpful with finding the perfect glasses for my style. I absolutely love them! Great job all around!

name: Maggie Granger
text: I’ve always been a contacts person, but my experience with PearleVision has converted me!   The staff was knowledgeable and helpful, and they found the perfect frames for me.  I’m complimented on them all the time.  My contacts have become my backups.  I will definitely be back!

name: Ceasar Carnes
text: I saw Dr. Chambers and have to say it was the fastest eye exam I have ever experienced.  She was in a hurry from the second she entered the exam room.  I was taken aback at her abrupt dismissal of me when I had questions.  As I continued the process of choosing frames, etc. I observed how the patients were being pushed through quickly.  I don't think this type of office is for me.

name: thomas elliot
text: I came in for an exam this morning and had a wonderful experience. Dr Chambers was helpful and informative and Jason found a great pair of glasses for me. couldnt be happier.

name: Chelsea Winborne
text: I love Dr. Chambers and Dr.Matalka! (I have not yet met Dr. Mallard, but I am sure they are lovely as well.) They are both very sweet and knowledgeable. I moved to Minor, AL and I still travel to be here.

name: erin price
text: I couldn't find the frames I wanted at my doctor. They had an amazing selection my new glasses are beautiful. Thanks Pearle!

name: Donald Matheson
text: I had a very nice check up with Dr Chambers and love the new glasses!

name: Malia Bunt
text: I've lived in a few different cities and been through several different optometrists. These guys run a tight ship. They are professional and friendly. I had tried to wear contacts before but, it never worked. My eyes would get too dry or I would waste them. The doctors at Pearle Vision took the time to find a pair of contacts that work with my eyes and for that, I'm eternally grateful.

name: Mike Carrasco
text: Dr.Chamber was awesome and really wonderful.First time walk in and was greeted by friendly staff.

name: william wesson
text: Awful customer service.  My husband went in to get a copy of his prescription and they refused to give him a copy....the young lady was very rude about it...including ripping out the prescription and throwing into the trash in front of him.  I am waiting on a response from corporate on this matter.

name: LNG_TTVblood
text: Rude people......never addressed me the whole 10 minutes I was in their store.

name: Elizabeth Peel
text: I went about 3 months ago and had a glasses and contacts exam, I cannot remember the doctor I saw but he was AWESOME.  The ladies behind the desk were nice enough but I don't think they used my insurance when I had given them both my insurance cards.  TODAY I called and spoke with Tammy on ordering some contacts and had insurance questions. She was EXTREMELY helpful and I now have contacts ordered and covered by insurance.

name: Alex
text: I have a feeling that these bad reviews are for old staff or something because my experience here was great! Everyone was SUPER friendly, fast, and you can get your glasses in an hour. I'll never go anywhere else!  The only negative is that some of the trendier frames are on the pricy side but that's not unusual.

name: Sidney Aplin
text: I'm not sure what the other reviewers experienced - I can only speak for myself and my own experiences. I have been coming to this Vision Master (well, Marx Optical technically) location for about 6 years and I have experienced nothing less than excellent service. The Dr. is terrific and she will do everything she can to address your needs. The rest of the staff is amazing as well. I have gotten both contacts and glasses from this location. When I voiced my concern about my insurance only covering 3 months of contacts, they gave me extra samples and gave me samples of a cheaper brand to try. Once I forgot to pick out new frames before I got my eyes dilated and they picked out the PERFECT frames for me. I didn't even see them first (I opted not to, they didn't just pick out frames without my knowledge). They even tightened a pair of cheapo glasses I bought online for free! I cannot recommend this location more. I've had nothing but great experiences here.

name: Honors gun and gaming channels
text: Be aware they lied about my warrenty and charged me for no glare coating and yes they refunded but this is irresponsible and annoying when we spend crazy amounts of money here yearly for me and my wife i would like the owner to reachout to me

name: Jeremy West
text: Excellent staff, top to bottom! They have a new lady, Victoria I think, who is an excellent customer care technician. Keep up the great work!

name: Scott Ricketts
text: A very great experience.

name: V Tarantino
text:
It took me almost 2 hours to get my exam. Not even just waiting. I was seen fairly quickly. The doctor just went on a 20 minute long rant about politics. Very unprofessional.
Then after they dilated my eyes without my consent, I worked as a driver right after my appointment so I had to call off work, she waited nearly an hour after she dilated my eyes to check them again of me just sitting and waiting.
I've had more professionalism at Walmart then here.

name: Karen F Smith
text: Great service and staff. Have used them for years

name: Steve Currie
text: Great staff and wonderful selection!

name: James Burton
text: Good experience.

name: K-Diva Licious
text: I absolutely love the staff they were all nice and friendly. The doctor is by far the best eye doctor that I have had. She is very thorough and informative. I always enjoy my appointment when I go there it's like seeing old friends.

name: Susan Johnson
text: My grandson’s glasses were broken so we went here to have them replaced or repaired. Gene was able to do a quick, temporary fix; also, gave us a coupon to use to purchase new glasses. We are always pleased when we go here. Dr. Vanoy always takes good care of my family! I highly recommend this location!

name: Tara Orie
text: Rip-off, you can get higher quality services at much cheaper prices out there. In short, my contact prescription was incorrect and my glasses prescription was incorrect; both of which resulted in my glasses being unusable as well as half of the contacts I purchased. In total I paid over $800 for all services and glasses/contacts. And now over a year later, I'm receiving calls from a debt collector claiming that I still owe another $100. Go somewhere else.

resp.text: Tara, I'm Cassie. I'm so sorry to hear about your experience in our office! I'd like to look into what happened. Could you please email me at cassiegoodwin@eyecare-partners.com when you have a moment? Again, I'm very sorry about this. I hope to hear from you soon.

name: jirah mccall
text: I love this place and the staff! Everyone is very friendly and helpful. I’ve never had a bad experience.

name: shirley jones
text: This is a very clean and professional environment! Dr. Karen is very patience and knowledgeable! She took her time with Sarah whom is disable.I highly recommend her services!

name: Lashaunda Barganier
text: The experience I had was very wonderful. The people there were very nice

name: Christinay Bogan
text: EVERYONE was really nice and verryyyy professional! My sister spoke volumes of you and this is why I chose to come. I am glad I did. I will be bringing my 8 year old daughter next.

name: Lorenzo Jones
text: I look forward to my yearly visit with the doctor and the staff are very pleasant

name: Christopher Cambron
text: It’s funny how I ended up with my appointment. They sent a text to someone else to verify their appointment. I said , they had the wrong number but I needed an appointment. So they set me one. I have never found a sweeter more knowledgeable staff. Looking forward to getting my new glasses. Thanks again girls for a job very well done.

name: Vanessa Cartet
text: Thanks So Very much for An Awesome Experience!

name: Paulette Boston
text:
I had an appointment with eyecare associates about  a month ago.
the optometrist that did my eye exam was very good I was very pleased.
the night mare began once I sat at the desk to choose my glasses.
the associate reviewed the order due to the fact that she was the expert on eyewear. I ended up with additional  things I did not really need on my
glasses. I got them home and could not see my work computer, everything was blurry even reading. I called and informed them that
the glasses was not working,, the optometrist rechecked my eyes and
the prescription it was good. I informed them it was the coating on the
glasses all that extra that had been added. they did an minor adjustment
I still could not see my computer it was still blurry. I  went back a third time and insisted that they remove all those coating-Ultimate Poly-Carb
Addon*Ultimate Poly*Anti-Reflective Premium*UV400, This was close to
ridiculous that I had to spend time running back and forth for a pair of
new glasses that I could not use. After those coatings were removed
I can see my work computer better but they are not better than my old
glasses. I was so frustrated and disappointed  not only to have to go back today to have the associate to remove the black pen mark they left on my
glasses when they were trying to make the corrections. I have never had this much trouble getting a new pair of glasses. This was not the type
of service that I was expecting, It was as if they could not seem to get
my glasses right.

resp.text: Paulette, I'm Cassie. I'm glad you enjoyed the optometrist at your visit, and I'm so sorry about all these issues with your glasses! I'd like to look into how this happened. When you have a moment, could you please email me at cassiegoodwin@eyecare-partners.com? Again, I'm very sorry about this. I hope to hear from you soon.

name: Kat Smith
text: No matter how long it's been, I feel like I'm visiting my family when I come there. Everyone is welcoming, warm, and genuinely glad to see me. I always leave with a smile! Their customer service is AMAZING!

name: audraruth
text: Very nice and professional.

name: Cindy Knox
text: I just appreciate how friendly everyone was. I felt like everyone genuinely cared about me as a person! Thanks for the excellent care!

name: Dawn Wilson
text:
I Love My EyeCare Family❤️
The Awesome Group has never let me down!

name: Nicholas Klein
text: Fantastic experience! I spent a few weeks in Birmingham on business and had experienced some eyesight issues in between my regular eye care checkups. I had a appointment scheduled very quickly and was treated with much care and respect. Everyone on phone and in person were very inviting and helpful and I highly recommend this location for your next eye care visit!

name: Teresa Henry
text: Staff very friendly and professional,Dr always kind and informative feel I'm in good hands with Dr Vanoy

name: oshields07
text: The service & staff is always amazing. Well informative & kind.

name: Homemade with Marsha
text: Everyone was very sweet !  And very helpful.

name: Latricia Faith
text: This was my first time visiting EyeCare Associates, Dr. Vanoy and the staff were very helpful and friendly. Dr. Vanoy thoroughly explained all information pertaining to my eye exam. I am happy that I chose EyeCare Associates for my eye care services.

name: Taylor Campbell
text: Very, very pleased with my first appointment here. The front desk and staff were wonderful! Very helpful and personable. Dr. Vanoy took the time to explain, in detail, something specific about my eyesight that I have never been told before; and I was amazed. After fitting me for the perfect contacts for my needs, I am blown away with the difference. I would highly recommend this office to anyone who asks.

name: Heels & Hardhats
text: Thanks for being so friendly, especially, since I had just buried my dad the day before. I needed the uplift. You guys are amazing and the service was out of this world. Again, Thanks!

resp.text: Ton, I'm so sorry to hear about your dad! Thank you for taking the time to write a review -- I'm so glad we could offer a little comfort. We're very glad to have you as a patient!

name: LP Key
text: Dr. Vanoy is knowledgeable and easy to talk to. The office staff is great as well. I have had great experiences with this office year over year.

name: Lacie Travis
text: The woman who did my exam was wonderful. I do wish there were more frame options. I had a hard time finding a pair I liked. I then had to ask multiple times for my prescription and PD to attempt to look for a pair online. They refused to give a PD unless I bought from them. I was under the impression that it was a part of the exam I paid for. I would've paid a fee for the convenience had that been an option. I ended up going across the street to another chain and they gave me those measurements for free. I was so happy with their service and frame options that I didn't even end up buying online, I bought 2 pairs from them. That little extra courtesy could've been a sale for them. I likely won't go back due to those circumstances. Again, the actual optician was wonderful. They just need more selection and they wouldn't have to worry about losing sales to other chains and online vendors.

name: Izz Noland
text: Thank you to Dr. Karen Vanoy for being thorough and explaining everything very well for my first eye exam. Thank you Carson for going above and beyond and sending me the retina scans, and thank you so much Janice for the process of choosing frames and lenses, getting me the best deals around!

name: ANew Friend
text: I always enjoy visiting the Eye Care Associates, Wildwood location. I appreciate all of the staff. Dr. Vanoy, Janice, Thomasina, and everyone else is always so nice.

name: Lindsey Waldrop
text: Wonderful experience, delightful staff and Dr!!

name: Tikesha Monique
text: Dr. Venoy and the entire staff were amazing.

name: media 411 news and interviews
text: Great experience great staff and awesome doctor

name: JENISE WALKER
text: Absolutely love th Dr, the office and the staff!

name: schadell lewis
text: Great staff and Great atmosphere!!! Everyone was very nice and made my first but not last visit feel like home. Thank you Eye Care Associates for taking out the time to explain everything that I wasn’t sure of.

name: africka overton
text: I love the Eye Care Associate. They are very loving and caring and personal. My children and I have been going there for about 15 yrs. And now my fiance is seen their now. Love you all don't change a thing

name: Jeffrey Marks
text: The staff is friendly the doctor who is on call is absolutely GREAT!!! I mean fantastic!!! The service is great the people are great. I can honestly say this is where I'll be coming from now on :) five thumbs up

name: Dennis Sheffield
text:
Did a great job!   Dr. Vanoy spend alot if time explaining things to me.  Can not think of anything I would change!
BTW, whomever rated this as one star must have meant to review the store two doors down, Dirt Cheap.

name: Lauren Bowerman
text: Great experience overall! The front desk workers were attentive, kind, and helpful, the man who assisted me in the first exam room was wonderful, and Dr. Karen Vanoy was thorough in her exam, answered all my questions, and even sent me a handwritten thank you card after my appointment. Would highly recommend for quality of care and service!

name: Larry Spencer
text:
I thoroughly enjoyed my visit. I am 35 years old and showed up with my mom for support. Lol! I have always been afraid to get my eyes examined; however, everyone was very professional and understanding. Dr. Vanoy explained everything to me and treated me like I was her child. She calmed my spirit. Everything was perfect! Thank you for going above and beyond to make me feel at ease.
The staff even helped me find a pair of glasses to fit me. - Regina Spencer

name: Hai2u Official (Slim)
text: My son had a great experience here, it was his first exam at an eye care place. Very friendly and helpful staff. Doctor was very helpful so was the male assistant. Very quick service!

name: Patricia McDonald
text: Staff is courteous and pleasant to deal with. Dr Vanoy is very knowledgeable and explains everything and answers any questions.

name: Angela Cox
text: They made my daughter very comfortable and at ease with the process of the exams. Dr. Vanoy is very knowledgeable and committed to better eye health of her patients. The staff is very helpful and professional!

name: Jessyca McKnight
text: 9 out of 10. My eyes are still out of focus and seeing starbursts at night from being dialated 2 days ago :-(

name: Sarah Glanding
text: I would recommend coming here the staff was really nice. Everything was clean and I did not mind getting my eyes checked this time

name: Tony Thompson
text: The provider...was excellent and the staff was very courteous too me...

name: nna Coleman
text: They are very, kind and professional people.

name: Devon Stafford
text: Pretty Good Place, Always In & Out. Staff Is Very Friendly & Professional. Only Thing Is I Wish They Would Have A Larger Slection Of Frames For Customers To Select From But Other Than That Great Place!

name: Ellen W
text: Friendly and thorough. Will definitely be going back here when I need a new contact prescription.

name: Charles Diggins
text: They kept calling me begging me to come in for an appointment. I go in for an appointment only to find out that their equipment is not working. I missed work for nothing. NEVER AGAIN FOR ME. PLEASE RUN FOR YOUR LIFE

name: Alex Prowell
text: Greaat customer service and very knowledgeable of all there products

name: Ace Queens
text:
Awful place long wait for my appointment. Never received my contacts. When I called to ask about them why I hadn’t received my contacts I was told they were too busy for me twice. So I had to go get in their face at the store. Made them give me a refund.
Don’t go there!!!

name: Meg Saxon
text: I have been a patient at EyeCare Associates in Wildwood for about 2 years. I enjoy going there for a yearly checkup because the appointments are easy to make and are quick. I also LOVE Dr. McStoots - she is so friendly and does a wonderful job. I can tell that she takes her time with each patient because she is totally focused on me. I have also had great experiences ordering contacts each year through their office. I definitely recommend going here, especially if you live or work close to the Homewood area - it's so convenient!

name: Bill Farris
text: Dr. Lavigne & staff are most friendly, helpful & meet all of my Eyecare needs

name: Mary Reid
text: Dr. McStoots was genuinely concerned and caring-explained in detail concerns without rushing.Her staff was also kind and professional.

name: Peggy Little
text: Highly recommend!! Excellent staff!

name: Rosalynn Jones
text: Awesome staff...very friendly atmosphere!

name: hiram hightower
text: Everyone did an awesome job very satisfied

name: Nakiki Speer
text: Very friendly staff.  Glad that I chose EyeCare Associates to take care of my eye health.

name: Jason Hall
text: Wonderful care from experienced staff!

name: Michael Moore
text: Great

name: Liz Taylor
text: Kind and helpful

name: Veronica Clark
text: Very professional and friendly environment

name: Delois Penn
text: Exceptional and great customer care services

name: Ashlyn Briana
text:
(Translated by Google) Dr. Karen Vanoy is the absolute BEST !!!

(Original)
Dr. Karen Vanoy is the absolute BEST!!!

name: Ashley M.
text:
(Translated by Google) Dr. Vanoy is the best !!

(Original)
Dr. Vanoy is the best!!

name: Mica
text: My Boyz and I have been going to Dr. Potter for a long period of time. Dr. Potter has always been very pleasant along with his “Amazing” staff. They are always very professional with a peaceful atmosphere.  They have seen us thru eye injuries, first set of glasses, broken glasses, eye plugs and now today eye contacts for my youngest son.. Our eye technician today was “Ms.Sam” she was “Phenomenal” and so patient with my son; she even took the time to take out her personal contacts out of her eyes to show my son how to take the contacts in/out correctly after he watched the eye contact video. I would highly recommend “Potter Eyecare” to anyone one that wants a warm/professional experience. This office truly makes all of their patients feel welcome. Thank you “All” for your hard work!!

name: Debbie E
text: Being in the medical profession myself, I was utterly impressed with Dr Potter. He is very professional and personable. Took the time to review my eye exam results. The staff is very friendly and polite. Would recommend highly.

name: Summer Dutton
text: Excellent doctor! Dr. Potter was so thorough and truly cared about my vision, explained everything so well and answered all my questions confidently. The staff was amazing and so helpful.

name: Jeffery Robison
text: Excellent service and care and concern for my eyes, very helpful staff

resp.text: Thank you for your comment!  We look forward to seeing you again for your eye health and vision needs!

name: ShaQuira Nichols
text: My experience was WONDERFUL! Dr. Jane Wright was AWESOME, she took her time and explained everything she was doing and was needless to say a great person who i STRONGLY recommend. Tanasia was my optician and she’s was the SWEETEST with a great sense of humor my overall experience was GREAT I loved ALL the staff ...

name: Hensley Lindley
text: In & out super quick. Optometrist was straight to the point which I loved!! I’ll be back. :)

name: Hondahaney
text: Good prices, Marx optical was $200 more for the same glasses.

name: LexCee Howlet
text: Jane Wright was EXTREMELY rude and disrespectful with ZERO patience. I WILL NEVER go back!

name: Madison Deal
text: Please save yourself the stress and choose a different doctor! This place is horrible. I was told I did my exam wrong! I did it wrong!? What. And then I was treated rudely because I told them the contacts they had me put in were giving me a headache because it was obviously the wrong prescription. They then wouldn’t check me out after I told them I was done and just wanted my prescription and to be on my way. The woman answered phones and played on the computer and had me wait even longer because she found it funny. She even said “I’m sorry you are having such a bad day” to help further my frustration and to provoke me. Then after leaving I realized they didn’t even fill out my prescription correctly and I had to go back and deal with them an hour longer! Just do not do it. Go somewhere else.

name: Charles Miller
text: In an out without a problem noice!

name: Phadra29 Strong
text: Worst experience in the world, I definitely will not be going back! Now I see why the rating is a 2. Do not waste your time or money!!!

name: Susan Berryhill
text: I have been going to the optical center at Wal-Mart for over 2 yrs now & love it!! The DR. is extremely knowledgeable, courteous & professional! Steve is excellent at his job & his level of customer service is impeccable ! The prices are very reasonable!

name: Judy Jones
text: Wow- 2 .3 stars and I Totally understand why! I had an appointment for the Day we were expecting Snow, I recieved a call on the day before canceling due to predicted weather- Understandable... I asked to buy 1 contact for my right eye and was told no, my prescription had expired- I have had problems with my right eye (which they knew). Rather than sell me one contact after THEY cancelled my appointment their choice for me would have been to wear a bad contact. Needless to say I chose another Doctor who took care of me that day very well!

name: David Shaw II
text:
In early October, my wife and I set up an appointment through Eve (Vision Center Manager) for early November. We saw her write the appointment down--both in the book and on a business card--and we left. We arrived on the morning of the appointment and we were told by Eve that I did not have an appointment and that the doctor would not be able to see me today. My wife told them that we had made the appointment a month ago, and I pulled the card out of my wallet. I was able to see the doctor--though they double-booked her--at my appointment time.

Both of our interactions with Eve felt strained. She seemed more interested in telling us about HER experiences with her vision loss rather than listening to our concerns and answering our questions. My wife had to steer her back to the intended topic several times.

The doctor was very thorough and enlightened me on my Visual Impairment and the probable cause behind it. She was the first doctor to connect my VI with any probable cause, despite the fact I was born with the disability. I feel the doctor is extremely competent in her field and would recommend her to anyone. The manager, however, needs to be replaced.

name: ibpoor
text: Cannot buy glasses at this place because it is closed. And employee with an attitude.

name: Kayla Terry
text: I called to ask how much an appointment was. I was told a certain price, and when I was finished with my exam I was charged something different. I told them about what I was told and then told he couldn't do anything but talk to the person about it. Then when checking prices for contacts, he got kind of rude with me because I wanted to check a website. Told me I wouldn't find them anywhere cheaper and if I didn't buy them there I couldn't get the rebate. After leaving I checked out line and the prices were cheaper than if I would have bought them there and got the rebate. The doctor was nice and professional, but did not look into something specifically about my eye health that I asked her to. Other than that she was good. I don't recommend going here.

name: Dani Corum
text: Doesn't even deserve one star! Went to get contacts and glasses and the lady who was fitting me for glasses was very rude. She was treating me like a child and getting frustrated with me because i couldn't keep my eyes perfectly still for her. She kept snapping at me to be still and getting very rude with me. After a while of this I went off on her. I asked for a different person and waited for the next person available. This person was much nicer but when I asked for the lady's name so that I can call management and complain he said he was the manager. I was shocked that the manager was sitting next to us the entire time and not once chastised her for the way she was acting. I requested her name again and he would not give it to me. When I went back to get my glasses a week later I got the "manager" again and when trying on my glasses I mentioned it made me feel motion sick the way they were looking when I moved my head and he got smart with me telling me to be realistic... The eye doctor was very nice though. No complaints with her but everyone else was horrible. I will not be going back. I will take my prescription somewhere else.

name: Mila Angel
text: I never back here anymore !

name: alicat asmr
text: It is amazing and I love their glasses. They are super cute.and I love the cases. The people that work their are super nice. You can also get contacts.

text: 5/9/2018 I stopped into the Decatur, AL Vision Center after making a store purchase to have my pupil distance (PD) measured. The center was empty with a young gal behind the counter and a young man with rubber boots sitting on the floor talking. I asked if I could get my measured as I wanted to compare pricing online with the Vision Center. I was told she could not do it as it is people with prescriptions only. Yup I should have known since it is Walmart which equates to poorest customer service.

name: LAN K
text: I went for contacts and glasses a 2018, glasses are so bad I can’t read very well and contacts tear easily, I feel totally unbalanced when walking wearing the glasses, I told the guy that helped me when I picked up my glasses that they weren’t right,, he said my eyes would adjust to them,, well it’s been several months now and I am still having the same problem,, I will never use this place again,!!!!!

name: Kate Rodgers
text: The staff is friendly and helpful!

name: Lance Flood
text: I was initially seen a few years ago, paid for my exam, and was told that since my diabetes was not under control they couldn't help me.  I was not given a refund but simply told to return once my numbers were under control.  I finally returned today after a long struggle and experiments with everything from daily Lantus to weekly Bydureon.  I was told that since it's been over a year, I would have to pay again.  What?  That isn't what I was told.  I didn't receive the service I paid for.  Either refund my money, or sit me back in the exam chair with the eye doctor who reeks like cigarette smoke.  Nevertheless, I was given neither option.  I will never use this place again.  Granted, it was "only" $50.00, but the principle remains that they received $50.00 and failed to deliver their service, nor was I informed of an expiration policy.  Shady.

name: Derek Beaty
text: I'll give 2 stars just because it was decent at one point. Wouldn't recommend it now with Stig in charge.

name: Joseph Ridenhour
text: I got a frame that my wife hated.  Uh oh.  Went back in the next business day, and the gentleman there was very helpful in pointing out a pair of frames that was similar in style to my old Timberland frames, but with extra viewing area and thinner and lighter titanium than the old pair!  So yeah... get the insurance for your frames, just in case.... and make sure to get your anti-reflective coating.  It's not a filter... it's an anti-filter to stop glare and allow most of the light to pass through lens instead of glancing off.  So the lens doesn't look like clear plastic, and so you don't see your eyeballs in your lens.

name: kenneth williams
text: My wife and I had appointments together here on the same day. The doctor was nice. But the Assistant Manager named Eve was very rude. She really needs to listen to her customers instead of having her stinking attitude. She really has no respect for customers nor does she have customer service skills. She really should be fired and should respect all customers not just men.

name: Jennifer Hill
text: The absolute worst customer service in ANY medical field that I have ever experienced. Very Poor management. Eve has a problem actually LISTENING to the any customer. She seems to just want to assert her attitude and her "authority" instead of actually solving any problems for the CUSTOMER! It appears she gets a real kick out of arguing and should not be in the customer service business. They ordered the wrong contacts and instead of listening to the problem Eve threatened to throw the wrong ones away if I did not pick them up without offering to resolve anything. I'm appalled and frustrated by the entire experience.

name: Vermonica Buckelew
text: After trying three different times to get appt I actually made one for today at 12:15, arrived 10 minutes early and after waiting a bit the manager comes out to tell they would have to do only part of my exam today and come back at a later date because since the appt was later in the day it would go into the doctors lunch time. I work at a veterinarian clinic and when we make appt, even if it goes into the doctors lunch time, we finish the appt. I even arrived early so it was by no means my fault if they scheduled an appt wrong. I would recommend not wasting your time here.

text: I was on vacation in Mobile and needed my glasses repaired, we all know what it’s like to not have our eyes to see lol called around to a few  places, no one would help me see again, visited Walmart’s on Schillinger and Moffett rd the young girl didn’t want to help me even before she even looked at my glasses. And I’ve even bought from walmart optical before just not that one. One more try was Hillcrest Optical in Mobile. I called before the lady was very pleasant on the phone and told me to bring them in. Karen you were my lifesaver and I really do appreciate you from the bottom of my heart I thank you! For your kindness and good heart. Now I can see again, thank you for making my vacation bright again you deserve a medal for kindness and Great customer service. Thanks again from the Canadian lady who can see again. 😎

text: I was 31 years old when i went to Dr King. I hadn’t wore glasses since i was 16! She got my prescription where I needed it, every other optometrist had me 8 feet tall. name: Dave Lewis
text: Dr Day is a great optometrist! He even referred me to the ophthalmologist who did my trifocal lens replacement surgery (souped-up cataract surgery). For me the healing time was very quick and I came out of the procedure already able to see. Now, three months after surgery, I see better than I can remember ever seeing before (my vision is now 20/20). Before surgery my eyes were so bad (about -11) that I was not a candidate for anything but the trifocal lens replacement but I saw it as an investment in my future health as I was getting worried about night driving. So glad I did it!
