With my job, I have continuous briefings for implementing the CDC’s latest procedures and guidelines, as I am part of a covid command management for 300+ employees, which over half are essential employees.  I have been a client for about 15 years and as always, Dr. Moore and his staff are nothing less than excellent professionals.

Dr. Moore and the staff made it very clear to me how important it was if ANYTHING changed suddenly with my sight. I had some issues and yep they got me right in again on short notice.  He loves his patients and treats them like family as far as I am concerned.  Very professional place. Why he even took to Destiny on his birthday a few years back!!! Need a eye doctor?? Don't you dare go anywhere else!! Sorta like the Kabota Tractor commercials"don't you buy no ugly tractor"-well "DON'T YOU GO NO WHERE ELSE TO GET YO EYES CHECKED"!!!!

I saw a military ever Dr one time and it just wasn't the same, after that I made sure to schedule appoints with MY eye Dr when I knew I would be home for a visit. My husband, and kids, brother and many friends use him also, and we all love him and the staff! They are always helpful, and informative, and though they take their time, they are really quick and efficient in a way that never makes me feel rushed. One of my favorite things is that I've never ever had to wait longer than 10 minutes for scheduled appointments. Even when they "worked my son in", we didn't wait longer than 10 - 15 minutes. Highly recommended!

name: Jaimie Howard
text: After referencing my insurance coverage, I was made aware that Moore Eye Clinic was within my network. Last year, I visited Moore Eye Clinic for the first time to get new eyeglasses. Bea, an office staff member, worked with me for almost two hours to find the right pair. She also explained all of the possible upgrades on the eyeglasses with pricing. A year later, I am still happy with the pair that I chose and the experience that I had. I was recently due for a contact eye exam. Because I had a good experience previously, I chose to return to the office for this procedure. The entire office is clean, bright and friendly. I was brought to the back almost immediately for my exam. The office had both standardized and progressive eye exam tools of technology. The office staff member who had worked with me explained all price upgrades for the exams on each of the machines that was not included. Dr. Moore was professional, informative and thorough. He was patient throughout the exam and took time to explain my current eye health and prescription. He also went above and beyond to explain the contact brand options that would work well with my eyes. After the exam, I was told that Dr. Moore preferred me using trials of the new prescription prior to ordering. I appreciated this long-term because it ensured that I felt comfortable in my new lenses. Since getting to know this office, I will not go anywhere else in Tuscaloosa. I have recommended Moore Eye Clinic to co-workers and friends within this area.

resp.text: We are so glad Bea was able to help you find the perfect pair of glasses! Thank you for taking the time to recommend us!

name: Billy and Megan Cox
text: I was here about three years ago amd I will never return. Mr.Dr.McCurdy was very respectful and a very good doctor. My experience with Mrs.Dr.McCurdy, on the other hand was a nightmare. I came in with an eye ulcer and Mr.Dr.McCirdy helped me a lot and asked for a second follow up visit to see how my eye was feeling. When I returned I did not seem him. I saw his wife who works along side him. I was ok with this until she figured out I was a victim of a rare disease. When this became apparent to her, she began pestering me with questions. It ended with her asking "If you would mind me taking a couple pictures of your eyes?" I was reluctant but agreed. Instead of using the provided equipment to take professional pictures, she instead took the machine with a light and mirrors and instead of putting her eye to it, she took two pictures with her iPhone 7. I remember it being an iPhone 7 because it stated that it was on the bill right next to the 75$ price tag of each picture she took. After this I did not want to return for my yearly eye exam but I agreed to with the condition I would Mr.Dr.McCurdy instead of Mrs. So when we made the appointment we made it VERY clear we wanted him, not her. Well wouldn't you know it, who do I see when I walk in the door of the doctor's office. She was happily smiling with one of her nurses there. I sat in the chair waiting for the exam to begin. Instead of doing that, she asks the nurse to sit there and stare at my deformed eyes. After a couple minutes, I spoke up and asked if we could start the exam. She agreed and proceeded to put dilating drops in my eyes. When she got down to look she asked if I still had my contacts in. I said yes. She immediately pulls each of them out of my eye and throws them in the trash before I can react. I tell her those were my last contacts and she pulls them out of the trash and puts them in solution. Well we go on with exam even though I should've left right there. We finish and without asking me anything, she reaches to get the contacts and starts to try to put them in my eye. I ask her what she's doing and I explain to her I don't want contacts from the trash. She tries setting me up with a pair of sample contacts, which weren't even fit to my prescription, the equivalent of me putting on reading glasses when I'm legally blind without proper aid. She tells me we'd laugh this off and I left as quickly as possible. It's been three years or so, Mrs.McCurdy. When do I start laughing?

name: Terry M. Slaton
text:
I have been a patient of Dr. Nichols for several years now and he and his office provides personal and full service care for my eyes.  I have had occasions when an eye injury occurred, something diagnosed as a "detached viscous" which happened first in one eye then, a year later, in the other.  Dr. Nichols explained the first time that it occurred, how important it was to make sure that the condition was watched carefully for the first several weeks or so, until the detachment was complete as it could result in a detachment of the retina during the process.  He told me to call 24 x 7 if I had any issues and that he or one of the other doctors in the office would see me immediately.  This is the kind of service that is unexpected today but shows the care and concern that Dr. Nichols and his office provides.  If you want really good care for your eyes, and thorough examinations, I highly recommend the practice.

TS

text:

So, I came in already knowing what I was looking for. I also already had my prescription from an eye exam I had taken the previous week, elsewhere. They had my glasses ready in 15 min. NO LIE!!! I was really impressed and my new glasses are awesome!

text: The first time I visited I didn’t realize they had just closed and the door was unlocked so I walked in. I was speaking with one of the girls who was very friendly and outgoing and the manager (I’m assuming) wanted to close the store and started waving at the girl helping us, basically implying we needed to leave. I thought this was a little rude. Decided to give them another try and wasn’t impressed at all. This time saw another salesperson, not very knowledgeable which made me feel uneasy because it’s my first pair of glasses. There’s only about 20 frames that fall into the promotion deal so it took me a while to decide. She kept standing right beside me waiting so I felt rushed. The manager came out and told me it would be $70 to add AR. It ended up being $124 because they failed to tell me it’s less money if you send them out to be done vs. in store. I didn’t even get the one hour service because their machine was down so I had to come back the next day. The salesperson didn’t seem to care about any of these issues. I also had to ask her to get a case with them. She just handed me my glasses at first and said here you go. Won’t ever use this store again.

resp.text:
Hello April, thank you for sharing your experience. It looks like there are several areas to address and improve. We are very sorry we didn't gain your future business and we will definitely do training on these specific issues. Please do not hesitate to reach out to us if we can improve your experience. We are here to help. Mary, Eyemart Express Customer Care Manager
Dallas, TX 888-372-2763

text: IT'S  WAS A GREAT EXPERIENCE AND  I AM ENJOYING  MY NEW GLASSES.

name: Klean Media Group
text: First and foremost, I absolutely love how my glasses came out. I bought two pair and they both equaled a total of $63.99. However, the service was suspicious to say the least. Eyemart is advertising multiple pairs of glasses, at an affordable rate. When I went into the store, I noticed the employees were seemingly very nice and eager to help. Long story short, when it came time to purchase my glasses they were tremendously higher then I expected. My total came out to be $143.99 originally. I thought that was strange so I just simply asked is there not a more standard lens that I could get? Suddenly the employee gets nervous, as if I've asked a question that's too sensitive for her to answer. Her boss reacted rather strangely as well. What had happened was, they had rung me up for two pairs of glasses and lenses and instead of asking me what lenses I would like or giving me choices on what they have; they simply just charged me for the most expensive and weren't even trying to provide me with any options. This was very upsetting to me simply because their advertisement says one thing, yet they are not at all trying to correlate such through their services. What is even worse, is that the manager actually brought me an example of what I would be buying going with the cheaper option. Let me be the first to tell you the example she brought out was not what I ended up buying. Which leads me to believe that Eyemart is only after your money. Granted I got my glasses within literally 30 minutes I was a little bit taken back by my experience considering I was trying to be bamboozled. If you go into this store they have a great selection, and I suggest that you go with whatever you like, but I would be very wary of their service and also be sure to ask questions. Thank you.

resp.text:
Hello, thank you for your review. I'm sorry to hear to had a bad experience at our Auburn, AL location. This is not the way Eyemart Express does business. I will have this review formalized and sent to upper management to prevent this from happening again in the future. Thank you again for taking the time to leave us feedback so we can continue to grow as a company. If there is anything else we can do for you please contact our customer service line at 1-888-372-2763. -Mandolin W.
Eyemart Express Customer Care
Dallas, TX 1-888-372-2763

text: It is my sons first time to have eyeglasses and Everyone was so professional and very helpful I really enjoy doing business with the Eyemart in Auburn and would highly recommend them!

text: Staff is super friendly, courteous and very knowledgeable about eyeware!!!

name: Debbie Waldroup
text:
The first visit went ok as far as the people being friendly and examing us. we have BCBS Insurance I called ahead to see if they took the Insurance she said yes. We go to our appointment and she takes our card she has to see it or she wouldn't of known they didn't take our insurance because of the mcr on it she didn't tell us nothing about it or we would of went some where else. Our insurance pays for the eye exam and 100.00 towards frames and /or lenses however u want to use it. We take our exams and I come out to the lobby while my eyes are dilating she said I could get with the receptionist and pay or do what I needed to do. Ok  I tell her that I shouldn't owe her anything that our insurance pays for the exam and 100.00 for frames.  I told her I called before we came in to make sure you took our insurance if u didn't we would of gone somewhere else. Then she said that she didn't know we had mct by talking to me on the phone. Ok you shouldn't of said you take it u should of asked about the mcr on the card first before saying I took it. The thing that really got me is I'll give her the phone call. But when we went in for our appointment and she made copies of our cards and highlighted where we had MCR she knew then they didn't take our insurance but she didn't tell us until after we both had our exams and was leaving. I told her that she did not tell us that or we would of went somewhere else. I told her she could file the claim and hope they pay it. We were not very happy about that.
We go next door to get our glasses thinking we can do all of this in one day and be done with it. Wrong again I called and asked did they take our insurance yes we do they just didn't bother to tell me that the machine tht runs the card through hasn't been sent to them yet and they have no way of filing our insurance. But we will call you when it comes in. How long will that be? I'm sorry I have no idea??  So we either go somewhere else or go home and wait on there call thinking it will be just a few days Wrong again. It was a long time before they called us. So we were still aggerivated about the whole thing we weren't sure wether to go back there or not. We did decide that if the insurance didn't pay for the exam that they could write it off or do whatever they wanted to do with that bill we werent going to pay it cause she knew before we had the exams and done them anyway without giving us a choice to have them done or not. So far I haven't got a bill from them or anything from my insurance.
They finally call us and say they can take our insurance now. So my husband goes and gets his done. They look good on him and so far he's satisified.
I went Wednesday and got mine done and picked them up Friday so far I'm very happy with them. I bought the 29.95 year warranty I have narcolepsy and I fall and drop them all the time. I can mess them up I have had my dog to eat them and I'm being serious. I woke up and she was crunching on something I was trying to find my glasses to see what she had  that's when I found the frames.
The people were very nice, the place was nice they just need to have there knowledge together and tell people the right thing and most important tell them if you don't take their insurance before you do nothing to them. We were nice. There's allot of people hat would of caused a big big scene.
Thank you!!
Have a Nice Day!!!!

Debbie Waldroup

resp.text: Hello Debbie, thank you for your review. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we apologize we did not give you a 5 star experience. We will share your feedback with management to avoid these issues in the future. If there is anything we can do to better your experience please contact us at 1-888-372-2763. -Mandolin W. Eyemart Express Customer Care Dallas, TX 1-888-372-2763

name: Brandi Arrington
text: Super fast and very helpful, even had patience with my 7 year old that other places didn't have!

name: Joshua Johnson
text: Awesome customer service, great quality and mine were ready in less than an hour

name: Janice Horton
text: Great prices & customer service!

name: Belinda “Lindy” Taylor
text: The staff was very helpful. My glasses were ready in 35 minutes!!!!!

name: Thomas Humphries
text: Great service friendly people

name: Cynthia Wilson
text: Was a surprisingly pleasant experience. Staff was friendly and service was exceeded expectations.

name: Patricia Tatum
text: Great, no problem

name: Ariana Alba
text:
(Translated by Google) Sandra was very courteous and helpful, she helped me a lot when choosing my lenses. Got me a really good discount! and solved all my doubts. They have very good prices, they cover damage to the lenses for a year the times that it is (during the year), they have a very good cleaner that you can refill as many times as possible without any extra cost and best of all 90% of the They give you glasses in 1 hour, they gave them to me in 25 minutes! I will definitely return to this place

(Original)
Sandra fue muy cortes y servicial, me ayudó mucho a la hora de elegir mis lentes. Me consiguió un descuento muy bueno!  y resolvió todas mis dudas. Tienen precios muy buenos, cubren daños en los lentes por un año las veces que se sea ( durante el año ), tienen un limpiador muy bueno que puedes rellenar las veces que sea sin algún costo extra y lo mejor de todo el 90% de los lentes te los dan en 1 hora, a mi me los dieron en 25 minutos! Definitivamente regresaré a este lugar

name: Shell Murphy
text: Thanks to a wave, my husband lost his glasses. LensCrafters was able to assist us & get a new pair made in 30 minutes. We are so grateful for their help & underatanding

resp.text: Thank you for your review. Our associates are some of the best around and we are always happy to hear our customers feel the same!

name: R D
text:
I have faithfully had an eye check up annually for many years and in no instance have I ever had a more enjoyable Dr. visit. I have been traveling and not in my home state and I needed to get my exam before the end of the year so as to use my insurance allotment for 2020. My first interaction was over the phone to make an appointment. After telling them my situation they were able to fit me in even though there were no other openings until the next Monday which was not possible for me. Next was my meeting with the front desk assistant Kelsey. She was awesome. She was very patient and helpfull in getting all the proper paper worked and doing the preliminary testing before seeing Dr, Nguyen.She was very knowledgeable and took the  time to explain procedures and answer all my questions and all with a smile.
After this I met with Dr. Nguyen and she too was a pleasure to meet with . She was very professional  and answered my concerns. I never felt I was being rushed out of her office. She also made suggestions for me for better eye care. Thank you all.

resp.text: Thank you for your review. Our associates are some of the best around and we are always happy to hear our customers feel the same!

name: Lucy Reed
text: I received excellent personalized service from Dr. Nguyen and Bill. I was impressed! The eye exam was more thorough than I have received from any ophthalmologist. Dr. Nguyen took her time to review the results of  my testing in detail in 3D, over her computer screen, something I have never seen before. Bill advised me to the type of frame best suited to my prescription and repaired my old frames. I highly recommend LensCrafters  in Foley, Alabama.

resp.text: Hello Lucy, thank you so much for sharing your experience. At LensCrafters our goal is to set the standard in quality in eye care and eyewear by ensuring every patient and customer has the best experience in every location every time. We are very excited to hear about your experience and value your feedback.

name: Scooter's F250 Adventures
text: Great experience I'm going to go there for all my glasses

resp.text: Thank you for your review!  We are happy to hear about your positive experience and look forward to serving you again!

name: Lisa Kegelman
text: Great experience today ! The Doctor visit was fast and amazing. Picking my glasses out and finalizing my purchase was quick and efficient!

resp.text:
Hello Lisa,
Thank you so much for sharing your experience. At LensCrafters our goal is to set the standard in quality in eye care and eyewear by ensuring every patient and customer has the best experience in every location every time. We are very excited to hear about your experience and value your feedback.

name: Lacy Pitts
text: Very irritated with this place.. I have been getting glasses for years with lens crafters and naturally I made an appointment for a new pair and exam. I traveled 40 min to get here only to be told that they can’t see me since I had covid in the past. Why they didn’t tell me this over the phone??? That’s what I get for telling the truth.. should of just lied huh! 🙄🙄🙄 They said they required a negative test before I can be seen which makes no sense cause you can’t get a negative test for 90 days after covid.. smh.

resp.text: Hi there, thank you for your review. We are disappointed to hear about your experience. We strive to provide the best glasses and customer service in the industry.  Please go to bit.ly/LC-Support so we can resolve this issue.

name: Dorothy Erbs
text: She spent a good time with your exam,very friendly staff highly recommended

resp.text: Hello Dorothy, thank you so much for sharing your experience. At LensCrafters our goal is to set the standard in quality in eye care and eyewear by ensuring every patient has the best experience in every location every time. We are very excited to hear that your eye exam experience exceeded your expectations!

name: ben brain
text: Dr. Nguyen is great with her patients, very informative about prevention and how to keep your eyes healthy. I would highly recommend.

name: Cynthia Morrisette
text:
I'm so disappointed with the service. My family and I have been ordering glasses through Lenscrafters for quite sometimes and never had an issue. But, this time for some reason, they can't get my prescription right. Not to mentioned the several trips back and forth to the store I've made. Within the last few weeks I have ordered 2 pair of glasses. The 1st pair that I ordered was a complete mess, couldn't see anything. My measurements were totally off. Took a chance on ordering another pair and found out that they didn't fill my prescription correctly so therefore I still couldn't see. The guy was very rude. Bluntly accused me of the mistake and not once did he
apologize.  After that he quoted me a ridiculous price to correct their mistake. I was very disappointed so I asked for a refund and left the store.

resp.text: Hi Cynthia, thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear about your experience. We aim to consistently meet and surpass customers' expectations. Please go to http://bit.ly/2Di26GQ so we can follow up with you directly.

name: Patricia Bradish
text: Awesome help! True feedback on how different frames looked with recommendations on shape and styles to fit your face.

resp.text: Hi Patricia! Thank you for your review! We look forward to serving you again!

name: Alesha Walker
text:
My husband and 7 year old daughter both had eye exams this morning with Dr. Potts. I was so very impressed  with the excellent care and customer service we received. He was very thorough, but still efficient and took time to educate us on each test as he went along. This was our daughter’s first eye exam and she was a bit nervous, but Dr. Potts took time to ask specifically what she was nervous about and addressed that with her, putting her at ease right away. When we left she said “that was actually fun!” :) I would highly recommend Dr. Potts for both adults and children!

The staff at Lens Crafters was very kind and welcoming as well. I also love the ability to schedule   exams online! I can’t speak to assistance from the Lens Crafters staff beyond being welcomed today because fortunately no one needed glasses today, but I’ve had great experience personally in the past. Damon was very knowledgeable and helped me to choose frames that were stylish and comfortable for me last year!

name: Mckenna Owens
text: Nothing but the best service. And all of the consultants are great! Teresa is a great GM. And Casey is a wonderful sales supervisor!

name: Candace sellers
text: Bad experience with the lenscrafters in Montgomery, Al , wrong prescription and scratches on the scratch proof lenses when I got them,  but went to the one in Foley and had true hassel free return,  very nice people,  money in my account before I left the store. Wish the one in Montgomery was this nice

name: Craig McLeod
text: I purchased a pair of Perscreption Ray Ban sun glases from this location 17 months ago. The case that came with the glases forced the temple ends to rest  on the surface of the lenses causing an abrasion on the inside surface of the otherwise perfect glasses. Lenscrafters solution was for me to buy a replacement set of lenses at a reduced cost, So that this same thing will happen again. I am not satisfied with their solution regarding this issue.

name: tina eaves
text:
Located in the Tanger Outlet in Doley, Al.
I lost mt presciption glasses and they have a one hour on site lab. Even if it was going to take longer, it didnt matter...I needed glasses.
I was immediately greeted upon entrance. Casey was assigned to assit me with my needs.
He was professional, considerate, and patient. I was informed of  the vast selection of frames including the sale they have going on. I picked my frames, which were not on sale, however the price was very fair. My lenses were on sale...40% off! I am so thrilled to see again, and...I only had to wait and hour!
All staff I came in contact with was friendly and courteous and the location is easy to find.

name: Thomas Rape
text: The doctor was very professional. The person helping with frames was not. He was rude and tried to force options I did not want.

resp.text: Hi Thomas, thanks for your review. We are disappointed our staff could not be of better help. We strive to provide the best service in the industry. Please go to https://bit.ly/LC-Support so we can follow up with you directly.

name: casey owens
text: Amazing!!!

name: Beth Babin
text: Be prepared to wait FOREVER. We had an appt at 2:30. It's now 5:05 and they still have not done the test we were sent here for.

name: Regina Mccants
text: My experience at Premier Medical Eye has always been great. My Dr. Claude Warren & Ms. Julie and the entire staff are excellent and caring. The offices are set up excellent to protect everyone during your visit during covid 19 pandemic! Dr. Claude Warren is a excellent Doctor and his service to the Mobile and surrounding communities are greatly appreciated! I thank God for you!

name: Alicia mcmurray
text: I am accompanying my elderly grandmother to an appointment that was scheduled at 9am. We arrived at 850. The current time is 1045 and we are STILL waiting to see Dr. Duffey. This is flat out UNACCEPTABLE for any patients to have to sit and wait on a doctor for almost 2 hrs. But let you be late to an appointment and they want you to reschedule. Im in the medical field so I know that there is a disconnect within the scheduling system or the greed of bringing in too many patients on any given day... UNBELIEVABLE 😡😡😡

name: derica busby
text: My mother was treated so horrible hear. she had an appt on 12/29/20 @1430 arrived 1420. it was an issue with her VSP insurance, some type of mishap. The two clerks that tried to assist her were pleasant. they gave her an sticky note with number to call to get information corrected, while she was on phone with insurance carrier clerk one came and stated that they give you 30 minutes grace period. it's 1435 at this point. finally she got insurance situated and stepped back up to window and stated she would just be self pay. clerk one and two present along with another medical staff who precedes to call Dr Jackson   and inform that patient would be paying out of pocket, mind you it's 1440 still within time frame. medical staff precedes to hang up phone and say well Dr Jackson said you'll just have to reschedule your appt.my mother was so embarrassed and hurt her being an Registered Nurse could phantom the thought of an medical doctor being to rude and unapologetic. needless to say we will never visit this medical facility again.

name: fares hujier
text:
I do not trust the techs in the eyeglass store in the same building which is related to the clinic.
Be extremely careful for defects in the exhibited one's. Even when you have asked for a new one, be sure to examine it again when your receive it, ignore it if the techs seemed to be smiling or laughing from your checking. It's a lot of money you pay and you think you will have a good quality!

name: Payal Finaviya
text:
WAIT WAIT and WAIT
I had to wait total of two hours before they could see me!!!
I will give it -1. Can’t give them any start at all. This is for the non medical staff.
And if you request to any of the employees that you are getting late for work then they give you attitude.

name: Stephanie Young
text: Love Dr. Douglas and staff. Saved my right eyesight during the challenges of Covid 19 and all the surgery restrictions.

name: Vadim Cateli
text: We had a wonderful experience here. Everybody was nice and helpful. Special thanks to Leann Luther, for being so kind and patient. We will be back.

name: Denice Scott
text: Waited a full hour to be seen. Horrible scheduling. This is not our first or second visit where we have had to wait but I assure you it is our last. Tried to give them the benefit of the doubt but no more. My time is just as valuable as theirs.

name: D Williams
text: A recent eye exam with Dr. Jackson literally brightened my world!  Thanks to his expert evaluation and treatment, my vision is back in focus for  daily visual tasks I used to take for granted.  Do your eyes a favor by letting Dr. Jackson help them do their job.  Highly recommend!

name: Dianne Bohannan
text: I had and appointment with Dr. Douglas for my continuing eye treatment while my regular doctor was away from the clinic. I appreciated his gentle treatment and taking the time to answer all our guestions.

name: Ernest Moses
text: I love my Premiere Medical I've been getting my glasses there for three to four years now evryoeve is helpful and friendly Accepted all Insurance great selection of frames

name: Lillie Pipkin
text: I loved Dr. Ron Swain Jr and all of the staff at Premier Medical! My son had his tonsils and adenoids removed and within 6 hours of leaving the facility there was someone from the office calling to check in on him.

name: Julie Rentz
text: Dr.Graf and his team are very professional,  kind and knowledgeable. They really put you at ease throughout cataract surgery!

name: Seaview
text: A pleasant experience from beginning to end. The office employees are very courteous and this location has top tier doctors . The wait time is short compared to other physician offices that I've visited.

name: Olivia Elkins
text: Some employees are very helpful. But the manager of the contact station is unprofessional and was helpful in no way.

name: Heather Richardson
text: I went in there because for month I had been suffering from an eye pain that I just woke up one day with . Finally went to go check it out waited in my room for a good bit of time before asking how much longer he was going to be . He came in shortly after barely even looked at me said it was allergies , I said I've never had allergies in my life . His reply welcoming to getting older (I'm 28) so after taking his word even though he was a jerk I did the eye drops he gave me ect . The eye pain finally got so unbearable I went to another doctor I knew it couldn't be allergies . Turns out it was an ulcer on my cornea and blisters on my eyelids , which dr Jackson would have seen if he actually took the time. He could have cost me my eye sight and will always be recommended to avoid in my book!!!!

name: Norma Mouchett
text: Wonderful doctors and office personnel.

name: Norma Mouchett
text: Wonderful doctors and office personnel.

name: Bill Tomlin
text: Good doctors and friendly staff.  Like everywhere else they are crowded.

name: Yolanda Essix
text: Go see dr Jackson 2880Dauphin st he and his staff are the best

name: Gerald Bosarge
text: They really took Gould care of you and was very polite.

name: Sandra Law
text: Dr,Tindell is the absolute best!!He also cares about you as a person!

name: Julie Blasingame
text: Special thanks to Hannah with Dr. Burton's crew.

name: Brenda Paige
text: Dr.  Stuart F.  Ball has cared for my eyes since 1994.

name: Catherine Quackenbush
text: Love Dr. Swain Jr.

name: Jim Caulk
text: Appointment was on time and everything was very professional  . Checked all  of my eye concerns and current need for glasses.

name: britney soderberg
text: HORRIBLE customer service... no one makes you feel welcome or really helps you at all? when i did have a question or concern i was brushed off like it wasn't an issue at all... the doctor did a fabulous job but everyone else was very short and unhelpful... have been 3 different times and each experience has been worse than the last.. would never recommend. With something like glasses that you have to wear everyday they shouldn't make you feel like a burden or waste of their time.

name: Esme' Waters
text: Rude, rude, rude! I completely agree with the review of Marcus Williams. Dr. Scott is the most arrogant man I have ever encountered. What is wrong with Optical places around here?

name: Shelby Bishop
text:
My husband had to get his glasses remade three times, and each time they were rude. No one could tell us how long a replacement would take and seemed bothered when we asked for updates.

Waiting in the lobby, I overheard the mom next to me say she was here for their glasses to be remade because they weren’t right. Staff seemed to treat her just as they did us.

name: Marcus Williams (TheSevereWay)
text: Dr. Scott is rude and arrogant. The one doctor I liked is no longer there. The office always has an excuse for their continued poor service. I gave them ample chances, in hopes that they could prove to be (at the least) satisfactory.

name: Lorrie Pate
text: This place is amazing! Im partial to dr.mcgowen. but the entire staff is so helpful. Over the last 2 years they have fit us in and regular appointments were so easy!!! Got our glasses in 1 hour! Great service! Great selections and merchandise! If u have ever had a preteen during covid needing eye glasses, its complicated, but cherise was wonderful!!!

name: Madelyn Wiggins
text: I had a very good experience buying my first pair of glasses from here. I brought in a prescription from another optometrist and selected my frames, and my glasses were ready within an hour after ordering. I was especially surprised given that I had two different prescriptions for my eyes, one of which had astigmatism correction. The price for the lenses was also very fair compared to the variety of other places I looked at. The women who helped me were very kind, and helped me by making the process very quick and easy.

name: Chris Devall
text: Very rude! Just called their office to see where my wife’s referral information is from a doctors office they referred me to and was mistreated  and hung up on in my face by their  receptionist because I guess the fax machine was to far away to send the information that was already supposed to be sent. My wife’s is going blind already and that’s just what she needs from another person is that attitude! Thanks Baldwin eye clinic! I wonder if they even care about people eye problems or are they just interested in making money off peoples eye problems and being rude in the process? Thanks Baldwin eye clinic!

name: Shelly Pickle
text: I love Dr. Scott!!!! The ladies are very helpful, great at assisting in finding the perfect pair of glasses for your face and take their time making the adjustments to be certain you have the right fit. I stop in on occasion to have them cleaned at no charge, the ladies are really sweet and it only takes a minute. They also went the extra mile in helping me find contacts that work for me. Which wasn't an easy task. I won't go anywhere else.

name: EggoTheMeggo
text:
Great for people who only need a slight correction since they can get their glasses same day, but if you have astigmatism, don't bother getting your glasses here. Walmart gets them faster. It's been a week since I ordered mine and they still haven't given me an estimate for how much longer it will be for my glasses to be ready. Prices are also so much higher than other options in the area. They also charge for adjustments whereas Walmart is free. Definitely room for improvement.

Edit: I received a phone call from Bay Minette Optical telling me my glasses were sent to their office instead of the Daphne location. This is Friday. Then they proceeded to tell me that they can mail them over to the Daphne location and I MIGHT have them by Saturday. No thanks, I'll just come get them today so I can make sure nothing else happens to them.

name: Warren Wood
text: The staff and doctors at the Baldwin Eye Clinic are all very friendly and helpful. I really like Dr. Scott and his no nonsense approach to solutions to any problems I had with my eyes and vision. He was straight forward with me and resolved my dry eye condition when no other eye doctors would even offer a solution other than eye drops. I would and will recommend the clinic to others.

name: Mike Smith
text: SLOW and unorganized! You will wait at least 2 hours every time. No one ever knows what is going on. Tons of staff just sitting around while customers wait. They need all new receptionist. The ones they have are rude and and are not professional.

name: Doug Snow
text: Great experience, wonderful Doctor and staff, highly recommend

name: Melissa Engelke
text: I've been using this place for a few years. The doctors are great. Prices are a bit much, but so is everything else these days. The only downside I always have is needing to wait 5 - 10 days to get my glasses back. I do not know if this is just because my prescription is a PIA or what. Overall, I do recommend them.

name: Paul Gridler
text: It is always a pleasure to go to Baldwin Eye Clinic. From the time I checked in, took the exam and checked out, everyone made me feel very comfortable. Dr.Adcock also took time to explain what he found and what he recommended.They don't try and sell you something if you don't need it or you don't like it. I highly recommend them!!

name: Carol Anne Stark
text: I have been using Baldwin Eye Clinic for several years and have been very pleased with  the optometrists. I have gotten my appointments quickly and have not had to wait long once I arrived for my appointment. Any problems I have had with my eyes have been taken care of and I love my current glasses that I got there. I highly recommend this clinic.

name: Stephen Bertagnolli
text: Great people, great doctors, quick appointments, superb service. I like how the doctor took time with me to explain things as he went to make sure I understood. It's the little things like that that matter.

name: Dana Pridgen
text: Dr Adcock was great but the prices are not competitive to say the least. There are extra charges and exam costs are overpriced. The woman at the front desk was extremely rude and condescending. I can't believe I actually paid money to be treated like that!! I would only go to Baldwin Eye Clinic if you want to pay too much and be treated poorly.

name: Christopher Irizarry
text: Over priced for what they did. Also the Person that supposly checked me was not listening at all to what I was saying and felt kinda rude from his part.

name: Lauri Breaud
text: Baldwin Eye Clinic went over and beyond my expectations. I found them on the internet and was excited to schedule because not only could I fill out my paperwork online before my arrival, they were open on Friday afternoons (when I'm off of work)! I was literally in and out of there within 30 minutes, and that included a screening, eye exam, vision exam, and choosing out my glasses. Dr. Cobb was great-- she not only told me about my vision, but also about quirky things about my eye anatomy. She seems like she truly loves what she does-- which is something I can relate to and appreciate. The fact that I went pick up my glasses an hour after picking them out was AWESOME as well as the fact that my contacts were in STOCK at the office. Definitely the best eye clinic I've ever been to. I would recomment them & Dr. Cobb to anyone and everyone!

name: Dan Therrell
text: I was referred to Baldwin Eye Clinic by a friend, and I had an eye exam and checkup there recently. I am very satisfied with the promptness, courtesy, and professionalism of the entire office staff. The advice I requested from Dr. Adcock about laser eye surgery helped me understand all my future options and helped me make a decision that I had been concerned about for some time. I recommend Bay Eye Clinic to anyone who needs eye care.

name: Linda Ball
text: I love Baldwin eye clinic! The Dr's and staff are friendly and do a through job! I have never had to go back with wrong eye prescription and you usually get your glasses sooner than they say!

name: Taylor Waite
text: Absolutely the best in Baldwin County. We trust Doctor Bernard Scott & Doctor Joe Adcock for our eye exams, contact lenses & eye glasses. Doctor Scott & Doctor Adcock are some of the most experienced eye doctors in the County & they are on the cutting edge with current technologies involving eye care.

name: NATALIE DUPONT
text: Efficient and friendly staff!  THe new eye doctor was great!  Will recommend to everyone!

name: Ginger Chaudron
text: After not seeing Dr. Adcock for several years, I am happy to be a patient again.  I was very pleased with my checkup and plan to be a regular again.  Thank you, Baldwin Eye Clinic and Dr. Adcock!

name: Joy Turner
text: This is a very good eye clinic.  It is convenient to me, always have what I need, and they do thorough eye exams.

name: Jordan Barron
text: Everyone was very friendly. I called beginning of week and was able to get in that same week and leave with my new glasses on the same day! I would definitley recommend Baldwin Eye Clinic!! :)

name: A Holley
text: I have been seeing Doctor Adcock for 4+ years now, and he never fails to make my visit as comfortable as possible. His humor and decorum are unsurpassed .  **good thing he is NEVER retiring!!

name: SAH Daddy
text:
Great staff, great docs, great experience!

Ordered a set of glasses with lenses that had Anti-Reflectors, but decided not to get the lightweight due to insurance issues. Told me the glasses would take 2 weeks to come in. Got a call the next day saying they are ready...and found out they were giving me the lightweight addition for free!

I've been going to this place for a few years, and they don't normally dish out freebies to me...but it was nice of them to do that for a semi-longterm customer! (I always tend to scratch/break my glasses beyond repair before insurance will help pay for them...turning 25 and still am a clutz like a 12 year old).

Also love how the doctor I had(horrible memory sorry!) went into detail about my eyes in layman terms. Just an overall great experience.

name: Kristi Riales
text: I love Baldwin Eye Clinic One Hour. Dr. Adcock is an amazing doctor and took his time and explained everything to me. He is exceptional at his job.

name: Christopher Pancner
text: The optometrist is great! As are the optical wear specialists! However I am dissatisfied with the receptionists, they were not very friendly.

name: Carol Timmons
text: my resent visit to Baldwin Eye Clinic was awesome ,the staff was very friendly and informative .Regina makes me feel at home and Karen always gets me the perfect appt.    Dr. Adcock is the best.

name: Ken Coale
text: I am very pleased with Dr. Dunagan and her technician. Dr. Dunagan is always very concerned with my eye care and getting my vision corrected as best she can. I enjoy the service I receive and drive all the way from Gulf Shores to receive my eye care at BEC. Thank you.

name: Stephanie Drew
text: great location.  easy to get an appointment and dr adcock is great!

name: Glenn Yankowski
text: Dr. Scott was great and very thorough in his explanations.

name: Heather Rodgers
text: Dr. Adcock was awesome! There was hardly any wait time and I was in and out.

name: charlie Stallworth
text: Beyond Awful.....Racial Profiled.

name: Lucas Hunt
text: I mean now I have glasses

name: Annie English
text: Friendly staff. Ms. Barnes does a excellent job.

name: charlie Stallworth
text: Beyond Awful.....Racial Profiled.

name: s brown
text: Wonderful customer service !

name: Lucas Hunt
text: I mean now I have glasses

name: Molly Brewster
text: The staff and doctor were not only polite, but knowledgeable. Immediately after I signed in, I was brought back to the exam room to wait for the doctor. Dr. Everett arrived in under a minute and immediately got to work. This was the best, most efficient eye exam I've ever went through - and as someone with astigmatism, I've had plenty of eye exams. I can not recommend this optometrist enough.

resp.text: Thank You!!

name: Patrick Janson
text: I have been a patient for years and am more than satisfied with Dr. Marshall. In fact, he cares for our entire family of four. Also, staff is friendly, well-informed and thoroughly professional. Highly recommended!

resp.text: Thank You!

name: Gloria Goldsmith
text: The staff was very kind,  helpful, and friendly.  DR. Marshall was the greatest.

name: buckybeaver2008
text: Love, love, love Dr. Marshall & his staff!   Very professional and always takes the time to ensure the patient understands what may be going on with your eyes.  Doesn't use big terminology, just everyday language.  Always prompt and you never have to wait - an appointment is exactly what it says - an appointment.

name: Morgan Parker
text: I love Dr. Marshall, Lauren and Sunshine! They are awesome people and take great care of you when you are in their office.

name: Thomas Kaufmann

text: I had a sudden Flash and floater, called Dr Marshall around and 6 p.m. Tuesday night at his emergency number, he called me right back. Worked me in the next day to check and make sure everything was okay, totally confident that he is taking care of my eye health!

text: I normally am please with this establishment.  However, today I called for a trial pair of contacts because my appointment is next month. Clearly I don't need a box of contacts right now.  The receptionist proceeds to advise that the manager, Dr. Marshall can't do that. I asked what has changed since I've been able to obtain a trial pair prior to my appointment in the past.  No answer by that's just what he said. I would have to get a 3 month supply.  Politely, will switch my eyecare doctor with swiftness.

name: Rachel Adams
text: Annual eye exam in and out in 30 minutes, cannot beat it! Fantastic customer service from time of booking, to recommendations on contact lenses and glasses, to check-out. Could not recommend Downtown Eye Care, Dr. Marshall, and his staff highly enough. Run, don't walk if you're in need of an optometrist in Montgomery!

text:
Dr. Marshall is honestly one of the best doctors I've ever seen. His bedside manners are impeccable. He walks you through the whole exam and converses throughout as to make it a comfortable environment. He was thorough and personable. I just wish more doctors were like this!

Very clean and great location.

resp.text: Thank you for the review Brittney!

name: KAYLYNN WADE
text: Absolutely Wonderful

name: Courtney Aycock
text: Dr. Marshall and his staff are great!  Really friendly and helpful. I really appreciate being given different samples of contact lenses to try before I buy. Would definitely recommend Downtown Eye Care!

resp.text: Thank you for the review Courtney! We appreciate your feedback!

name: Whitney Miller-Nichols
text: Love Dr. Marshall and all the staff at Downtown Eye Care! They are always ready to see my right when I get there and have been so helpful when picking out glasses. I would definitely recommend that you visit them!

name: LaVon Fuller
text:
I've recently moved to Montgomery so I'm starting from scratch with eye doctors, dentist, etc. I initially booked an appointment with Downtown Eye Care simply because it was the nearest one to my home. My first experience was pleasant and Dr. Marshall is very sweet and personable and its apparent he's somewhat new in the practice (opening in 2013. However, the receptionist leaves something to be desired. She's very dry and rude! Maybe it's just me but I expect good customer service from the time I walk in the door until I walk out, ESPECIALLY if I'm paying for a service.
My second visit was booked for the wrong time and I sat in the lobby for an hour just to tell them my contacts fit. And once again she was rude! Anywho, Dr. Marshall, and the lady that fits your glasses were sweet. I'm contemplating going back.

name: D D
text: Great visit. Very efficient.

name: Bob Sagget
text: Won't be going back 1st of all they lied and said the brand I used wasn't being made anymore to upsell me to another type. Upselling is fine it's something businesses do but lying about a brand being discontinued to do it isn't. 2nd of all I had an eye exam didn't order contacts at the time when I went back to get some a few months later they wanted to hold my prescription and make me take another exam. You can order contacts from europe without an active prescription if they try this with anyone else just save some money and do that.

name: Stephanie Whitworth
text: the doctor was great but they are real sour about giving you any info for prescriptions. Were in a pandemic and its my info and I should have access to that! I wont be back.

name: bjt 2077
text: Having to wait 3 weeks plus for a box of contacts is ridiculous!

text: I had the best experience at Marx optical. Sabrina helped me find the perfect pair of tom ford glasses! totally recommend 🤓

text: Always a wonderful experience!! We always get our new frames earlier than stated! Keep up the great work!!

name: Savannah Hill
text: I was here over Christmas break to get new glasses. The entire staff was very helpful and the doctor took time to answer my questions and explain everything to me. Afterwards the ladies at the front desk were very helpful in helping me to pick out glasses that I was happy with. As an additional plus, they have a beautiful office and a very large selection of available frames.

name: Richard Collier
text: Very unprofessional office staff. The Dr. was trying to help me out and get my glasses before the office closed. The office staff completely ignored him and made me come back for another appointment. I would not visit this office if you expect customer service.

name: Henry Harris
text:
Great place to work great place for service .

Makayla and Jessica 2 wonderful people. I had the best service from this office. Highly recommend Marx Optical Cullman for any of your eye glass needs.

name: William Runyan
text: Had a 1:15 appt. After waiting until 1:45 I was shown to another small room. 15 minutes later one of the pre-exam girls came in. Apparently no one at Marx thought a 45 min wait was unusual. When I questioned the delay, I was told "they were really busy". My time meant nothing to them.  Looks like a successful practice. Too bad customer service is secondary and appointments are a waste of time.

name: Austin
text: I've been to eye doctors in Georgia and Alabama and this place has the best eye doctors. They are the most customer friendly staff I have dealt with. Highly recommend.

name: Olivia Hardin
text: Friendly staff, sadly they didn’t have the frames in stock that I wanted so I’m having to wait a few days for them to order them, it’s been 5 days now. Other than that it’s a great place to go and I recommend everyone to go there

name: mandy barber
text: It had been years since I been to the eye doctor and once I got back get my eyes check the eye doctor and the ones that is with you during the eye exam was so wonderful so I needed glasses first time in my life the ladies who help me pick my glasses out was very helpful concerned how I felt about the glasses was they to small for my face my whole experience was great and very surprising how I felt like I knew these ppl and I didn't first time to use them every person including the eye doctor was so nice down to earth  l  I left happy surprised and happy I chosen marx optical

name: Dj Curtis
text: I absolutely love this place! Great and smiling faces! ❤

name: Xbxnewby Bbbb
text: Sabrina was so great! She made me feel very welcomed! I found the perfect glasses because of her!

name: Joey Turnage
text: Terrific place with a very helpful staff. Deidra & Christi helped save me a bunch of money on my frames and lenses. Only place I’ll go to from now on!

name: sandy baker
text: I was in there a few months back, and will never return due to the fact that I was told my eye pressure was normal, below 20, I was in severe pain, was told to go to Callahan eye hospital, (after I had to pay 40.00)  then was told by Callahan eye hospital my eye pressure was in the 60's, not good, was the cause of bad pain, which then resulted in surgery on both eyes. they need to get somebody that knows how to check eye pressure properly

text: I had a medical issue with my eye, and Dr. Sutherland treated it very well.  Dr. Edgerly gave me an eye exam and set me up for some new prescription glasses.  The staff was very friendly and helpful on each visit.  My glasses were ready in just over an hour.  Dawn helped get me set up with my new pair of glasses.  Cullman ' s Marx Optical has a wonderful environment and was a great experience!!

name: Kathy Skinner
text:
Thank you, Megan, for being wholly attentive and taking the time to show me numerous frames; you were unusually patient and your smile, refreshing!
Fondly,
Kathy S.  (“Sparkles)😉

Shr even give me onformation for other family member without insurance. Thank you again will definitely make my eye care visits there.  Marx Optical is hight recommended for your eye care needs. text: Had a terrific experience at Marx Optical in Cullman yesterday! They made me feel at home from the front desk to getting my readers. The staff just to mention a few~Lauren, Christi, Hayden, Emily, Susan, Maddie, Jessica, Jen, Deidra, Jen, April and Dr. Southerland made a great impression on me! I will highly recommend to my friends and family!

text: In the past I have went to Marx in Decatur, this time visited the Cullman Office. My experience was awesome -  Thanks Blaine for all of your knowledge and Dr. Edgerly was the best!

text: Amazed with the place in Cullman.  Everyone was awesomely helpful with my 'bad-vision' questions.  Will continue my future purchase here!

name: Gerry Orten
text: Lauren was my contact. She did a great job with me.

name: Anita Woodard
text: Love Marx! Very good doctors and staff is excellent!!

name: Charlie Anderson
text: The Dr are good the rest of the staff is Not what the dam

name: bulldog44sos
text:
Details05/05/2017
Went there for an eye exam last year. I purchased some REALLY nice glasses and contacts. Blew about $450 in there. After my exam and purchase, I asked for my eye test results and PD (pupilairy distance) because my employer requires safety glasses and they will not allow me to wear my daily glasses with side shields. Also, since my employer is so strict on the glasses, they provide me with a free pair every year, but my prescription has to be up to date. The ladies behind the desk refused to give me my exam results because it was against their policy. Basically they didn't want me to take my prescription to a competitor and purchase glasses or contacts. I explained my situation and that I had just spent almost 500 on glasses and contacts (and thats additional to insurance paying 150 toward my frames) with them. Didn't matter. I walked to the back and grabbed the optometrist. He gave me my prescription so I could take it to work. That's like a doctor giving you a physical and not giving you your test results because he's afraid you'll use another pharmacy besides the one in his office! That's CRAZY! THOSE ARE MY MEDICAL RECORDS! I'll never set foot into Marx in Cullman again!

name: Donna Ray
text: Thanks to Dawn Pearce for an outstanding visit!

name: Dana Adams
text: Ridiculous! Three hours!

name: Barbecue AnytimeAnyplace
text: My family has been going here for years. They have an enormous selection of frames and the staff has always been friendly and of course so have the Doctors.

name: Caitlin Fann
text:
I left a review awhile ago about how awful this place was but I removed it because they said they would fix it.
I have called the place several times to fix my bill ( I get mailed a statement).
When I made the appointment I had my insurance on the phone to make sure what they cover and told the lady I only want to do what my insurance would cover ( I was ordering contacts). I kept getting bills saying I owed money and even though when I had my appointment I was told I would owe anything. I’ve called several time and my mom has also called trying to fix it. The last time I called a lady said that they will call me back within the next week.. I never received a phone call.
Eventually my mom stepped in and they actually hung up on her. We talked to my old insurance company and they said they never even received a claim.
This place has highly disappointed me.
It looks very pleasant on the outside and inside,  but the people that work there are the opposite.

name: Ron Davis
text: I have been a patient of Florence Eye Center for years and I have always received great service. I trust my optometrist (Kathryn) and Lyndsey did a wonderful job recently taking care of getting my new glasses. I have several family members that use this business as well. I fully recommend them.

resp.text: Thank you Ron!

name: Shaun Dalton
text:
I bought eye glasses  here 4 years ago,  as well as my  children's glasses, I've also purchased my contacts here as well.
I noticed the coating coming off one of my lenses a few months ago. Brought it in today and he told me that it is the anti glare coating that is coming off. I asked him if this is normal after just 4 years,  he said not really but it does happen?? I've got glasses I've had 10 years and nothing like this has happened. He could have offered to order me some new lenses and give me a 10.00 discount and I would have felt better about my issues.

He said there is nothing he can do since it's been 4 years. 4 years?  400.00 glasses?
Save your money and go somewhere else.
This shouldn't be happening...

name: tony triolo
text: I went to purchase single vision glasses. The sales girl said I should try the progressive lenses and that if I did not like them, I had 30 days to bring them back and they would replace them. The progressive glasses were $90 more expensive. I did not like the progressive lenses and returned them. They said that they would replace them but not credit me the $90. This was never explained to me at the time or I would have purchased the single vision glasses. Bad business.

name: Vicki
text: Thanks to Billy allowing me to address my concerns/ issues and his professionalism  I was able to have resolution and look forward to a better experience in the future. Thanks again!

resp.text: We are so sorry to hear that you are having trouble reaching us.  Please feel free to call our office and ask Lindsay. We will certainly make every attempt to help you. 256.766.3139.

name: Kristi Whitlock
text: I had my first visit today with Raleigh and Dr. Thigpen. Both ladies were amazing. So patient with me as I was nervous for my visit and as I tried on almost every pair of frames they have in stock. It was a great experience. They made me feel very comfortable and confident in my final selections. I couldn’t have hoped for more and I cannot wait to pick up my glasses!

resp.text: Thank you Kristi!!!

name: Lynn Wray Dillard (Alabama Creeks)
text: Wide selection of glasses. Very fancy decor and a coffee bar that would make Juan Valdez proud. My daughter forgot her contacts back at college and these nice folks gave her a few pairs to hold her she got back to school.

resp.text: Ha! Thank you so much Lynn!

name: Michelle Hayes
text: Excellent service!!! Dr. Thigpen is awesome as is all the staff! Amelya was also great and so friendly!!! This was my first eye exam and eyeglass purchase!! Highly recommend!!!

resp.text: Thank you Michelle!

name: Tina Simmons
text: Still waiting for reordered glasses. I waited for the first order for three weeks. I finally called to check, and they said they had the glasses, but had failed to get my phone number. 🙄 So they had just been sitting there. As it turns out, they ordered the wrong kind of lenses, so they reordered over a week ago. Haven’t heard a word. I will call them tomorrow. Maybe they’ve had them there again, although I did double check that they had my number. They have a nice showroom, but if they are going to be overpriced, then they should at least be fast and professional.

name: Alydia Murphy
text: I have been going to the Florence eye center for some time now they are amazing. They’ve got a wide variety of glasses along with glasses accessories and more. Ms.Amanda is a sweet lady she will make you feel at home. She tries to make the patients feels comfortable and wanted. Not saying that everyone here doesn’t do the same probably just as well. But if you want true service check this place out.

resp.text: We appreciate your confidence and trust in us, Alydia!

name: Jennifer Markham
text: I am so thankful for the Florence Eye Center! They are very professional but more than that they are extremely kind.... Thanks to you all!

resp.text: Thank you, Jennifer! Please let us know if we can be of any additional assistance to you.

name: Wendell Moore
text:
It’s a nice place but it’s overpriced for the service you get. I have good vision insurance but they charge you separate for everything it seems. Other places I’ve been to the copay is $10-$25. Here it was $60. Then I priced glasses and was quoted $250 with insurance, came back with cash and somehow they miscalculated and it jumped to almost $400. Then I ordered contacts when my insurance reset and they said I didn’t owe anything, a while later I got a call saying I was being turned over to collections if I didn’t pay money owed. Somehow owed $80 so I paid it. Then I got an eye infection and they kept prescribing $120 drops and it never helped.  Went yo another doctor and was prescribed $10 drops and it cleared it up. Wouldn’t recommend
And no I didn’t use my real name and email

name: Kylie Murks
text: Florence Eye Center is where me and my family will ALWAYS go for our vision needs! Taryn is a tremendous help! She was with us during the exam and picking out glasses AND even ordered our contacts. She can do it all! They also did an exam on my son before he was a year old! Thanks for being awesome to our family!

resp.text: Wow! Thank you Kylie.  You're like family to us.  Taryn really can do it all.  We are so glad that you and your family chose us to be your eye care team!!!

name: Brittany Drowns
text: It was the best customer service I could've asked for! Amanda Brown was the sweetest from the moment I went back to the room! She helped me pick out frames that fit my face and I was so thankful as this is my first time ever wearing glasses! Absolutely 100% pleased.

resp.text: Thank you Brittany!

name: Roy Pearson
text: i would give zero stars if i could. this place sucks

resp.text: We are certainly sorry to learn that you feel this way.  We strive to provide excellence in eye care and eyewear for our patients.  It appears that we have fallen short of our intended goals with you.  We would love the opportunity to change your opinion.  Give us a call at (256) 766-3139 and ask to speak with one of our wonderful managers.

name: Tammy Prince
text: I love this office & will never go anywhere else! They have tons of glasses to choose from and even if they don’t have what you’re looking for, they will find it! The opticians are great and very informative. Such a great atmosphere & amazing service! Thanks!

resp.text: Tammy, thank you for your confidence & trust in us!  We certainly appreciate it.

name: Karan Brawner
text: This office is absolutely beautiful!  I went in looking for frames and Sally helped me.  I tried on many frames and she was very patient and I valued her opinion.  We found the perfect frame for me!!!  Sally is a great asset to your office staff.

resp.text: You are absolutely correct.  Sally is amazing!  Her experience combined with her knowledge simply cannot be duplicated.  Thank you for taking time to offer your opinion of our office and staff!  : )

name: Ginger Witt
text: Florence Eye Center is amazing! Great atmosphere. Best eye doctors and staff around. Sally Pigg, the technician that took care of us was extremely knowledgeable and awesome to work with! Definitely knows her job and how to help. Would recommend to anyone!

resp.text: Wow! Thank you Ginger!  We appreciate you taking time to offer your opinion of our office and staff.  Please let us know if we can be of any additional service to you.

name: Emily Miles
text: I can’t say enough great things about this office, from  start to finish the staff was professional, informative, and caring. I found Taryn was extremely informative and made sure I understood everything before moving on to the next step. She certainly took her time with me and became personable makeing sure my experience was nothing short of amazing. I am completely happy with my experience and will definitely recommend this office to friends and family.

resp.text: : ) Big, Huge, Gigantic smiles from all us at Florence Eye Center!!!

name: Susan Shirley
text: I’ve been going to Florence Eye Center for years. I’ve always had a wonderful experience with everyone. Sally has always been very helpful with everything from the prep before my exam to helping pick out my glasses! She is so knowledgeable about her job! Thanks so much!!!

name: J Conlee
text:
Great atmosphere! Great staff! I especially respected the fact that my tech-person, Kiersten put my phobia of eye doctors to rest. She was calm and took her time to explain each step. And the eye doctor got the debris out of my eye on the first try!!

**edit**

As a former “disgruntled employee” I would have to note that any and all reviews above 3 stars were made with fraudulent intent to cover up the poor reviews of actual customers. The management had a contest for whichever employee has the most high rated reviews on google gets $500.
I don’t understand why they didn’t want to invest their time and money in properly training their staff especially after asking the management several times for help, guidance and training with no avail. Just click on each review and notice how the commenter says similar things for different locations of this branch out in muscle shoals and Madison.
But thank you “owners” (management) for replying to your own employee to toot your own horn and make yourself look like a half decent medical establishment. This isn’t a day spa, people actually come here for medical help and look here for honest reviews from actual customers bc they are spending money on their physical well being, not on a nice day out.

resp.text: We are happy that you such a good experience at our office!  Kudos to Kiersten!

name: Michael Darling
text:
My first visit, with an appointment, I was taken back and left in an exam room for 1 1/2 hr until I opened the door and yelled for someone to help me. Another wait for 20 minutes and I was leaving when the eye doc came in. He said “ oh, I was busy, did no one come tell You?”
This time the ordered my glasses, told me two weeks, and after almost three weeks, I had to go by the office..no one answered the phone tho I tried 3 times... the young girl seemed miffed that I asked her to check if they were in. They were, they handed them to me and said good bye...no fitting to face, no checking if they were right...nothing.
I will find a VSP provider other than FEC next year.

resp.text: We certainly hate to hear that you had a bad experience in our office. It definitely sounds like we failed to provide the level of service we strive for.  Please accept our apologies.

name: Josh Vincent
text: After Walmart quit taking our vision insurance, we made the switch and I’m glad we did. This is a great office, great environment, nice staff and the best doctors. We had great help from Taryn in helping select the correct frame with the best fit. I’ll definitely be back. Thanks!

name: Macie Pigg
text: This place is awesome! Great staff, beautiful set up, outstanding selections of frames. I will definitely be going here for all of my eye care needs!

resp.text:
(Translated by Google) Thank you Macie!

(Original)
Thank you Macie!

name: Bill Crawford
text: I enjoyed my experience with this office.  The technology is out of this world.  I had never seen the back of my eye until now.  Thankful for a great experience and Taryn is helpful with glasses selection.

resp.text: Thank you Bill!  We are glad that you had a great experience at our office.  We make every effort to remain at the forefront of technology....thanks for noticing!

name: Pam Ritter
text: I highly recommend Florence Eye Center. Taryn recently helped me pick out the perfect glasses, and I love them! She does a great job!

name: Gabriel Carter

Yes I came into Florence eye center today on February 13th 2019 and I could’ve felt more at home. I love the atmosphere here and all of the employees. A huge thanks to Hannah Campbell for assisting me on making a great choice of frames! Thanks again Hannah Campbell.
Mr. Carter

resp.text: Thank you Gabriel!

name: Freda Parkes
text: Beautifully decorated offices. Not the typical “doctor’s office” look and it’s nice. Taryn helped me with my glasses, and she was nice, too!

name: Hope Graham
text: Special thanks to Taryn for helping me pick out my glasses! So informative!  & great office, it’s decorated so nicely AND I love the massage chair!!!!

resp.text: Thanks Hope! We certainly appreciate you taking time to offer your opinion of our office and staff!

name: Charles Swindle
text: I sincerely appreciate the kindness of these good people. Not a long wait at all and staff so courteous. Now Dr Basden he is so considerate, polite, and respectful. I am a diabetic and was having some issues. Dr Basden did a through exam, found the problem and now we are working on things. I am a satisfied lifetime customer.

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Swindle! We appreciate your kind words. Please let us know if we can be of any additional assistance to you.

name: Gary Sparks
text: Florence Eye Center is a place where you can find quality help from quality people. One of which is Bailey Pickens. Bailey is great at what she does! She cares for customers like family. For all of your eye care needs, you’ll be satisfied at Florence Eye Center!

resp.text: Thank you Gary!  You're absolutely correct about Bailey.  She loves what she does almost as much as the patients she helps.

name: April Smith
text: Bailey Pickens is the sweetest person! Very sweet and helpful! You are the best. Specks downtown is a very nice facility! You rock Bailey!!!

name: tammy williams

name: Denise Steele
text: Beautiful office! Amanda was so helpful and very polite! I love Dr. Thigpen too! Excellent care!

resp.text: Thank you Denise!  We are very lucky to have Amanda and Dr. Thigpen! They are two of the most sincerely nice people that we know!

name: Johnnie Lyle
text: This office has the best technology of any office I have ever been to!  Optos is amazing! Choose that option! & let Taryn help you with your glasses!

resp.text: Johnnie, we thank you for your kind review.  We strive to provide the highest level of technology available to our patients.  We appreciate you noticing our efforts!  You are 100% correct about Optos and Taryn!

name: Nick Surles
text: The absolute best eye dr’s office around! Great staff with a friendly environment. Taryn always takes care of me and my family.

resp.text: You're a wise man! Taryn has years of experience and absolutely loves helping people.  Thank you for taking time to tell us about your experience in our office!

name: Naomi Smith
text: I was put in a situation where I had to go to another eye doctor for a visit due to the only eye doctor I'd ever gone to being far away at the time. This place worked with me wonderfully, and the people were super friendly and helpful! If I ever need an eye doctor in Florence again, these are my people for sure!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words, Naomi.  Please let us know if we can ever be of service to you again.

name: bethany Sparks
text: Florence Eye Center has a good variety of frames, and Bailey Pickens is very helpful. She has nice taste. She is very polite and friendly.

text: I've been going here for almost 4 years now and I love the staff here. I started out with glasses in 6th grade, they were very helpful in helping me find the perfect frames. This office is great with all ages, I love the themed rooms, the coffee bar, and the great frame selections. Thank you for being my favorite and only eye center ❤

name: Mary Davis
text: Great service and very friendly staff.  Thank you Kelsey for the help and patience.

name: BJ Wilson
text: Our family loves Florence Eye Center! A courteous and professional staff, like Bailey Pickens, make appointments a breeze.

name: Flory Stucky
text: I'm new to town and had an accident where my glasses got stepped on; the frame was bent and a lens had fallen out. I walked in without an appointment and asked if they could help me out. They had my glasses bent back in shape and the lens in within minutes and no charge! Great service all the way around. Looks like we found our new eye care center!

resp.text: Welcome to the Shoals area! We are happy to have you as part of our community.  Thank you for your kind words! We are glad we were able help you today. Please let us know if we can be of any additional assistance to you.

name: Bridgette Cummings
text: Taryn is the absolute best. I definitely recommend her!

resp.text: Thank you Bridgette!

name: Patricia McCoy
text: Wrong lens inserted on left eye, tried to replace it but it wouldn't come out. Right eye ok after lens implant for distance. Wish I had never wasted the $$ or time. I could see better with my contacts. Florence Eye Center in SC.

resp.text: I'm sorry..I am having trouble finding you in our system. What doctor did you see? We do not do implant surgery at this office. I think you may have us confused with another office. We will be glad to help you in anyway we can in the future.   We are Florence Eye Center in Florence, Alabama.

name: Mason Boersma
text: I had an amazing experience with Taryn, she was super helpful and sweet as well! I highly suggest Florence Eye Center!

resp.text: Taryn knows her stuff!  Sounds like we are preaching to the choir.  Thanks Mason!

name: jackie smith
text: My mother went here for glasses, both times she was not helped or even spoke to. She had to go to the front desk and ask for help after sitting waiting for over 20 minutes. Terrible customer service and very rude. Would not recommend.

resp.text: Jackie, please accept our apology on behalf of your mother.  We pride ourselves on providing excellent customer service and assistance. We are disappointed to learn that we failed to do so with your mother.  Can you tell us the day of the week your mother was in the office?  We will not tolerate this behavior from our staff.

name: slim whitman
text:
Only reason I gave it one star is because there was not a zero option, worst experience I've ever had. Been wearing contacts for over thirty years, have never paid a "fitting" fee. Basically, my contact prescription is being held hostage unless I pay an additional $65.00, after having a contact exam. I'll never step foot into one of these facilities again, and will quickly discourage anyone considering doing so. BTW, I had a contact only exam performed for less than the "fitting" fee, what a joke.

"Edit" Of course I used a different email than my actual email address, funny how you only addressed that instead of the "hostage fee" you charge in addition to the billed charges to ones' insurance. And no, I'm quite positive it was your facility (Muscle Shoals).

resp.text:
We have researched our appointments history and do not see a male patient with the last name Whitman for the past 6 months.   We hope that you mistaken our office with another.   If not, we are certainly sorry to learn that you feel this way about our practice.    It sounds like you've found a practice that suits you.  We hope that you will be happy there.  If we can be of service, please don't hesitate to call us.

Slim, we really aren't sure what to say at this point.  We do have an office in Muscle Shoals and we do charge a fee to fit a patient with contact lenses.  The fee is usual & customary.  Contact lenses are an option not necessity.  If you choose to wear contact lenses, you pay the fee to be evaluated.  We feel the same as you.  We aren't the right office for you.

name: Lafayette Mecham
text: What an incredible place! Beautiful office, great frame selection, and attentive doctors and staff! 👍👍👍I am bringing my entire family here.

resp.text: Thank you!  We make every effort to make each patient's experience with us exceptional.  We certainly appreciate your kind words!

name: Donita Kaye Munsey
text: Very nice building, decorations were great. Loved the fireplace! Friendly and helpful staff and a good selection of frames to choose from.

name: Jena Smith
text: The was every nice.only thing i don't like is how long i have to wait for my glasses .

resp.text: Jena, thanks for taking the time to send us feedback about your experience at our office.  We certainly appreciate your input!  We agree.  We don't like that patients have to wait for their glasses either.  Many insurance carriers now dictate which lens labs we can order eyeglass lenses from.  Your insurance is one of them.  If you want or need glasses sooner, we will gladly make you a pair in our in-house lab.  Insurance would not cover that pair but we can make them while you wait.  It will take approximately 1 hour.  Have a wonderful day!!!

name: Carmilla Evans
text: They are very nice and everyone keeps a smile on their face. Love you guys, thanx for the hospitality.

resp.text: Thank you so much!  Have a wonderful weekend!

name: Julie Oliverius Online
text: Great set up inside the office and very helpful, friendly staff.  I highly recommend them.

resp.text: Julie, Thank you so very much!!!  We are thrilled to know that you had a great experience at our office.  We apologize for not replying sooner.  Somehow, we missed your kind review.  Again, thank you and please let us know if we can be of service to you!

name: Angie Gibson
text: Beautiful  office,  super friendly  staff.  Open on Saturday.

resp.text: Wow! Thank you so much, Angie!  We certainly appreciate your kind words. Please let us know if we can do anything for you.

text: Poor service. Walked in to look at frames before I made an appointment to get an idea on prices. I was in my work clothes and I guess I didn't look good enough to be a customer. Couldn't get anyone to help me or even make eye contact. Maybe they need glasses lol.

resp.text: Mr. Smith, please accept our apologies for not offering our assistance.   Our front desk & optical staff pride themselves on providing excellent customer service.  We are certainly displeased to learn that we didn't perform our jobs well for you.  We would love an opportunity to regain your trust and confidence.  Please accept our most sincere apologies.

text: Thanks Taryn for helping my boys with their glasses.

Thanks guys see you soon.
